story:
The DRIFT

  • Made out of Aerospace 7075 Aluminum instead of the more common 6061. 7075 offers better machining quality, better overall finish & more scratch/dent resistance.
  •  Better weight distribution throughout the pen to make it less front and back heavy.
  •  Wide front end grooves to enable the writer a solid grip & easy cleanup after filling from an ink bottle.
  • Converter retainment designed barrel that minimizes the chance of a converter separation from the nib & feed when dropped & eliminates the rattling sound that can occur with metal pens.
  •  German made #6 Jowo nib and k5 converter.
  • Can be entirely disassembled for maintenance.
  •  Uses Schmidt K5 converters and standard international short cartridges.
  • 48 different variations.
  •  Made in the U.S.A

Here are some of the variations you can create.

Note - If you want something that will develop "heavily" used look quickly than the brushed version is what you want. It is brushed by hand but no anodizing is applied to keep that raw look of 7075-T6 Aluminum. 

 

Hot Rod Red

Gun Metal Grey
 
Brushed
 
Midnight Black
 
 

 

 

 

 
 

What will the funds be used for?

      

Tooling 

  • M10x.75  taps. 
  • M12x.75  taps. 
  • M7.4x.5  taps.  
  • Tap tool holder. 

Material  

  • .562" diameter rods that are 48" in length of 7075-T6 Aluminium.

Parts

  •  Includes converters, nibs and a desktop microscope so I can check every nib before being shipped.

 

Risks & Challenges

To ensure everything goes smoothly during the manufacturing process I will be making the pens in-house using CNC machines. The only time someone else will be involved is the company that will perform the anodizing. 

  • The material will be shipped.
  • Each operation will be done on one part at a time.
  • Organized into batches for anodizing.
  • Anodized.
  • Organize again to each orders specifications.
  • Check and sign off on every single order.
  • Ship.

 

The biggest risks are shipping delays. Also, Anodizing can take anywhere from 1-3 days depending on how many parts are being anodized at once. Tool breakage is a possibility but thats why I buy in larger qunataties.

We are partners

I made the DRIFT with writers in mind and without you or the people that have helped me I would not have gotten this far. Whether or not you can contribute, there are other ways you can make a difference.

  • Please spread the word!

Show your friends with your favorite social media platform on the top right of this page!

story:
FINHTML5 PRESENTS:

Max Firtman: "Breaking Limits on Mobile HTML5"

Date and time: 31.10.2013, 18:00
Location: Urho Kekkosen katu 7 B, Helsinki

Max is a mobile+web developer, trainer, speaker and writer. He wrote many books, including "Programming the Mobile Web" and "jQuery Mobile: Up and Running" published by O'Reilly Media.

He has a blog about mobile web development at mobilexweb.com and he maintains the website mobilehtml5.org.

He is a frequent speaker at conferences, including QCon, OSCON, Breaking Development, Velocity, Fluent, JSConf, Google Developer Day, Campus Party Europe, Mobilism and many other events around the world. He has delivered hundreds of trainings on mobile+web technologies for open trainings and well-known companies around the world.

Breaking the limits

Several hacks are available for mobile web development that are unknown to most web developers. This talk will go over 15 of the most interesting unknown hacks for mobile web developers.

More than 15 hacks that will surprise you on mobile browsers, such as IE10, Safari on iOS and Chrome for Android. Quickly, we will go though the problem, the code and the live demo of the hack working on a real device.

Hacks list include:

  • How to refresh a background "frozen" tab on iPad
  • Creating a mobile view for IE10 on snapped mode
  • Making a push notification on iOS from a website
  • Creating a high resolution canvas
  • Creating a full-screen experience
  • Working with images in different resolutions
  • Undocumented meta tags and hacks
  • Bypassing limits on storage APIs
  • Interacting with native apps
  • Speeding up performance

ABOUT FINHTML5

FINHTML5 Talks is a series of presentations where you can influence who's going to give a talk. We are aiming to bring talented global visionaries, tech leaders, designers and hard-core hackers to Helsinki to enlighten us on the latest developments from the front end of the Internet.

Read more about FINHTML5 Talks

story:
Say Hello to the new ARWorld!

We are graduate students at Duke University and would like to free the world from hard, antiquated, and old fashion instructions by providing free Augmented Reality Instructions for the real furniture world. 


Our diverse team of founders are Porteaux Islas (Nuclear Engineer),  Meng Haung (Financial Mathematician), and Ashwin Dandekar (Electrical Engineer). Help us fund this mission and you will be making a difference that will easy the life for everyone.


The Impact

Imagine you just bought a Ready to assemble TV Stand to watch the Superbowl [or awesome movie] with your friends and/or love ones. You have to prepare the snacks, clean the house, suit up, etc. But wait you still need to put the furniture together (here is were the drama begins).

You look at the clock and there are 15 minutes left before the start of the show, challenge accepted!! in the first few minutes you start putting the parts together, suddenly you realize that things are not fitting as they should. You start trying out different combinations but the parts just do not cooperate, You look at the clock and 5 minutes have past. You notice there are instructions and grab them, after another 5 minutes you finally understand the ancient hieroglyphs and then realize that the figures do not look anything like the furniture parts.

 You start wondering if you should return the furniture... But Oh My Gosh the show just started!


Now lets look at the same scenario differently; you open the ARIS app in your smartphone, scan the box, once you have opened the box the AR instructions have been downloaded. You hover the smartphone over the box and the pieces are highlighted sequentially, so that step by step you putted together your new furniture. You look at the clock and you have finished in less than 5 minutes. 



With the ARIS app you will have time to get a refreshing drink, position the furniture as you please and be ready next to your friends before the show begins.

What We Need & What You Get

  • Brag that you have hired us to build the augmented reality application that will save you from unreadable instructions. 
  • You will be the first one in downloading our application that will help the planet by getting rid of tons of paper instructions.
  • We need anything you could help with to further develop our current accomplishments and build an ecosystem that will work in any smartphone platform. Funding will be focused for the development of the global server infrastructure, capture of the 3D world objects for the ARworld, and making of the augmented reality actions.
  • You will also be added to the mailing list for updates of our progress and future plans and given custom design T-shirts that can render whatever you want them to render using our app!
  • Not reaching the entire goal does not means we will stop; We will thrive to make our vision a reality so that your support and our momentum will help the community with this annoying problem.

Risks & Challenges

We take educated risks in order to advance with our future innovation plans, these risks do not pose any danger to our current ARIS app. Our current challenge is to create a framework that may be able to contain all the AR instructions for furniture pieces in the world. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't currently contribute no worries, just share this campaign; making noise for us is just as important.

story:
Over the past year and a half of being in college, I have heard about and seen so many people struggling to find a new roommate for the next semester or following year. Which is why my roommate and I decide to create Roomie. Roomie will allow people to see the people at their university that are looking for a roommate and if both users like each other then they can start talking and become Roomies!


The money raised by this campaign will be used to cover the cost of finishing development, web hosting, design and advertising costs.

story:
SelectCall can be downloaded 
through Google Play: download


Selectcall was newly updated.
(To remove the login process, the account data has been reset.)
Please download it again.


             

Story


An unexpected call from your ex- lover while having a good time with a person you would like to be close to!!

Unfortunately, either relationship didn’t work out.

Is there any clever way to get out of this unexpected situation not letting other people notice it?

So we created a hide mode and fake mode in Select Call.



Hide Mode



#1. If you feel sorry to block the caller but don’t want to answer the call!

#2. If you hate even looking at the caller’s name on your phone, so you just don’t want to notice the call!

#3. If you don’t want people to notice that you’ve got a call from the person!

- There won’t be any history left for the missed calls. (Impossible to restore)

Manual : Operation of HIDE MODE



Fake Mode



#1. If you want to change the name of the caller.

#2. You can fool your friends. Just for fun.

#3. Timid revenge

-  Does your boss bother you even after work? Change your boss’ name to a funny name such as idiot or stupid. And set the timer. Whenever you receive calls from your boss after work, you will feel awesome!

Manual : Operation of FAKE MODE

 

Event


Language update event#1 - Please help us with translation

French will be also on the Select Call.

Please check the translation that we suggest, and improve the sentences.

Please check the translation page LINK, and modify accordingly the content of that document, and please send us an email to contact2gdinvest@gmail.com (please send the email to the address used in Select Call, or write the email-ID of Select Call in the email.)

After reviewing the translation that you sent, we will give you five shells for each selected sentence.

** Rewards

- 5 shells for each selected sentence: All selected applicants will be shown on the thank list.

- Anybody who participates will receive 50 shells (Incorrect sentences, using profane language, content other statements, such as copying the contents presented will not be considered)

- If you acquire more than 1000 shell, you will be automatically switched to permanent user (Shell quantity will be subtracted)



Differences of android Version
(This app works ONLY Android)


Android 4.x
Hide screen: turn off state/desktop state/using other app state → The respective states are maintained during incoming calls


Android 5.x
Hide screen: When receiving calls, the incoming-call screen turns to black out state.
Heads-up notifications: You can not set the feature

Android 6.x
Hide screen: When receiving calls, the incoming-call screen turns to black out state.
Heads-up notifications: You can turn-off the feature on your phone settings


Purpose of Crowdfunding


We hope to get the following things through the IndieGoGo.

1. Potential customers

2. Funds for multiple devices that did not tested



The current development situation


We uploaded SelectCall through Google Play  download 

You can use SelectCall FREE while 1 week.

Please use and with us 

This app does not work Perfect yet.

We are looking for improvements.



Notice


It can not control sound and vibration in google reference mobiles.

We hope to control heads up notifications on android 6.0 - Marshmallow

If funding is successful after you purchase, goods will applied on 31 March.
Depending on the device performance, operation failure could be occured around 3 times.
This app is irrelevant to routing technology.


Manual List


Log-in page manual

Account creation page

Phone number list page manual

Operation of HIDE MODE

Operation of FAKE MODE

Operate BLOCK MODE

Received call setting page

Setting page

story:
Obama has Solyndra, Romney has Exxon

The two major parties don't need any help with energy. They have mega-corp energy companies falling all over themselves to donate money. But what do the rest of us have? Where does the fuel for the Green Party and Libertarian Party campaign busses come from?

  • I grow corn and soybeans
  • Someone else makes fuel from it, and makes campaign contributions to the Democrats & Republicans, so they can protect their monopoly
  • It's about time we made our own fuel, and helped out the third party candidates
We can grow the alternative fuel for the alternative political parties.

What We Need & What You Get

I'm starting a campaign to produce soybean & canola biofuel for the Green and Libertarian parties. I'm planning on producing both conventional GMO vegetable oil, as well as food-grade certified organic soybean oil. How much of each depends on your contributions.

I need $55,000 to do this, and here's how I'll spend it: (click image for details)

I am starting with 1000 bushels of conventional GMO soybeans as a baseline, that will produce a little over 1000 gallons of biodiesel. This would turn out to provide enough fuel to run a campaign bus at about 6mpg from Maine to California, and then back again. (6000 miles). If you want to see some of those 1000 bushels as organic, please select the Organic Green Oil perk or the Libertarian Oil Independence perk.

Any money raised after we pay expenses in October will be donated to the two alternative party campaigns for a final advertising blitz before election day on November 6. Unlike most other political organizations, budgets and expenses for this effort will be posted for public review. If it is not possible to deliver fuel directly to the third party campaigns, then all funds will be used to produce biodiesel that will be sold into the regular market as an offset.

The Impact

  • Supporting the Department of Green Energy is going to create local jobs, make America more secure, and reduce our collective carbon footprint
  • Help us make energy policy, and the hard choices about food vs fuel something that we can all participate in again, instead of partisan hacks and big corporate interest lobbyists
  • Bring some direct accountability and transparency to fuel and energy issues
  • Raise awareness about third parties

We have the ability to ensure a safe, reliable, abundant, and cost-effective energy supply that puts carbon back in the ground, with no new legislation or policy. It starts with your donations, and continues with buying fuel from your local farmers, instead of depending on a world market controlled by dictators, royal families, and shell accounts in the Cayman Islands.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about Libertarians and Greens
  • Your vote matters even more if you vote for a third Party. Last election cycle we had a mandate for change and got business as usual. Change will only happen when we vote in a third party candidate

story:
*Though our device is relatively easy to be made, we cannot request our manufacturer to turn on their machines for one prototype; instead we have to secure orders before we can start the production process.
 
 



Keep your loves ones from driving drunk or erratically and always know where they are with our safety vehicle system.

IGNITION INTERLOCK | TRACKING | BREATHALYZER

Our device gives parents peace of mind knowing their loved one is operating their vehicle in a safe and sober manner as well as tracking their whereabouts. Our product also protects the vehicle from unauthorized use and/or theft. The car will not start if the interlock device does not recognize the cell phone - as in the case of a stranger's cell phone -  thus preventing theft of the vehicle.

SMARTPHONE APPLICATION

Our device is accompanied by a smartphone app that allows you to customize its features to best suit your child. Imagine the relief of knowing your child is safe while on the road!

With the smartphone app, you can choose to track your child's location and receive speeding alerts enabling you to monitor your child's safety. Geofences and points of interests can also be set by the parent/authorized user, therefore if the driver enters such places as a bar or is crossing state or province lines -for instance- an alert will be sent to the parent. 

Check out a live app simulation here https://marvelapp.com/4agfbc1/screen/29649264

HOW IT WORKS

  • Install the ignition interlock device on your desired vehicle.
  • Download the Not Your Child app and pair the device with your phone.
  • Connect the breathalyzer to your vehicle.

If the breathalyzer detects any impairment after the driver provides a breath sample, the interlock system will block the ignition from starting and you will receive a notification. Now, you have potentially saved the life of a loved one as well as others on the road. However, if you're not concerned about impaired driving, you may remove this particular feature.

Face recognition by cell phone photo will also be enabled to prevent the driver from asking a friend to blow a clean breath sample to engage the ignition.

The interlock system can be paired with up to 6 users in a household via their cell phone. Parents will be able to track their car through the app and see full weekly and monthly reports of where the vehicle has been.

NOT EASILY REMOVED

You can rest assured that this system cannot be easily removed by just anyone. So any attempts by a non-professional mechanic will be futile.

WHY WE NEED YOU

We have almost a decade of experience in business, entrepreneurship, and safe driving devices. We've been developing this particular model with all its features for over 2 years with our experienced engineers. We have a full concept plan laid out. We need your support to produce our first prototype and start mass production.

 

ABOUT US

Frustrated with the countless stories of lives needlessly taken on our roads; Julia Matthews the CEO and Founder of Not Your Child Corp became determined to do her part in stopping these mindless tragedies. She put pen to paper and devised the invention you are now learning about.

Julia has lost friends to careless inebriated drivers has seen once able-bodied adults and energetic teenagers becoming wheelchair bound cripples, dependent on others for basic necessities. Julia has seen families stripped of loved ones, children stripped of security and survivors stripped of dignity because of inebriated driving. This invention is Julia’s way of putting an end to the madness of losing loved ones needlessly because of carelessness on our roads.

Support us now, with your help we will bring this invention to market. Help us keep your families safe while they travel on our roads.

RISKS & CHALLENGES

We have Alcohol Countermeasure Systems (ACS), a reliable and well-known company ready to manufacture the device for us. We have set up as many preventive measures as possible to mass produce without too many issues. However, if any significant difficulty should arise, we will keep you informed throughout the entire process. Thank you for your support!

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

We understand sometimes you just can't contribute financially, but that doesn't mean you can't help. Please share our project with all your family and friends and help us keep all of our loved ones safe!
story_txt:
*Though our device is relatively easy to be made, we cannot request our manufacturer to turn on their machines for one prototype; instead we have to secure orders before we can start the production process.
 
 

Keep your loves ones from driving drunk or erratically and always know where they are with our safety vehicle system.


IGNITION INTERLOCK | TRACKING | BREATHALYZER
Our device gives parents peace of mind knowing their loved one is operating their vehicle in a safe and sober manner as well as tracking their whereabouts. Our product also protects the vehicle from unauthorized use and/or theft. The car will not start if the interlock device does not recognize the cell phone - as in the case of a stranger's cell phone -  thus preventing theft of the vehicle.


SMARTPHONE APPLICATION
Our device is accompanied by a smartphone app that allows you to customize its features to best suit your child. Imagine the relief of knowing your child is safe while on the road!

With the smartphone app, you can choose to track your child's location and receive speeding alerts enabling you to monitor your child's safety. Geofences and points of interests can also be set by the parent/authorized user, therefore if the driver enters such places as a bar or is crossing state or province lines -for instance- an alert will be sent to the parent. 
Check out a live app simulation here https://marvelapp.com/4agfbc1/screen/29649264


HOW IT WORKS

Install the ignition interlock device on your desired vehicle.
Download the Not Your Child app and pair the device with your phone.
Connect the breathalyzer to your vehicle.



If the breathalyzer detects any impairment after the driver provides a breath sample, the interlock system will block the ignition from starting and you will receive a notification. Now, you have potentially saved the life of a loved one as well as others on the road. However, if you're not concerned about impaired driving, you may remove this particular feature.

Face recognition by cell phone photo will also be enabled to prevent the driver from asking a friend to blow a clean breath sample to engage the ignition.


The interlock system can be paired with up to 6 users in a household via their cell phone. Parents will be able to track their car through the app and see full weekly and monthly reports of where the vehicle has been.


NOT EASILY REMOVED
You can rest assured that this system cannot be easily removed by just anyone. So any attempts by a non-professional mechanic will be futile.


WHY WE NEED YOU
We have almost a decade of experience in business, entrepreneurship, and safe driving devices. We've been developing this particular model with all its features for over 2 years with our experienced engineers. We have a full concept plan laid out. We need your support to produce our first prototype and start mass production.



 


ABOUT US
Frustrated with the countless stories of lives needlessly taken on our roads; Julia Matthews the CEO and Founder of Not Your Child Corp became determined to do her part in stopping these mindless tragedies. She put pen to paper and devised the invention you are now learning about.
Julia has lost friends to careless inebriated drivers has seen once able-bodied adults and energetic teenagers becoming wheelchair bound cripples, dependent on others for basic necessities. Julia has seen families stripped of loved ones, children stripped of security and survivors stripped of dignity because of inebriated driving. This invention is Julia’s way of putting an end to the madness of losing loved ones needlessly because of carelessness on our roads.
Support us now, with your help we will bring this invention to market. Help us keep your families safe while they travel on our roads.


RISKS & CHALLENGES
We have Alcohol Countermeasure Systems (ACS), a reliable and well-known company ready to manufacture the device for us. We have set up as many preventive measures as possible to mass produce without too many issues. However, if any significant difficulty should arise, we will keep you informed throughout the entire process. Thank you for your support!

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
We understand sometimes you just can't contribute financially, but that doesn't mean you can't help. Please share our project with all your family and friends and help us keep all of our loved ones safe!

story:
FEBO is a wooden paintbrush that lets you engrave your drawings on different materials and customize your belongings thanks to the sun

BRAND NEW MODELS OF FEBO JUST FOR INDIEGOGO INDEMAND! 

The newest version is made of beech wooden body enriched by a white acrylic top ring and random colored safety filter.


The walnut model is available in a totally brand new version! Bright alluminium top ring and translucent white safety filter.


ZEBRAWOOD VERSION WITH BRASS TOP RING

AMARANTH WITH STUNNING CORTEN TOP RING

WHY THE NAME FEBO? 

Phoebus (/ˈfiːbəs/ fee-bəs; Φοῖβος, Phoibos, literally "bright"), which was very commonly used by both the Greeks and Romans in Apollo's role as the GOD OF LIGHT.

Febo is a simple tool which allows you to draw with the sun. It focuses its rays onto your chosen canvas to create a uniquely personal design. It was designed with the aim of turning nature into beautiful, creative and permanent works of art. Due to its simplicity you can personalize your favorite belongings in minutes!

Febo is fun for all ages and skill levels!

Beautiful illustration #MADEWITHFEBO by the illustrator Francesca Padovan



Febo is much more than a regular magnifying glass, it is a proper tool designed to make your drawing experience really unique. 

Its wooden body is precisely calibrated in order to immediately focus the sun's rays once you place Febo on the object of your choice. Its size makes it super comfortable to hold, making your creative projects easy and enjoyable. 


IT WILL LAST FOREVER: batteries are not required

SKILL LEVELS: stencils are included to make your first project easy and successful!

We designed 8 different stencils suitable for a broad range of applications. 
They are divided into 3 different categories:

• Icons, including foods, animals and other useful shapes 
• Letters and numbers, including, well, letters and numbers


CONNECT WITH NATURE: spend more time outdoors, creating and personalizing your projects! 


IT STARTS WORKING INSTANTLY: personalize your favorite belongings in minutes! If you trace your drawing with GRAPHITE it starts work instantly


UNIQUE TRACES: every trace will be unique depending on the strength of the sun and the objects you choose to personalize. 


MAKE AN ORDINARY OBJECT YOUR OWN: the possibilities are endless! 


CRAFTED WITH LOVE IN ITALY: the combination of wood and glass make it refined and durable

Each FEBO comes with a pair of rollable lenses one size fits all, automatically adjusting to the contours of each individual's face. 

They provide 100% UV PROTECTION with only 6% to 8% visible light transmission.  


Always wear your sunglasses before using Febo. Place Febo on the surface you want to customize. Wood, plywood, cork, leather and cardboard are all compatible materials. Keep the sun behind your back and tilt the surface perpendicularly to it. Thanks to the special design of the sphere on Febo's base you are able to keep track and see clearly your design. 
Once you have removed the safety filter, the lens absorbs the sun's rays precisely onto the selected material. Now the fun begins, start engraving! The density of the stroke depends on the weather, every cloud will produce a different kind of trace, with different thickness and intensity making it unique.

Febo can be used in any season of the year, even in winter after a snowfall: all you need is a clear sky! 

• 1 Trace the drawings with the pencil  
• 2 Always wear sunglasses 
• 3 Remove the colored safety filter
• 4 Place the drawing surface (wood, cork, leather...) at a 90° angle

• 5 Start engraving and have fun!


Febo is designed and manufactured with care in Italy. 

Every Febo is CNC machined from a single piece of solid European walnut and hand finished without the use of chemicals. A convex magnifying lens, made of durable polished glass, is the operational core of Febo. Every single one is carefully tested before assembling.

The acrylic safety disk comes in a variety of different colors, picked for you by our team, granting each Febo a unique and strong temper. When not in use, the acrylic disk obstructs the sun's rays avoiding the accidental functioning of Febo.

Febo's wood is environmentally safe & friendly. 100% FSC wood!

FEBO uses Minelli's wood. One of the many reasons why we chose an Italian supplier, rather than a random and cheaper one abroad, was the ability to verify the quality of the product itself. The wood comes from a factory that is state of the art, extremely sensitive to environmental issues, on top of being innovative and using machines that are designed by them. They guarantee the usage of 100% FSC® wood. They also have innovative water-based coatings, energy-saving production policies, clean energy generation, and integrated waste management among many examples. This is indeed a more expensive choice, but we were looking for local, high quality and environmentally good wood suppliers. We're proud and honored of working with them.

We hope you all love Febo as much as we love it and we hope you will share it with your family & friends. :)

Any kind of support will be more than appreciated. 
To be updated about our journey follow us on Febo FB and Febo Instagram pages or check out our brand new website.

With gratitude, 
The Febo Team and Atellani

Any kind of support will be more than appreciated. To be updated about our journey follow us on Febo FB and Febo Instagram pages or check out our brand new website.
With gratitude, The Febo Team and Atellani

story:
Features and Capabilities





While traveling overseas for business and having to leave his 2 feral cats at home, Ken looked online to find reliable pet feeder suitable for outdoors. After three months searching unsuccessfully, Ken decided to build a feeder himself, now he's able to have the lunch with his cats from anywhere. 

Everyone who saw the feeding system were so impressed and kept saying that this pet feeder should be for available for others. 

So we did... ;-)

Founder and Inventor  -  Ken Powers 

PetPal was founded by Ken Powers. For the past 23 years Ken has been an executive at KSA, a company that supplies electronic components to design engineers. Before KSA, Ken worked as an electrical engineer at General Dynamics on test systems for the F16, and at Northrop Grumman designing launch software for spacecraft. Ken graduated from The University of Texas at Austin with a degree in Electrical Engineering.

Also very important and devoted and talented team of: 

Mechanical Engineering Manager - Kevin Chivatakarn

Electrical Engineering Manager - Mike Calnan

Intellectual Property – Les Overman

Marketing & PR -  Zivile Powers


The Goal

  • We are looking for $20,000 to kick off production.
  • Expected delivery - January, 2015. 
  • Jump on the wagon with us for a great ride and enjoy lower price and be the first one to enjoy Automatic WiFi Pet Pal pet feeder together with your pet!


Simple, smart, and easy to use technology. Four years of ongoing improvements and testing. We are ready!

•  We want to share with you a great way to reach out to your pet when you not home, even just to say hi and give an extra treat.

•  Reliable, patent pending non jamming food hopper, sturdy stainless steel body topped with easy to use electronics. 

•  Best high-end automatic pet feeder on the market!

•  We have presented our Pet Pal in numerous dog parks and few shows, and after people see how Pet Pal works, everyone loves it and wants one.  Please help us to deliver this awesome pet feeder to you and your pet!

•  A must have for every pet owner that would like to spend more time interacting with their pet.

As Featured In:


What is in the box

All you need to start using the PetPal Automatic Wifi pet feeder - just download free Application (PeTreaT Feeder) from iTunes or Google Play and add your pet's favorite food!


Risks & Challenges

We have over 65 years of engineering and production experience among the PeTreaT team. We are confident we can make this happen for our backers, and we have lined up great suppliers that are chomping at the bit to start production. I would have to say the biggest hurdle is getting high quality stainless steel at a reasonable prices. And we will not compromise on quality.


Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please help us to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!


Compatibility

Appliance is compatible with all voltages (110-240V).
Compatible with majority Smartphones and tablets - Apple and Android operating systems. 
Good for indoors and outdoors, just has to be dry, covered place, like the patio.


Shipping 

Shipping is not included. We use major courier companies and we will ship to anywhere that they deliver (Purchasers are responsible for any VAT or customs duties levied by their own countries).


FAQ's

•  Q. How much does the PetPal automatic WiFi pet feeder weigh? 

A. The pet feeder weighs approximately 30 lbs (13.6 kg) with all heavy-duty stainless steel construction.

•  Q. How tall is the PetPal automatic WiFi pet feeder? 

A. The pet feeder is approximately 26 inches (66 cm), fully assembled

•  Q. How much food will the PetPal automatic WiFi pet feeder hold?

  A. The food reservoir holds approximately 15 lbs (50 cups) of food.

•  Q. How long is the PetPal automatic WiFi pet feeder warranty? 

A. There is a 1 year parts and labor limited warranty.

•  Q. Is the PetPal automatic WiFi pet feeder easy to fill with food? 

A. Yes! You can fill the food reservoir in mere seconds – simply remove the lid, pour the food into the food reservoir, replace the lid and then press the feed button on the lid until the food starts dispensing into the bowl. You’re all set to start enjoying your new PetPal automatic WiFi pet feeder!

•  Q. Is the PetPal automatic WiFi pet feeder dishwasher safe?

 A. Yes! The pet feeder uses all dishwasher-safe stainless steel construction which is easy and quick to clean and sanitize!

•  Q. What protection do I have against unwanted guests (skunks, raccoons or possums, etc) 

A. You’re protected from unwanted guests by multiple aspects! You can secure the lid with two retaining pins (included) to prevent unwanted guests from removing the lid to gain access to the food reservoir. Due to the unique patent-pending design of the PetPal automatic WiFi pet feeder, unwanted guests cannot reach the food reservoir from any openings of the pet feeder!

•  Q. What protection do I have against ants? 

A. Due to the unique patent-pending design of the PetPal automatic WiFi pet feeder, the food reservoir is suspended in the center of the outer shell offering protection against ants! Simply apply petroleum jelly on the food reservoir bridges for unparalleled protection against unwanted insects!


THANK YOU! 

Sincerely, Pet Pal team

story:
Thank you for a successful campaign! 

CustEx is a platform for Customers to co-create new products with large vendors, led by an x-acting COO of WDC. 



TRACTION:
August 2013: Pre-launched website and all social media pages.
Dec 2013: 95% of pc and mobile websites completed. Grew Silicon Valley team to 27, led by x-acting COO of WDC. Collecting pre-reg emails, likes, followers on FB, Tw, P, LI, G+, YT.
Funding Event: Successfully raised IGG donation funds. Contacted top 37 US online media ad buyer firms with 500+ buyers.

Has any product or service frustrated you? Introducing our Breakthrough CustEx Customer co-creation platform that lets you determine what future new or updated products are made in ANY category! We disrupt the status quo. Products [iWatch? ]. Services [better Cable programs? ]. By Vendors or Governments [to do only what the YOU - the 99% - want].

What is CustEx? What is CustEx? A place where you list your product improvement needs and we force changes on Vendors and Governments. We finally have THE platform to empower everybody worldwide.

video: How CustEx Forces Product Improvements for YOU!

Big Campaign: We speed up our launch here by sharing our vision with you and let YOU be a part of CustEx’s history to move new product and service Vendor & Government success rates from 5% to 95% with our proprietary co-creation platform that empowers Customers !

Blue Chip Leadership: I’m Daniel Curran Founder/CEO of CustEx, Silicon Valley technology social entrepreneur/exec, and visionary with 31 years experience focused on building billion $ companies that improve the world. Been involved in many startups as well as large companies, created many jobs, netted investors $170MM. Brought tech incubator USLab public on NASDAQ as CEO. Former Vice President, Strategic Planning, & acting COO, $13B Western Digital [NYSE: WDC] Connex – San Jose, CA. Integrity: 25 LinkedIn Recommendations in 290+ strong executive network. Our CTO, Michael Beck also has 30 years, our VP-Finance, Tina Rosen, has 17 years, along with 29 others across engineering, marketing, social media, finance, product management, and sales.

Business Model/RevenueTraction: We have assured our immediate cash flow once we launch by pro-actively pre-selling our projected ad inventory both directly to the top 37 media buyers in the US and making it available through major ad networks. When the hundreds of Vendors we know later start using our services, they will account for the 35% balance of our revenues. All Customer services at our website, except listings which are only paid when you complete a consult, are free and ad-supported.

Problem We Solve for YOU: If you have ever been unhappy with a product, service, CustEx is for YOU! If you want to obtain cash/fame helping say what goes into better products, we are for you.

Having designed products as a Mechanical Engineer, I cringe when a product feature fails due to poor design. I find fault with almost every product or service I use :). For example, I had to call Whirlpool/Amana recently and ask why my only-4 yr old washer is leaking from both the front door gasket and the bleach dispenser [see gallery photo]. It's not like its 10 yrs or 20 yrs old! Most companies bail on you after a year and incompetently design unreliable products to try to gouge you on service later - what a crappy business model to instill loyalty. This abuse must stop. They must be held accountable and begin to act on the real needs of Customers.

I come across products failures almost daily - here's a brand-new broken sprinkler head: failed due to poor design and materials choice - Solve this problem by listing a CustEx to tell the Vendor to improve it or lose market share. Let's SPRING into action!


Today, Vendors largely ignore what their Customers want, instead relying on a few 'design gods' within their company to dictate what products they will make. CustEx has the technology platform to first 'encourage' [and force] this change for products and services with the hundreds of relationships we have with product development executives at the Fortune 500 and the power players within government. 

Expected Massive Results: Raise entire US GDP from 2% to 3% and real employment to pre-2008 levels within 3 years, and ensure political stability worldwide by forcing change that benefits the 99%. This is truly the holy grail solution everyone alive has been waiting for! CustEx has been engineered from the ground up on a solid foundation that can scale very quickly into a billion dollar company like the operation run at WDC. We are not another silly copycat startup with no revenue plan. We fundamentally disrupt and improve the broken product development process that wastes enormous amounts of capital that could be used to hire YOU based on higher, more accurate demand.

What You Get:

The faster we get the above from you, the faster we can open up the platform to deliver products you need, not what the Vendor wrongly thinks you need, so you are happy. Development dollars saved go into more products you want, and allows you to have a long term relationship with any Vendor you want with the power only CustEx brings you. Earn cash talking to Vendors. Enjoy Vendor/e-retailer discounts. Become famous for your CustExes and reviews. Be part of the FIRST Customer social network. Possibilities are endless. See all the juicy perks below!

Impact: Unlike the many big ecommerce sites that only deal with products out today, CustEx is the only one that deals with the FUTURE and channels custex needs and reviews into the Vendors who cannot ignore them! We will be the world’s largest online product need and review platform empowering customers by letting them post their needs for all vendors to see and put into their upcoming products. CustEx also covers present products and lets Customers post and read reviews from other passionate customers or check when upcoming product features will come out.

What: Our 6 website calls to action are: find alternatives, suggest alternatives, list a CustEx, check CustEx status, and read/write reviews. Customers can carry their single sign-on identity as a credible Customer to major ecommerce sites where they will enjoy negotiating power and exclusive discounts offered by CustEx Vendors and e-tailers.

How: CustEx closes the gap between customer needs and vendor products in the marketplace for the first time in a transparent platform that forces vendors to compete. Vendors can be business or governmental entities. If vendors don’t address customer needs and review issues, they will lose market share to competitors. Gone are the days when vendors could ignore customers. With millions of registered customers and their personal UP/QR code interests/histories, vendors have to use CustEx to develop new products and services and save money through our proprietary, patent-pending need-market gap reduction ecosystem.

Perks: We have many different rewards or chances to participate in what we do! So get started below and please make history by contributing the most you can - CustEx is your business!

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can’t contribute much [every dollar counts], that doesn’t mean you can’t be part of this revolution for the 99%:

  • Ask friends to get the word out on our major social media websites and make some noise about our campaign!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • We're constantly hiring in all areas: engineering, marketing, social media, finance, product management, and sales - email us: coders at custex dot com with your area in the subject and IGG

CustEx – the next Big Thing! Join us online at CustEx.com and below.
story_txt:
Thank you for a successful campaign! CustEx is a platform for Customers to co-create new products with large vendors, led by an x-acting COO of WDC. 
TRACTION:August 2013: Pre-launched website and all social media pages.Dec 2013: 95% of pc and mobile websites completed. Grew Silicon Valley team to 27, led by x-acting COO of WDC. Collecting pre-reg emails, likes, followers on FB, Tw, P, LI, G+, YT.Funding Event: Successfully raised IGG donation funds. Contacted top 37 US online media ad buyer firms with 500+ buyers.
Has any product or service frustrated you? Introducing our Breakthrough CustEx Customer co-creation platform that lets you determine what future new or updated products are made in ANY category! We disrupt the status quo. Products [iWatch? ]. Services [better Cable programs? ]. By Vendors or Governments [to do only what the YOU - the 99% - want].
What is CustEx? What is CustEx? A place where you list your product improvement needs and we force changes on Vendors and Governments. We finally have THE platform to empower everybody worldwide.
video: How CustEx Forces Product Improvements for YOU!

Big Campaign: We speed up our launch here by sharing our vision
 with you
and let YOU be a part of CustEx’s history to move new product and 
service Vendor & Government success rates from 5%
to 95% with our proprietary co-creation platform that empowers Customers
!
Blue Chip Leadership: I’m Daniel Curran Founder/CEO of CustEx, Silicon Valley technology social entrepreneur/exec,
and visionary with 31 years experience focused on building billion $ companies that
improve the world. Been involved in many startups as well as large companies, created many jobs, netted
investors $170MM. Brought tech incubator USLab public on NASDAQ as CEO. Former Vice President,
Strategic Planning, & acting COO, $13B Western Digital [NYSE: WDC] Connex – San Jose,
CA. Integrity: 25 LinkedIn Recommendations in 290+ strong executive network. Our CTO, Michael Beck also has 30 years, our VP-Finance, Tina Rosen, has 17 years, along with 29 others across engineering, marketing, social media, finance, product management, and sales.Business Model/RevenueTraction: We have assured our immediate cash flow once we launch by pro-actively pre-selling our projected ad inventory both directly to the top 37 media buyers in the US and making it available through major ad networks. When the hundreds of Vendors we know later start using our services, they will account for the 35% balance of our revenues. All Customer services at our website, except listings which are only paid when you complete a consult, are free and ad-supported.
Problem We Solve for YOU: If you have ever been unhappy with a product, service, CustEx is for YOU! If you want to obtain cash/fame helping say what goes into better products, we are for you.Having designed products as a Mechanical Engineer, I cringe when a product feature fails due to poor design. I find fault with almost every product or service I use :). For example, I had to call Whirlpool/Amana recently and ask why my only-4 yr old washer is leaking from both the front door gasket and the bleach dispenser [see gallery photo]. It's not like its 10 yrs or 20 yrs old! Most companies bail on you after a year and incompetently design unreliable products to try to gouge you on service later - what a crappy business model to instill loyalty. This abuse must stop. They must be held accountable and begin to act on the real needs of Customers. I come across products failures almost daily - here's a brand-new broken sprinkler head: failed due to poor design and materials choice - Solve this problem by listing a CustEx to tell the Vendor to improve it or lose market share. Let's SPRING into action!Today, Vendors largely ignore what their Customers want, instead relying on a few 'design gods' within their company to dictate what products they will make. CustEx has the technology platform to first 'encourage' [and force] this change for products and services with the hundreds of
relationships we have with product development executives at the Fortune 500 and the power players within government. Expected Massive Results: Raise
entire US GDP from 2% to 3% and real employment
to pre-2008 levels within 3 years, and ensure political stability worldwide by
forcing change that benefits the 99%. This
is truly the holy grail solution everyone alive has been waiting for! CustEx has been
engineered from the ground up on a solid foundation that can scale very quickly
into a billion dollar company like the operation run at WDC. We are not another silly
copycat startup with no revenue plan. We fundamentally disrupt and improve the broken product development process that wastes enormous amounts of capital that could be used to hire YOU based on higher, more accurate demand.What You Get:The
faster we get the above from you, the faster we can open up the platform to
deliver products you need, not what the Vendor wrongly thinks you need, so you
are happy. Development dollars saved go into more products you want, and allows you to
have a long term relationship with any Vendor you want with the power only CustEx
brings you. Earn cash talking to Vendors. Enjoy Vendor/e-retailer discounts. Become famous for your CustExes and
reviews. Be part of the FIRST Customer social network. Possibilities are endless. See all the juicy perks below!
Impact: Unlike the many big ecommerce sites
that only deal with products out today,
CustEx is the only one that deals with the FUTURE and channels custex needs and reviews into the Vendors who cannot ignore them! We will be the world’s largest online product need and review
platform empowering customers by letting them post their needs for all vendors
to see and put into their upcoming products. CustEx also covers present
products and lets Customers post and read reviews from other passionate
customers or check when upcoming product features will come out. 
What: Our 6 website calls to action
are: find alternatives, suggest alternatives, list a CustEx, check CustEx status, and read/write reviews. Customers can carry their single sign-on identity as a credible Customer
to major ecommerce sites where they will enjoy negotiating power and exclusive discounts
offered by CustEx Vendors and e-tailers.

story:
SPART SPRIT - SCHONT DIE UMWELT - MIT ULTIMATE CELL


HURRA ES IST GESCHAFFT !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

SEIT 17.10.2014 HABEN WIR DAS INTERNATIONALE E-PRÜFZEICHEN !!!

DAS BEDEUTET, DASS WIR AB MITTE NOVEMBER MIT DEM VERKAUF VON ULTIMATE CELL BEGINNEN KÖNNEN !!!!!!!!!


Stell dir vor du hättest die Möglichkeit mit einer kleinen Investition großes zu bewegen.
Du könntest beim Autofahren bis zu 30% Kraftstoff sparen  - und nicht nur das -
gleichzeitig würdest du 50 - 80% weniger Schadstoffausstoß produzieren.
Das hilft der Umwelt und kommt gleichzeitig deinem Geldbeutel zugute.

DER UMWELT ZULIEBE -

ULTIMATE CELL

Wie das gehen soll ???


Ganz einfach:
Mitte November starten wir die Markteinführung von ULTIMATE CELL in Deutschland, einem  Gerät das für Benzin und Dieselmotoren gleichermaßen geeignet ist.


ULTIMATE CELL wird in PKW, LKW, Bussen, Generatoren , Booten, Land-und Baumaschinen, Diesellokomotiven ..., kurz Verbrennungsmotoren bis zu 40 Liter Hubraum, verbaut.


Ultimate Cell produziert geringe Mengen an Wasserstoff, gibt diese über den Luftansaugtrakt des Fahrzeugs in den Brennraum des Motors ab und dient dort als Katalysator für eine bessere, effektivere Verbrennung.
Das Gerät ist Wartungsfrei. Eine Füllung reicht für 70.000 km Laufleistung beim KFZ oder 2.000 Stunden Dauerbetrieb bei Booten und Generatoren .
Danach lassen sie es einfach von ihrerm Ultimate Cell Fachhändler auffüllen und fahren die nächsten 70.000 km.
Wenn sie ihr Fahrzeug verkaufen möchten, bauen wir ihnen ihre Ultimate Cell einfach aus und in ihr neues Fahrzeug wieder ein.-

VERBRENNUNG OHNE ULTIMATE CELL


VERBRENNUNG MIT ULTIMATE CELL


Der Einbau von ULTIMATE CELL führt nachweislich zu einer
Kraftstoffeinsparung von bis zu 30 %
bei gleichzeitiger
Reduzierung des Schadstoffausstoßes von bis zu 80 % .

Partikelfilter und Katalysatoren setzen sich nicht mehr so schnell zu - das bedeutet weniger Regenerationsfahrten.
Keine Carbon und Teflonablagerungen mehr im Motor - ihr Motor läuft ruhiger und lebt länger.


Ultimate Cell wird schon in vielen Ländern der Welt mit wachsendem Erfolg vertrieben und wird nun nach ausgiebigen Tests die E - Zertifizierung erhalten und somit auch in Deutschland verkauft werden dürfen.

HURRA ES IST GESCHAFFT !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

SEIT 17.10.2014 HABEN WIR DAS INTERNATIONALE E-PRÜFZEICHEN !!!

DAS BEDEUTET, DASS WIR AB MITTE NOVEMBER MIT DEM VERKAUF VON ULTIMATE CELL BEGINNEN KÖNNEN !!!!!!!!!

Wir werden in Kürze ein Händlernetzwerk, verteilt auf die gesamte Bundesrepublik etablieren, dass aus ca. 1000 Distributoren bestehen wird.
Die Distributoren werden von uns speziell im Einbau von ULTIMATE CELL  geschult und diese dann in ihrer jeweiligen Region verbauen.


ULTIMATE CELL WIRD NICHT ÜBER DEN INTERNETHANDEL O.Ä. VERTRIEBEN WERDEN !!!

Ultimate Cell wird AUSSCHLIESSLICH von unseren Distributoren verkauft und eingebaut !!!

ACHTUNG !!! ACHTUNG !!! ACHTUNG !!! ACHTUNG!!! ACHTUNG!!! ACHTUNG

Da wir nur die Vertriebsrechte für DEUTSCHLAND  haben, dürfen wir auch nur in DEUTSCHLAND die Geräte verbauen !!!

 Das bedeutet:

BONUS/PERKS DIE GERÄTE BETREFFEND GELTEN NUR FÜR DEUTSCHLAND

Welche Vorteile hast du von deiner Unterstützung ?

Sobald die Distributoren im Einbau von ULTIMATE CELL ausgebildet sind, geht der Verkauf auch in deiner Nähe los.


Das Gerät für PKW bis 3.000 ccm Hubraum wird dann € 499.- inkl. Einbau kosten.
Lkw und Transporter beginnen ab € 599.- , abhängig vom Hubraum des Motors.

Wenn du ULTIMATE CELL in einem LKW oder großem PKW oder Boot nutzen willst, werden wir dir den Preis für dein individuelles System errechnen und per email mitteilen.  Melde dich hierzu unter info@ultimatecell.de


 TESTFAHRER GESUCHT

Wir suchen umweltbewusste Menschen, die uns helfen ULTIMATE CELL bekannt zu machen und anderen beweisen, dass man wirklich bis zu 30% Sprit spart und bis zu 80% weniger Schadstoffe erzeugt.

Dazu brauchen wir deine Tankquittungen und die dazugehörigen Kilometerstände, anhand deren wir deinen Durchschnittsverbrauch ermitteln können.

Als Belohnung für deine Mühe bekommst  du deine ULTIMATE CELL für PKW bis 3.000 ccm Hubraum  oder ein für dein Fahrzeug passendes Spritsparsystem inkl. Einbau mit  einem RABATT VON  20% .

NICHT VERGESSEN  DAS GILT NUR FÜR DEN EINBAU IN DEUTSCHLAND !!!
ES WERDEN KEINE GERÄTE IN ANDERE LÄNDER GELIEFERT !!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Wenn du selbst kein Auto, Boot oder ähnliches hast, kannst du ULTIMATE CELL natürlich auch verschenken.

Erzähle deinen Freunden von ULTIMATE CELL - nur gemeinsam können wir beim Umweltschutz etwas bewegen.

Spart Kraftstoff  - Schont die Umwelt - Besser fahren mit  ULTIMATE CELL


SEIT  7.10.2014 IST UNSERE DEUTSCHE WEBSEITE ONLINE, DORT BEKOMMT IHR WEITERE INFORMATIONEN ZU ULTIMATE CELL.

 www.ultimatecell.de

story:
Help us fund an effective and targeted election campaign in East Dunbartonshire. We can show the Lib Dem incumbent the door and send Ross Greer to Westminster, an MP who will stand up to the failed austerity agenda and reject the scapegoating of immigrants and the vulnerable which has dominated UK politics.

A Green MP in Westminster will work for:

  • A Living Wage now, rising to at least £10 by 2020
  • Public ownership of our railways
  • A rejection of TTIP, the trade agreement which would open our NHS to privatisation by US corporations

Anything you can give is appreciated and will be used to maximise the Green vote in East Dunbartonshire:

  • £15 will pay for 1500 campaign cards
  • £50 funds a targeted mailing to first-time voters in key areas
  • £100 covers our campaign launch weekend
story_txt:

We can show the Lib Dem incumbent the door and send Ross Greer to Westminster, an MP who will stand up to the failed austerity agenda and reject the scapegoating of immigrants and the vulnerable which has dominated UK politics.A Green MP in Westminster will work for:
A Living Wage now, rising to at least £10 by 2020
Public ownership of our railways

A rejection of TTIP, the trade agreement which would open our NHS to privatisation by US corporations

£100 covers our campaign launch weekend

story:
1. Our Story

1.1 Analog and digital both have their own strengths.

When it comes to a traditional paper planner, it is the natural way to plan your days, weeks, or months. It is needless to say that digital is versatile, it will keep track of your schedule on your behalf. Here are the top 5 things you be benefiting from each side.

 

We have been working on a solution to take advantage of both sides, and we call it “smart planner”. It is our 4th year of creating a smart planner. It means the planner has been elaborated for 4 years to give better experiences those for who want to enjoy writing on a paper with digital conveniences.

 

2. An ordinary paper enabled

 

2.1 This system comes with a Neo smartpen and smart planner. 
Neo smartpen is a ballpoint pen with electronic components embedded into. It reads out the tiny code printed on the smart planner 2021 which tells the position of the page and what type of action to be done when the content is written over.  

 

 

Imagine that you wake up in the morning, you are scheduling your day with pen and paper while having your favorite cup of coffee or tea and music. You don't need to look at your phone. No hassle, no distraction. it will be a blessing for the whole day.

[Neo smartpen M1 Promotion video]

2.2 Media coverage

In the course of our journey, we have been exposed to a variety of media around the world. 
Thanks to our neo smartpen users, they made us come this far.

3. Analog blended with digital

Once you have done with your schedule.  Synchronize your pen to the App; Neo Studio.  
When your writing is transferred to Neo Studio. it will synchronize your calendar events to your designated digital calendar such as iCal, Google or Outlook.

 

3.1 Analog interacts with digital

You will encounter one of the below icons in the planner, it is what we called "PUI-Paper User Interface". It is an icon that triggers a predefined action.

5 PUIs are introduced in this planner system which enriches the usage of the planner in the digital era.

3.2Write on paper with magical results

Through our extensive user interview, we realized that people want to selectively send some of his or her calendar events to digital.
Here is how the daily planner treated with your paper privacy.

 

If you want to send the event to digital. you can tick the calendar icon. it will be on your digital calendar magically.

 
 
 

3.3Répondez s'il vous plaît - let's keep you posted

Synchronizing the digital calendars isn't the only thing you can do with this system.  Tick on the share icon enable your event to send to your family and friends.

 

3.4Share your idea

The planner has plenty of pages where you can jot down your thoughts and ideas.

A memo page is divided into four and each section can be separated shared to your favorite destination.
 

3.5Instant Google search

Throughout our user interviews and analytics, we realized many people use the pen while the pen is connected to the App; Neo Studio. They are using a phone as a mirroring device of their paper. So we decided to add features that help them to focus on their work.

When you have your own ideation or co-creation session with your teammates, you probably have your pen in your fingers and write something down.  All of sudden, if you want to search for something from the web. you need to switch back & forth the app. 
We were thinking what if we add an icon that triggers to pop up Google search. Voila, this is the icon short-cutting Google search.

 

3.6Hashtag to organize better

In the same manner, you can also evoke the Hashtags menu of Neo Studio. 

4. Plan and control your way

4.1 Plan your months
Here's what the monthly page looks like. We add special functions to each section of the monthly layout. You can even share the entire month of your plan. 

4.2 Plan your weeks
We spent lots of time to design this weekly layout which contains;

  • Weekly goal tracker
  • Calendar event - 3 slots for each day. 
  • Memo area

As you can see, when you open up the planner you see the entire week at once. There are lots of control points where you can make it digitally doable. Moreover, a large portion of memo space gives you a day-to-today memo in your weekly spread.

 

4.3 Cope with your thoughts and ideas

Your ideas come with any notice.  Pen and paper will be the best tools to record your thoughts and idea. We prepared four types of memo layouts to meet your occasions.

5. Planner Bundle information

Two bundle packages are available for the campaign.

5.1 Big planner bundle package:

  • B5(176 x 250mm or 6.9 x 9.8 inches) sized planner x 1
  • Free pocket-sized mini planner x 1
  • Neo smartpen M1(Navy) x 1

 

 

5.2 Medium planner bundle package

  • A5(148 x 210 mm or 5.8 x 8.3 inches) sized planner x 1
  • Free pocket-sized mini planner x 1
  • Neo smartpen M1(Navy) x 1

 

 

 

6. Have it your way

Writing on this planner means that you are creating a softcopy of your planner on your phone. Since it is a digitally reconstructed, it now becomes

  • Searchable
  • Organizable by hashtags or bookmark
  • Shareable
  • Editable

You can features that digital can give.

 

7. Who uses this planner system

Those who need a digital detox
If you are having trouble with memorizing your schedules, It is the time to digital detox. It was proven that writing stuff down helps you to memorize it better. But there’s more to that. Writing by hand makes us formulate our plans and to-do’s better.

Paper planner lovers
You can keep your way of writing down on your planner, we can add a digital convenience on your behalf.

 

8. Timeline

9. About NeoLAB

NeoLAB strives to make a bridge between analog and digital. We introduce, what we called, a smartpen that it will seamlessly connect a pen and digital devices. We believe analog has an unreplaceable value, and try to make the best out of it.

We have been growing with our users. Please support us to build a better solution that beneficial to all of us. 
For more information, please check:

https://www.neosmartpen.com/

instagram: https://www.instagram.com/neo_smartpen_worldwide/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnxPxQgoK-1CJWWzfxu9svw

 

10. Our journey with Indiegogo.

We have successfully completed our first Indiegogo campaign in the beginning of 2020

This is our second journey which shows our devotion for making the best out of filling the gap between analog and digital.

[Neo smartpen M1 Promotion video]
2.2 Media coverage
In the course of our journey, we have been exposed to a variety of media around the world. Thanks to our neo smartpen users, they made us come this far.

3. Analog blended with digital

Once you have done with your schedule.  Synchronize your pen to the App; Neo Studio.  When your writing is transferred to Neo Studio. it will synchronize your calendar events to your designated digital calendar such as iCal, Google or Outlook.

 
3.1 Analog interacts with digital
You will encounter one of the below icons in the planner, it is what we called "PUI-Paper User Interface". It is an icon that triggers a predefined action.

5 PUIs are introduced in this planner system which enriches the usage of the planner in the digital era.
3.2Write on paper with magical results
Through our extensive user interview, we realized that people want to selectively send some of his or her calendar events to digital.Here is how the daily planner treated with your paper privacy.

 
If you want to send the event to digital. you can tick the calendar icon. it will be on your digital calendar magically.
 
 
 
3.3Répondez s'il vous plaît - let's keep you posted
Synchronizing the digital calendars isn't the only thing you can do with this system.  Tick on the share icon enable your event to send to your family and friends.

 
3.4Share your idea The planner has plenty of pages where you can jot down your thoughts and ideas.

A memo page is divided into four and each section can be separated shared to your favorite destination. 
3.5Instant Google search Throughout our user interviews and analytics, we realized many people use the pen while the pen is connected to the App; Neo Studio. They are using a phone as a mirroring device of their paper. So we decided to add features that help them to focus on their work.

When you have your own ideation or co-creation session with your teammates, you probably have your pen in your fingers and write something down.  All of sudden, if you want to search for something from the web. you need to switch back & forth the app. We were thinking what if we add an icon that triggers to pop up Google search. Voila, this is the icon short-cutting Google search.
 
3.6Hashtag to organize better
In the same manner, you can also evoke the Hashtags menu of Neo Studio. 

4. Plan and control your way
4.1 Plan your monthsHere's what the monthly page looks like. We add special functions to each section of the monthly layout. You can even share the entire month of your plan. 

4.2 Plan your weeksWe spent lots of time to design this weekly layout which contains;

Weekly goal tracker
Calendar event - 3 slots for each day. 
Memo area


As you can see, when you open up the planner you see the entire week at once. There are lots of control points where you can make it digitally doable. Moreover, a large portion of memo space gives you a day-to-today memo in your weekly spread.
 
4.3 Cope with your thoughts and ideas
Your ideas come with any notice.  Pen and paper will be the best tools to record your thoughts and idea. We prepared four types of memo layouts to meet your occasions.
5. Planner Bundle information
Two bundle packages are available for the campaign.
5.1 Big planner bundle package:

B5(176 x 250mm or 6.9 x 9.8 inches) sized planner x 1
Free pocket-sized mini planner x 1
Neo smartpen M1(Navy) x 1

 

 
5.2 Medium planner bundle package

A5(148 x 210 mm or 5.8 x 8.3 inches) sized planner x 1
Free pocket-sized mini planner x 1
Neo smartpen M1(Navy) x 1

 

 
 
6. Have it your way
Writing on this planner means that you are creating a softcopy of your planner on your phone. Since it is a digitally reconstructed, it now becomes

Searchable
Organizable by hashtags or bookmark
Shareable
Editable

You can features that digital can give.



 
7. Who uses this planner system
Those who need a digital detoxIf you are having trouble with memorizing your schedules, It is the time to digital detox. It was proven that writing stuff down helps you to memorize it better. But there’s more to that. Writing by hand makes us formulate our plans and to-do’s better.
Paper planner loversYou can keep your way of writing down on your planner, we can add a digital convenience on your behalf.
 
8. Timeline

9. About NeoLAB
NeoLAB strives to make a bridge between analog and digital. We introduce, what we called, a smartpen that it will seamlessly connect a pen and digital devices. We believe analog has an unreplaceable value, and try to make the best out of it.
We have been growing with our users. Please support us to build a better solution that beneficial to all of us. For more information, please check:
https://www.neosmartpen.com/
instagram: https://www.instagram.com/neo_smartpen_worldwide/
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnxPxQgoK-1CJWWzfxu9svw
 
10. Our journey with Indiegogo.
We have successfully completed our first Indiegogo campaign in the beginning of 2020

This is our second journey which shows our devotion for making the best out of filling the gap between analog and digital.

story:
We are raising money to pay for the app development. Any funds raised beyond our goal will be used for marketing the app.

The Concept

Find out about all the "Places To Go & People To Know" in your local area. PlacesandPeople will be the most convenient way to find out about current and upcoming events in cities across the US and around the world. It is designed to be a valuable tool for travelers, as well as locals who want to stay connected with what's going on in their communities. 

Our goal is to create a great service that makes people's lives easier, while providing an affordable platform that allows small businesses to advertise to customers in their area.

Business, Attractions, & Events

Enjoy the best your city has to offer with PlacesandPeople. All you have to do is scan a QR code and you'll have local information on your smartphone or mobile device. This app keeps your finger on the pulse of business and entertainment, featuring information on the most popular events and attractions, including: 

• Night Clubs
• Casinos
• Fine Dining & Restaurants
• Clothing Stores
• Hotels
• Barbershops/Salons
• Theaters
• Gyms
• Malls/Outlets		 • Conventions
• Venues
• Sporting Events
• Celebrity Events
• Charitable Events
• DJ's
• Local Bands
• Artists
• Book Writers
• Jewelers
• Photographers
• Run/Marathons
• Amusement Parks
• Small Business Owners
• Realtor 
 • Comedians
• Designers
• Doctors
• Dentists
• Lawyers
• Concerts

PlacesandPeople will also offer clients the opportunity  to post their events on the app at a very low cost. We are confident that posting an event on the app will turn into a big opportunity of exposure and traffic to our client's events.

story:
H2Joe is a travel coffee mug and reusable water bottle combined into one amazing bottle.

Get the jolt you need from your morning joe, while ensuring you keep yourself healthy and hydrated through your workday - all from one bottle!

Bring your coffee with you in the morning, while staying hydrated throughout your day.

We get it. You need your delicious hot coffee to stay awake and get you through the day, and you need your water to, well, stay healthy and live. But bringing both your coffee mug and water bottle is a huge hassle.

That’s why we created H2Joe. We wanted a bottle that allowed us to carry coffee AND water without having to juggle between bottles.

The coffee had to stay hot, and the water had to stay cold. And there had to be enough to keep us hydrated and energized.

To drink your coffee, flip open the cap and drink from the sip friendly opening.

 To drink your water, unscrew the cap and drink from the traditional water spout.

Sip or swig? With H2Joe, you get both.

Not only does your coffee stay hot and water stay cold, you’ll be able to sip your coffee AND swig your water comfortably and exactly the way it was meant to be - without any hassle!

The water and coffee compartments are isolated and insulated to ensure their temperatures don’t affect each other.

H2Joe’s patent-pending lid comes with two distinct openings. One for coffee. And another for water.

The coffee opening pops open to allow for easy and safe sipping. While the water cap unscrews to allow for a quick swig.

H2Joe is easy to fill. Each compartment has its own large mouth opening with a leak-proof seal to prevent unwanted spills.

The coffee holder unscrews from the bottom to reveal the mouth opening. The water container is simply filled by removing the top lid.

Our coffee compartment is a 12oz container on the bottom half of the bottle. The compartment is vacuum sealed with double walled insulation and is made from 304 Food Grade Stainless Steel. Best of all, it keeps your coffee hot for up to 6 hours.

To refill, simply unscrew the compartment and fill through the large opening. Screw it back on and you’re ready to go!

Our water compartment is a 12oz container on the upper half of the bottle. The compartment is triple-insulated to keep your water cold for 8 hours and is made with BPA-Free Food Safe Polypropylene.

To refill, unscrew the top lid and fill through the large top opening. Screw it back on and stay hydrated throughout your day!

Because each compartment can be easily detached and provides a large mouth opening, cleaning the H2Joe is extremely easy and effective.

Simply unscrew the coffee holder to wash it out.

The water compartment can be easily accessed through the large mouth opening after you unscrew the top lid.

H2Joe is also completely dishwasher safe! Take apart the different compartments, put them in the dishwasher, and you’re good for your next workday!

We made H2Joe so we could stay on top of our hydration and health as we powered through our work day. So naturally, we made H2Joe with only the safest, highest quality food grade materials such as 304 food-safe stainless steel and BPA-free plastics.

From the upper lid & exterior shell to the water container & insulation, H2Joe is completely 100% BPA Free.

The coffee compartment is made from 304 food-grade stainless steel - the same material used in professional and industrial cookware and kitchens.

This means your coffee is not only safe from toxic elements but will maintain its original taste.

 

Whether you’re commuting to work, hopping between trains, or simply powering through the day, H2Joe lets you stay hydrated and energized, without compromise.

Get your morning kick before your 9 am call, take a refreshing swig before a meeting, and do it all from one bottle.

 

While starting a family company back in 2012, Brett and his wife, Dorothy, fell in love with drinking coffee. But, there was one problem they didn’t anticipate… how to carry both their coffee and water around at the same time. Carrying two bottles was a hassle.

Over the years, as the coffee got consumed, their new addiction gave Dorothy an idea… “someone needs to invent a bottle that holds coffee and water at the same time”.

They didn’t exactly jump on a solution, but by 2017, Dorothy’s patience was running out. “Are we going to develop this coffee/water bottle or not? I need this thing in my life!”

It was then that Brett introduced the idea to John, his longtime friend, and colleague. Between them, they share more than 50 years of product and marketing success, having sold $1B+ in products at wholesale for various companies. This, however, was an opportunity to build a product for themselves they were personally passionate about!

The vision of creating the ultimate coffee and water bottle started in May of 2017, and after countless “cups of joe”, late nights and prototypes, has finally become a reality. 

On behalf of our team, we want to thank you for your support and can’t wait for you to meet H2Joe.

We want to say "Thank You" to the following coffee fanatics who supported us along the way, helping make H2Joe a reality. We couldn’t have done it without you!

story:
The All-in-One Utility Knife

Perfect Cut is a set of desktop tools that performs versatile cuts on sheet materials with thickness like cardboard, foam core, leather, and cloth. The specially designed cutter together with four minutely adjustable modules offers precise control on angle and depth of cutting to save time and increase stability. It adopts conventional 9mm snap-off blades and Perfect Cut customized blades.

 

 

 

Simple, Fast, Precise

Parents can make unique costumes for kids' Halloween party; modelers could do jobs quicker; designers would be able to make sketch models easier and accelerate the design process.

 

 

Vari-Angle Cutting

The Vari-Angle module could be adjusted for various cuts. It controls the angle of cutting down to a 5-degree interval. With the snap-off cutter, the cutting depth can also be controlled.

 

 

 

 

 

Circle Cutting

Compass cutter, which could be operated with a single hand, is capable of radius between 6 and 25 cm.

 

 

45° Cutting

The 45° module helps users to keep their blade 45° inclined to the surface of the material while cutting along a ruler or cutting a spline free-handed.

 

 

 

 

90° Cutting

The 90° module helps users to keep their blade perpendicular to the surface of the material while cutting along a ruler or cutting a spline free-handed.

 

 

 

Snap-Off Cutter

Special designed snap-off blade cutter uses both Perfect Cut customized blades and conventional 9mm blades. It could be used for both left or right-handed and holds the blade firmly.

 

 

 

Different from the previous model, we created the 45-degree blade so that the tip won't break easily and at the same time allows you to make precise cuts.

You can select the Indiegogo Extra perk to get 1 set of Perfect Cut and 1 pack of customized blades.

 

30cm Ruler

There will be four models of the 30cm/12" ruler:

  • Acrylic ruler in the metric system

  • Aluminum ruler in the metric system

  • Acrylic ruler in Imperial units

  • Aluminum ruler in Imperial units

You'll choose one among them.

 

The 60cm ruler is compatible with the 45°, 90°, and vari-angle module. It can’t be use with the compass module.

You can select the Indiegogo Premium perk to get 1 set of Perfect Cut, 1 pack of customized blades and a 60cm ruler.

There will be two models of the 60cm/24" ruler:

  • Acrylic ruler in the metric system  

  • Acrylic ruler in Imperial units

You'll choose one among them.

※ Artworks are work in progress, minor change will apply.

 

Cutting Materials

 

Timeline

At this moment the injection molds are almost ready (minor modification will apply.) We are working on the ruler and the customized blade.

 

Perfect Cut Specs

 

More Examples

 

Thank You for Your Support

To everyone who backed and feedbacked the project – thank you. Your support and constructive feedback make Perfect Cut and Polarlab a reality, has changed my life, and now changing others’. The project started in Dec 2014 when I was a design student and was one of my degree projects. Moreover, now Perfect Cut got a chance to be real after years of developing and refining.

This campaign is about more than designing and backing a project. It’s a business model and a good way for designers or anyone who has an idea to be evaluated and realized as a product. In term of business, crowdfunding allows us not to compromise the functionality and creativity of the product, and in this case, we could treat our communities, backers, partners and our team (of 2 people) as peers.

Once again, thank you for your occupation, and we will continuously look to you, our community, for feedback and direction. Enjoy cutting :)

 

About PolarLab  

We are makers, designers, and engineers. We explore the intersection of function, beauty, and intelligence of products. We investigate how products are conceived, made, traded, and used. We believe there are ample opportunities off the well-trodden paths of design and we are out to explore them. Our process is underpinned by intellectual rigor and direct research. We are crowdfunded in 2017 after we did our 1st campaign in Taiwan.

 

Risks and Challenges

Our team have done a crowdfunding project and successfully delivered. Although there was a delay of a month, we did give our backers full transparency into the issues and how we solved them, and we will continue doing so.

However, this is our first time to make an aluminum extrusion component, and we can predict that unexpected issues can happen, so we have set some buffer on our schedule. But we are sure that we will deliver and keep you updated.
