story:
Following a successful funding campaign you can pre-order your Flipclip here!

FLIPCLIP offers quick and easy access to your stationery wherever you may need it. Whether on the move or at a desk, FLIPCLIP can be attached securely to any of your favourite notebooks – so your pens and pencils are always to hand!. And when your notebook’s finished just clip it onto your next one – and you’re away!

 

 

 

Using the clip/hinge mechanism FLIPCLIP can attach to the cover of any book, clipboard, ring binder and so on – of any size! And once FLIPCLIP is attached – any notebook (or similar) can be laid out flat, providing handy access to stationery.

Opening

Fits pens/pencils from 7mm to 15mm diameter

Locking to cover

New colour range to include Blue and Red

Versatility was very important to us when we were designing FLIPCLIP many variations were created to make sure it could work well and efficiently in different environments, whether in a board meeting, hiking up a mountain or that daily commute, FLIPCLIP has been designed to give you the flexibility to use where ever you may need a pen and paper.

 

 

 

From the beginning the goal has simply been to make a product that enhances the experience of using a notebook, Throughout the last 5 or so years consistent experimentation and redesign has led to this product . - FLIPCLIP, which we believe has become a product that will not only enhance your experience but will also be a pleasure to use.

In summary: 

FLIPCLIP offers quick and easy access to your stationery wherever you may need it.

Inspiration can strike at any time - so make sure your notebook has a FLIPCLIP!

FLIPCLIP - Stationery, on the move.

 

We really hope you have enjoyed this project! - If you have why not share with your friends - Please click on the social media buttons below - this will be a really great help to increase our community and make FLIPCLIP a reality. 

 

Risks and challenges

1) Quality control

We will ensure that all FLIPCLIPS are shipped to you to the highest standard - no FLIPCLIP will leave the factory without being personally checked.

2) Delay to shipment

We will post regular updates to keep you in loop throughout the process, and if any unforeseen delays do occur we will endeavour to work with our suppliers to resolve any issues as quickly as possible - however this product has been designed to be very efficient to build so we don't really envisage any delays in meeting our targets.

story:
Introducing Mirror Mimic:

Enhancing Your Video Presentations and Training with Augmented Reality

At Fused Realities, Inc. we strive to create software that increases your productivity and your capabilities. With Mirror Mimic, we want to put the power of Augmented Reality to work on your video presentations and training. This program gives you the tools to quickly and easily insert yourself into any video on Windows or Android platforms. Videos can come from a local source saved to your device or from an internet URL. All you need is a webcam and Mirror Mimic will do the rest.

Once your videos and webcam are added, your webcam stream will be superimposed over the video. At this point you can adjust the transparency of the webcam so that either you or the background is more visible. You can play the video back windowed or in full screen and directly follow along. Mirror Mimic also comes with an alignment tool to precisely match yourself up with a location in the video. 

By overlaying yourself onto videos, you can give presentations that are far more personal, interactive and understandable. A great deal of human communication comes from facing who you are speaking and making eye contact with your audience. With Mirror Mimic, you can easily achieve this as you can see the presentation information yourself while still looking directly into the camera. You can point to and highlight important points while never getting in the audience’s way. Text and visuals in the background video are still clearly visible at all times while you are presenting semi transparently.

This transparent overlay can also bring benefits to using instructional and training videos. Mirror Mimic’s video alignment tool allows you follow along with expert videos and walkthroughs. After a short sequence where you line up the instructor in the background video with yourself in the webcam. Mirror Mimic will automatically adjust and scale the background video so that you are directly imposed over the expert in the video. Now you can mimic their movements and learn directly from a pro with instant feedback about how closely you can match their technique.. Mirror Mimic training can bring benefits to sports training, yoga, karaoke, learning sign language, dancing and almost anything else you can find with an expert video.

The Development Campaign

As you can see, Mirror Mimic already has a lot of functionality and benefits to bring users. The software is already developed for use on Windows and Android, and with your support we hope to bring it to iOS devices as well. Contributing to this campaign will bring the benefits of Mirror Mimic to even more people and allow you to claim some exciting rewards. All donation options include Mirror Mimic Pro. This pro version comes with all the functionality and useful features discussed with the addition of the watermark removed from the video screen. You can claim a copy for yourself for just $2, or get multiple copies for friends, family or coworkers for $10 or $20. Additionally, very generous donations will get you associated with the development and release of Mirror Mimic. A $500 donation will get you named in the program credits as an official backer. A donation of $2,000 that fully funds the campaign will make you an official sponsor and your company logo will be added to the Mirror Mimic brand as thanks for your significant contribution.

Going Forward

Any sort of contribution to this campaign will get even more people using and seeing the benefits Mirror Mimic brings to training and presentations. Even if you can’t donate directly, taking a few seconds to share this campaign with friends, coworkers or on social media would be essential to its success. Your support will allow us to continue developing our project with new functionality to help even more users. Even if our donation goals aren’t met in full, any funds received will go towards moving Mirror Mimic to new platforms and improving the existing software. Thanks for your time and attention, and we hope you’ll consider supporting and using Mirror Mimic.

story:
Summary

(日本語は英語ページの下の方に書いてあります)

[PHP sample] 　[Python sample] 
Complete all processes necessary to produce hardware using only mille-feuille. Mille-feuille is a support tool that allows even someone with no previous knowledge of hardware to automatically create electronic schematics and specialized firmware (The created schematic does not contain the circuits of the mille-feuille device itself). It is used in connection with a Raspberry Pi A+, B+ or 2.

With its automatic wiring function, mille-feuille sets up everything for you without any need for soldering – including firmware used to operate your hardware. All the user has to do is write an simple operation program in PHP or Python without difficult firmware.[PHP sample] 　[Python sample] The last step is to use the automatic schematic creation tool and upload information about the device connected to mille-feuille to our server. A schematic for wiring the Raspberry Pi and device, without the mille-feuille’s own circuits, is then created when you import the EAGLE CAD Script generated by the server into your CAD application.

Mille-feuille serves as your hardware engineer, and makes prototype development easy for everyone.


Components


15 types of device board

To begin with there will be 15 types of device board:


Open source software and open hardware (Device board)

Automatically generated schematics that do not include mille-feuille’s automatic wiring function can be freely used as open hardware and open source software.

Patents

A patent on the mille-feuille system has been obtained in the United States. Applications for patents in other countries have been filed.

Target

  • For WEB programmers

 Mille-feuille makes it possible for programmers to create prototypes just by layering circuits, and since it also lets them automatically generate custom schematics and specialized firmware, mille-feuille enables programmers to quickly complete pre-production prototypes without having to involve hardware engineers.

  • For hardware engineers: Speed up hardware design

Mille-feuille enables hardware engineers to respond to design changes just by replacing modules. It also makes it easy to output schematic outlines.

Development example



Detail of mille-feuille boards


Automatic wiring function

1. When mille-feuille is initialized, it establishes what devices are connected and where based on the ID number saved on the device board’s ROM and the confirmation signal from the module boards.

2. Multiple multiplexer* circuits (digital swtches) are installed on mille-feuille’s baseboard for wiring switching. Wiring can be carried out in accordance with the device board being used.(*Multiplexer is just digital switches, Users do not use like FPGA Verilog. It is completely different. )


3. The mille-feuille module board is equipped with a quad bus switch. By opening a bus, a connection to the designated device can be wired. This makes it possible to connect to only the designated device even when multiple module boards are vertically stacked.




Automatic Schematic Creation Tool

This tool creates a schematic and corresponding firmware (fixed wire) that does not include any of the circuits involved in mille-feuille's own automatic wiring function.

The mille-feuille software application determines what devices are connected. This information is then uploaded to the mille-feuille servers. An optimal schematic and corresponding firmware are then automatically generated on the server. The schematic can then be automatically drawn once it is imported into EAGLE CAD. It is possible to do the PCB artwork corresponding to the board you want to use on the completed schematic yourself, and since the schematic can be used as a specification it is also possible to have someone else do the PCB artwork for you.

The created schematic does not contain the circuits of the mille-feuille device itself.


Perks


Schedule


History and Future Aims

Development of the mille-feuille system began in the summer of 2014. While receiving requests for prototypes as a hardware engineer, we noticed that a lot of time was being lost as a result of change after change being made to the design. Communicating back and forth with software engineers also took up a lot of time, and software engineers were inevitably forced to wait for operation verification on the hardware side. We realized that the speed of development could be greatly increased if the process all the way up to operation confirmation could be conducted by software engineers on their own.

When it comes to development, speed is everything. We also believe that making things should be as simple and easy as possible. Having to read large volumes of data sheets and sample schematics in order to realize an idea will always take up more time than you have, requiring measures like the hiring of additional employees, and constitutes a huge barrier to development. It is very sad that most ideas will disappear without ever having been concretely implemented because of a lack of the funds and knowledge needed to pursue their development. We hope that people will use mille-feuille to make at least some of these ideas that would otherwise be lost a reality. We want to usher in an era in which any programmer can make their own hardware.

Collaborators welcom

We want to develop mille-feuille into something that can be applied to education and used in research institutions and industrial settings. We are eager to hear from anyone who would like to collaborate with us to make this happen!

Team



Risks & Challenges

At present we are building prototypes in preparation for mass production. We have completed negotiations with a production factory, and have nearly reached the point at which mass production is possible. One risk is that, as a result of factors such as one of the parts included in the library used to generate schematics being discontinued, the development of some devices will be delayed. In such cases we will look for a replacement part and update the library, but there is a possibility that shipping will be delayed for several months.

When the schematics generated by mille-feuille are used to create a PCB layout, factors such as noise make it impossible for exactly the same signal to be input and output, and so some differences may arise depending on the person doing the PCB artwork.

A Raspberry Pi A+, B+ or 2 is not included. You should also download EAGLE CAD yourself according to your own use case. The automatic schematic creation tool can be used free of charge by those who purchase mille-feuille.

This campaign will take us as far as developing the schematic creation tool. Going forward, we plan to let users develop and sell original device boards that other users can connect to mille-feuille. We are also working towards including address numbers for use by third parties issued by mille-feuille on the ROM, and making it possible to register schematics on the mille-feuille server.


The system design requires multiple addresses to be prepared when the same type of device boards are connected to a single baseboard. At present we are not sure how many devices of the same type it will be possible to connect.


FAQ

Q: What about the shipping fee and customs duties?

We plan to use EMS for overseas shipping. Within Japan we will ship using Japan Post.Please confirm in advance whether EMS delivery to your location is possible using the website below. If delivery is not possible, please specify another location for EMS delivery to be received.
Japan Post 
(https://www.post.japanpost.jp/int/ems/country/all_en.html)

In some countries customs duties may be required in addition to the shipping fee. In such cases you are responsible for following the customs procedures in your country and paying any duties owed.

Shipping fee:  Worldwide $15 , Japan $5




字幕設定で日本語が出せるようになりました。

要約


[PHP sample] 　[Python sample]

ハードウェア制作に必要なプロセスをmille -feuilleひとつで

mille-feuille（ミルフィーユ）はハードウェアの知識がなくても、ハードエンジニアのように回路図と専用ファームウェアまで自動生成できるサポートツールです(生成される回路にはmille-feuille自体の回路は含んでいないため、普通に配線したような回路図が生成されます)。Raspberry Pi A+、B+、2に接続して使います。

自動配線機能により半田付けの作業はなく、ハードウェアを動かすためのファームウェアもすべてmille-feuilleがやってくれます。ユーザーは簡単な動作のPHPやpythonプログラムを書くだけ[PHP sample]　[Python sample]。最後は回路図自動生成ツールを使ってmille-feuilleに接続されているデバイスの情報をサーバーにアップロードします。サーバーで生成されたEagle CAD Script データをCADにインポートすれば、mille-feuille独自の回路を取り除いた、Raspberry Pi とデバイスを普通に配線したような回路図が自動で生成されます。

mille-feuilleが皆さんのハードエンジニアとして、試作開発をスムーズにします。

構成

15種類のデバイスボード

最初は15種類のデバイスボードを用意します。


デバイスボードはオープンハードです。自動生成されたmille-feuilleの自動配線機能が含まれていない回路図はオープンハードとして自由に使えます。ファームウェアはオープンソースです。

特許

mille-feuille の仕組みは米国特許を取得しました。また、各国に出願中です。

ターゲット

  • WEB プログラマ向け

プログラマにとっては回路を重ねるだけで試作ができて、さらにカスタム回路図と、その専用のファームウェアまで自動生成できるので、ハードエンジニアとのやり取りがなくても量産前の試作回路図までスピーディーに完成します。

  • ハードウェアエンジニアにとって: ハードウェア設計のスピードアップ

ハードエンジニアにとってはモジュールを入れ替えるだけで仕様変更がすぐ対応できます。また、簡単に回路図のアウトラインが出力できます。（今回はRaspberry Pi 用ですが追々増やしていきたいと思います。）


開発例


mille-feuille board　の詳細


自動配線機能

1. mille-feuilleは初期化の時に、Device boardのROMに保存されているＩＤ番号と、モジュール基板からの確認信号を基に、どこにどのデバイスが存在するのかを把握できます。

2. mille-feuilleのBaseboardには配線をスイッチングするための複数のMultiplexer回路*が搭載されています。使うDevice boardに合わせて配線することができます。(*Multiplexer はただのデジタルスイッチです。ユーザーがＦＰＧＡの複雑なVerilogなどを使って書き換えなどの操作はありません。多くのハードウェアエンジニアが勘違いしやすいです。)


3. mille-feuilleのModule board にはQuad bus switchが搭載されています。バスを開くことで、特定のデバイスに配線を接続することができます。これにより、複数のModule Boardを縦に積み重ねても、特定のデバイスだけに接続することができます。

回路図自動生成ツール

このツールはmille-feuille の自動配線機能を省いた回路図と、それに合わせたファームウェア生成されます。

専用アプリケーションを使い、どのデバイスが接続されているかを把握します。その情報をmille-feuille専用サーバーにアップロードします。サーバーではその時の最適な回路図と、それに合わせたファームウェアを自動的に生成してくれます。　生成されたデータをEAGLE CADにインポートすれば回路図が自動で描かれます。完成した回路図を作りたい基板に合わせて自分でアートワークをすることも可能ですし、回路図を仕様書としても使えるので、誰かにアートワークをしてもらうこともできます。

生成される回路にはmille-feuille自体の回路は含んでいないため、普通に配線したような回路図が生成されます。


Perks


Schedule


History and Future Aims

mille-feuille システムの開発は2014年の夏から始まりました。ハードエンジニアとして試作の依頼を受けているうちに、度重なる仕様変更が大幅なロスタイムを生むことに気付きました。ソフトエンジニアとハードエンジニア間のやり取りも時間がかかります。また、ハード側は動作検証をする分、どうしてもソフトエンジニアを待たせてしまいます。ならばソフトエンジニア側で動作確認までできれば開発のスピードは一気に上がるのではないかと考えました。

　開発はスピードが命です。また、ものづくりは出来るだけ簡単で単純な物でなければならないと考えています。自身のアイデアを具現化するのに大量のデータシートやサンプル回路図を読まなければならないのは、時間がいくらあっても足りず、人員を増やすなどの対策が必要となり、大きな障壁となります。多くのアイデアが開発コストや知識不足によって人知れず消えてしまっているはすごく悲しいです。Mille-feuilleはそんなアイデアをひとつでも多く具現化できるようなツールとして、皆さんに使ってもらいたいと考えています。そして、誰でもハードウェアが作れる時代を作っていきたいと思います。

Welcome

私たちはmille-feuilleを教育に応用したり、研究機関や産業で使用できるものに改良していきたいと考えています。この試みに協力してくれる方々からの連絡もお待ちしています！

Team

Risks & Challenges

現在、私たちは量産に向けた試作を行っています。量産工場との話し合い済んでおり、ほぼ量産できる体制は整っています。リスクとしては、回路図を生成するために使用するライブラリに記載されている部品が廃版になる等の理由で、一部デバイスの開発が遅れる恐れがあります。その場合は、代替部品を探しライブラリも変更を行いますが、出荷が数か月遅れる可能性があるます。

Mille-feuille で生成した回路図からPCBレイアウトを作成した際、ノイズ等の理由で完全に同じ信号を入出力できるわけではないので、アートワークする人によって多少、差が出る場合があります。

Raspberry Pi A+、B+、２　は付属していません。またEagle CADは用途に合わせてご自身でダウンロードしてください。自動回路図生成ツールはmille-feuilleを購入した方であれば無料で自由に生成できます。

今回のキャンペーンでは回路図生成ツールまでを開発します。今後の展望として、ユーザーはmille-feuilleに接続可能なオリジナルのデバイスボードを開発し販売することも可能にする予定です。mille-feuilleから発行するThird party用のアドレス番号をROMに搭載し、mille-feuilleサーバーに回路図を登録できるよう進めていきます。


システムの仕組み上、1つのベースボードに、同じ種類のデバイスボードを接続する時はアドレスを複数個用意する必要があります。同じ種類のどのデバイスが何個同時に接続できるかは現状では未定です。

FAQ

Q: 送料と関税などはどうなってますか？

海外はＥＭＳで発送する予定です。日本国内は日本郵便で送ります。事前にＥＭＳの発送可能な地域を以下のサイトから調べてください。発送できない場合はＥＭＳの受け取り場所を別途指定してください。

Japan Post 
(https://www.post.japanpost.jp/int/ems/country/all_en.html)

送料以外に国によって関税がかかる事があります。その場合はご自分で関税の手続きと支払いをお願いします。

送料:  日本以外 $15 , 日本国内$5

If delivery is not possible, please specify another location for EMS delivery to be received.Japan Post (https://www.post.japanpost.jp/int/ems/country/all_en.html)

In some countries customs duties may be required in addition to the shipping fee. In such cases you are responsible for following the customs procedures in your country and paying any duties owed.
Shipping fee:  Worldwide $15 , Japan $5













字幕設定で日本語が出せるようになりました。
要約

[PHP sample] 　[Python sample]
ハードウェア制作に必要なプロセスをmille -feuilleひとつで
mille-feuille（ミルフィーユ）はハードウェアの知識がなくても、ハードエンジニアのように回路図と専用ファームウェアまで自動生成できるサポートツールです(生成される回路にはmille-feuille自体の回路は含んでいないため、普通に配線したような回路図が生成されます)。Raspberry
Pi A+、B+、2に接続して使います。

自動配線機能により半田付けの作業はなく、ハードウェアを動かすためのファームウェアもすべてmille-feuilleがやってくれます。ユーザーは簡単な動作のPHPやpythonプログラムを書くだけ[PHP sample]　[Python sample]。最後は回路図自動生成ツールを使ってmille-feuilleに接続されているデバイスの情報をサーバーにアップロードします。サーバーで生成されたEagle CAD Script データをCADにインポートすれば、mille-feuille独自の回路を取り除いた、Raspberry Pi とデバイスを普通に配線したような回路図が自動で生成されます。
mille-feuilleが皆さんのハードエンジニアとして、試作開発をスムーズにします。
構成


15種類のデバイスボード
最初は15種類のデバイスボードを用意します。

デバイスボードはオープンハードです。自動生成されたmille-feuilleの自動配線機能が含まれていない回路図はオープンハードとして自由に使えます。ファームウェアはオープンソースです。
特許
mille-feuille の仕組みは米国特許を取得しました。また、各国に出願中です。
ターゲットWEB プログラマ向け
プログラマにとっては回路を重ねるだけで試作ができて、さらにカスタム回路図と、その専用のファームウェアまで自動生成できるので、ハードエンジニアとのやり取りがなくても量産前の試作回路図までスピーディーに完成します。
ハードウェアエンジニアにとって: ハードウェア設計のスピードアップハードエンジニアにとってはモジュールを入れ替えるだけで仕様変更がすぐ対応できます。また、簡単に回路図のアウトラインが出力できます。（今回はRaspberry Pi 用ですが追々増やしていきたいと思います。）

開発例

mille-feuille board　の詳細


自動配線機能
1. mille-feuilleは初期化の時に、Device boardのROMに保存されているＩＤ番号と、モジュール基板からの確認信号を基に、どこにどのデバイスが存在するのかを把握できます。

2. mille-feuilleのBaseboardには配線をスイッチングするための複数のMultiplexer回路*が搭載されています。使うDevice boardに合わせて配線することができます。(*Multiplexer はただのデジタルスイッチです。ユーザーがＦＰＧＡの複雑なVerilogなどを使って書き換えなどの操作はありません。多くのハードウェアエンジニアが勘違いしやすいです。)
3. mille-feuilleのModule board にはQuad bus switchが搭載されています。バスを開くことで、特定のデバイスに配線を接続することができます。これにより、複数のModule Boardを縦に積み重ねても、特定のデバイスだけに接続することができます。



回路図自動生成ツール
このツールはmille-feuille の自動配線機能を省いた回路図と、それに合わせたファームウェア生成されます。
専用アプリケーションを使い、どのデバイスが接続されているかを把握します。その情報をmille-feuille専用サーバーにアップロードします。サーバーではその時の最適な回路図と、それに合わせたファームウェアを自動的に生成してくれます。　生成されたデータをEAGLE CADにインポートすれば回路図が自動で描かれます。完成した回路図を作りたい基板に合わせて自分でアートワークをすることも可能ですし、回路図を仕様書としても使えるので、誰かにアートワークをしてもらうこともできます。



生成される回路にはmille-feuille自体の回路は含んでいないため、普通に配線したような回路図が生成されます。

Perks


Schedule


History and Future Aims

mille-feuille
システムの開発は2014年の夏から始まりました。ハードエンジニアとして試作の依頼を受けているうちに、度重なる仕様変更が大幅なロスタイムを生むことに気付きました。ソフトエンジニアとハードエンジニア間のやり取りも時間がかかります。また、ハード側は動作検証をする分、どうしてもソフトエンジニアを待たせてしまいます。ならばソフトエンジニア側で動作確認までできれば開発のスピードは一気に上がるのではないかと考えました。
　開発はスピードが命です。また、ものづくりは出来るだけ簡単で単純な物でなければならないと考えています。自身のアイデアを具現化するのに大量のデータシートやサンプル回路図を読まなければならないのは、時間がいくらあっても足りず、人員を増やすなどの対策が必要となり、大きな障壁となります。多くのアイデアが開発コストや知識不足によって人知れず消えてしまっているはすごく悲しいです。Mille-feuilleはそんなアイデアをひとつでも多く具現化できるようなツールとして、皆さんに使ってもらいたいと考えています。そして、誰でもハードウェアが作れる時代を作っていきたいと思います。


Welcome
私たちはmille-feuilleを教育に応用したり、研究機関や産業で使用できるものに改良していきたいと考えています。この試みに協力してくれる方々からの連絡もお待ちしています！
Team

Risks & Challenges
現在、私たちは量産に向けた試作を行っています。量産工場との話し合い済んでおり、ほぼ量産できる体制は整っています。リスクとしては、回路図を生成するために使用するライブラリに記載されている部品が廃版になる等の理由で、一部デバイスの開発が遅れる恐れがあります。その場合は、代替部品を探しライブラリも変更を行いますが、出荷が数か月遅れる可能性があるます。

Mille-feuille
で生成した回路図からPCBレイアウトを作成した際、ノイズ等の理由で完全に同じ信号を入出力できるわけではないので、アートワークする人によって多少、差が出る場合があります。


Raspberry Pi A+、B+、２　は付属していません。またEagle
CADは用途に合わせてご自身でダウンロードしてください。自動回路図生成ツールはmille-feuilleを購入した方であれば無料で自由に生成できます。


今回のキャンペーンでは回路図生成ツールまでを開発します。今後の展望として、ユーザーはmille-feuilleに接続可能なオリジナルのデバイスボードを開発し販売することも可能にする予定です。mille-feuilleから発行するThird party用のアドレス番号をROMに搭載し、mille-feuilleサーバーに回路図を登録できるよう進めていきます。

システムの仕組み上、1つのベースボードに、同じ種類のデバイスボードを接続する時はアドレスを複数個用意する必要があります。同じ種類のどのデバイスが何個同時に接続できるかは現状では未定です。
FAQ
Q: 送料と関税などはどうなってますか？

海外はＥＭＳで発送する予定です。日本国内は日本郵便で送ります。事前にＥＭＳの発送可能な地域を以下のサイトから調べてください。発送できない場合はＥＭＳの受け取り場所を別途指定してください。
Japan Post (https://www.post.japanpost.jp/int/ems/country/all_en.html)
送料以外に国によって関税がかかる事があります。その場合はご自分で関税の手続きと支払いをお願いします。

送料:  日本以外 $15 , 日本国内$5

story:
–hello we're

Less Words Publishing

small but enthusiastic group of professionals passionate about the endless possibilities our digital era provides us.


We all work in different areas but are 
ultimately united by a single idea, to share our knowledge and experience in the easiest way possible. For us this is:

–we believe

that words are definitely important, but when everything else around us is constantly moving at volatile speeds, words themselves may become a less efficient frequency of sharing information. 


And sometimes less words means more meaning.  So thus we say:

“Less Words – More Design”

This guidebook is 100% intended to be only the greatest of help to anyone and everyone wanting to design an iOS application.


It will help you to verify the app structure and lead you through the stages of designing your very own app.  

– What kind of skills do you need? 
– None!

In fact, Less Words – More Design is our abiding motto that aims to teach both beginners and experts giving all both basic level and advanced design knowledge used by professionals. 

Even the most average of Joes can create and design with our guidebook, as we provide you with a kit of all components, including: 

You can change the size, color and maintain image quality required for Retina screens.

And no fret concerning the new iOS8, as our book will include all innovations of it.


And here’s just one more useful tidbit:

Our book is formatted and available for your computer, tablet and smartphone! 

This gives you the opportunity to learn anywhere and everywhere, from Timbuctoo to any given underground subway, or right from your very own home! 

How can you help?


Contribute.
Any contribution amount makes a huge difference. Just check out our perks and find the one that best suits you. 


Spread the word.
Sharing links takes a few seconds and helps to raise awareness dramatically. The more people that know about us, the more they will be willing to contribute. 



Why do we need your help?


We have already started our work.
We gathered information and systematized it.
We have even found designers to compose this guidebook and prepare its complementary kit with components. 


So now all we need is your help to make it all happen and come to life!

With your contributions, we will be able to fund and plan accordingly, so that our team can rise to excellency, and most importantly, provide You with only the best-of-the-best UI guidebook (eBook) out there!


Let’s make it real together!

◕‿◕

#lesswrds

story:
Quickly charge and sync all of your Apple devices simultaneously with iMate. Supports all series of MacBook, MacBook Pro, iPhone, iPad & Apple Watch and includes USB-C outlets for other devices. Say goodbye to a lack of outlets or time to charge your electronics, and say hello to the new way to plug, charge, and sync all your favorite tech gadgets.

 

 

iMate also gives you high speed data transfer and includes an SD card reader, USB 3.0 ports, and 4K HDMI port. Upload and backup all your photos & videos from your phone, cameras, external hard drives, and laptop all at the same time!

 

 

 

 

 

iMate is the only docking station with two USB-C Power Delivery (PD) fast charge ports that allow you to charge and sync up to six devices simultaneously.

Not enough charging ports has officially become a thing of the past.
Charge up to 3x faster than standard outlets on multiple devices!

iMate is designed to work with all Apple products, including your Apple Watch. Just plug in, charge, and relax. iMate will take over from there.

 

 

 

iMate is the perfect solution for all of your data storage needs. Never stress about downloading photos or videos again. iMate streamlines the process by providing everything you need. With iMate, you can sync everything at once - there’s no need to transfer your songs or data over and over again. Just sync and go!

 

 

iMate is the perfect accessory for flawlessly transferring data from one device to another. Get up to 10gb/s data speed with USB-C and 5gb/s data speed with USB 3.0. You can now transfer data to multiple devices, simultaneously, in a blink of an eye.

 

 

iMate has HDMI 4K Ultra display technology, which means you can connect your MacBook to your TV through the HDMI port and watch your favorite shows and movies with magnificent quality and color. Never has HD looked so clear as it will when you use iMate.

 

 

iMate is the quintessential traveling companion. Its compact size makes it able to fit in virtually any bag or purse without having to compromise space for your other belongings. Whether you are going to and from work, or traveling overseas, iMate is the perfect way to charge and sync your devices while you’re on the go.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

***CHOOSE YOUR COLORS AT THE END OF THE CAMPAIGN***

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

As one of the first consumer electronics companies to design Power Delivery (PD) devices and carry Type-C accessories, we created iMate with the purpose of making the lives of MacBook and MacBook Pro users easier and hassle-free.

Dongles, cables, and hubs aside, as Apple owners ourselves, the concept of "less is more" drove us to refine our ideas and techniques to finally craft our vision into reality.

iMate fits your MacBook and MacBook Pro just like a natural extension, thoughtfully matched in color and aesthetics.

 

 

Grenoplus is established with its R&D department in Shenzhen, China, and supported by its Marketing and Design counterparts in Malaysia.

With a team of 20 members, Grenoplus is focused on delivering quality power-source related products. This includes manufacturing and distributing high quality, premium accessories such as power banks, handset cables and more to the list.

With this expertise, the team invented iMate, a revolutionizing power for Apple devices, designed to quickly charge and sync all your Apple devices simultaneously. iMate also allows fast data transfer, HDMI 4K Ultra display technology and convenience for your everyday use with its compact size.

 

 

 

 

Q: Do you have a guarantee/warranty?

A: iMate comes with a one year warranty. That said, it will come with a serial number that will grant you another six month warranty if you use that to register it on https://grenoplus.com/

 

Q: How do I receive iMate? What if I live outside the US?

A: We’ll ask for your shipping info after the campaign ends. If you live outside the US, don’t worry! We ship internationally.

 

Q: When is the expected delivery date?

A: We expect to deliver by Sep 2018

 

Q: What series Apple products is iMate compatible with?

A: MacBook, MacBook Pro 13” & 15” with/without touchbar released on 2017,

iPhone all series, iPhone 8, 8plus & iPhone X compatible with PD fast charges,

iPad all series, iPad Pro compatible with PD fast charges, AirPod & iPod all series.

 

Q: What about my 2010 Macbook Pro?

A: Unfortunately, iMate does not connect with the old series of the MacBook Pro & MacBook Air because they use an older generation Magsafe Connector that isn’t forwards compatible.

 

Q: What other devices can iMate connect with?

A: Nintendo Switch, USB Flash Drive, USB Portable HDD, SD Card, LCD TV, Projectors,

Wired/Wireless Mouse/Keyboard, Digital Cameras/DSLR Cameras & etc

 

Q: Do I need to upgrade my Mac OS and iOS to use iMate?

A: Nope, just plug, charge, & sync! :)

 

Q: Is iMate compatible with Windows and Android Operating Systems?

A: Yes

 

Q: How fast can iMate charge my devices?

A: Through iMate’s USB-C you can recharge your iPhone up to 50 percent in 30 minutes or less. iMate’s Charging voltage/amperages are as follows:
-Primary USB C - 20v/ 2A (40W), 15v/ 2A (30W), 12v/2A (24W), 9v/2 & 5v/2.4A
(PD system gives our USB-C ports the ability to deliver different volt/amp types)

-Secondary USB C - 9/1A & 5v/2/4

-USB 1 - 2.4Amp

-USB 2 - 2.4Amp

-Apple Wireless Charger - 250Ma

 

Q: How does the Apple Watch charger work? Does it charge wirelessly?

A: Yes, the Apple Watch Charger charges wirelessly. Click the corner of the hidden dock compartment to release the Apple Watch charger dock. Then simply place your Apple Watch face up on the dock to charge it wirelessly!

 

Q: How fast can iMate sync my devices?

A: USB C Transferring Speed up to 10Gb/s above

USB 3.0 Transferring Speed up to 5Gb/s above

SD Card Transferring Speed up to 104MB/s

 

Q: Can iMate sync with my Time Machine Backup?

A: Yep, of course!

 

Q: Is there a VGA port?

A: No, but with every iMate, you’ll get a HDMI to VGA converter - so you can still connect with VGA cords! The VGA converter also includes an AUX input so you can get sound going out to your monitors as well.

 

Q: Do I need to plug my iMate to a power source to use it?

A: Yes, you can plug it into your MacBook or MacBook Pro 13” & 15” to draw power from your laptop or use the included AC Power Cord to draw power from a standard wall outlet.

 

Q: Does iMate hold a charge? Can I use it as a battery pack?

A: No, iMate is a docking station and does not hold a charge.

 

Q: What are the dimensions?

A: 125 mm X 78mm X 28mm

 

Q: Do you have a return policy?

A: If there is a problem with your iMate, let us know and we will gladly exchange it for you.

 

Q: So what do I do with all my extra dongles?

A: iMate is your best companion in everywhere. You won’t need all your extra dongles anymore! Time to return or donate them. :)

story:
Update

We are sold out of our initial allocation of Sketchboard Pro!

If you missed out on the Indiegogo, you can still pre-order a Sketchboard Pro from our second run from our shop! Discounted for a limited time and shipping in November!

 

Introducing Sketchboard Pro, an iPad stand designed for artists by artists! 

 

Modeled after the classic illustration sketch boards we all know from art school, this stand cradles your iPad to create a totally flat drawing surface around the screen and allow for more comfort and support while drawing.

 

Draw Better and Feel Better

The Sketchboard Pro can be used flat on a drawing table or propped against a desk, or in your lap on the couch and in bed, and it has legs that fold out to create a comfortable 20-degree incline on any flat surface in landscape or portrait orientation. 

 

 

Draw and paint wherever you are most comfortable and love to work and for longer periods of time without punishing your body!

 

What Our Backers Are Saying

 

"I'm quite excited for this...I can't wait for this board to make my constant working experience even better. I love working on the couch, or the park, this will make that so much easier."

- Michael Avon Oeming, Artist, Powers, Dick Tracy, Bulletproof Monk

 

"This looks like a great idea. Backed!"

- Jonathan Hickman, Writer, X-Men, Fantastic Four, The Nightly News

 

"I'm very excited about (this) and think you would be, too."

- Brian Kesinger, Artist, Walt Disney Studios, Lucasfilm, Marvel

 

Sketchboard Pro in the Press

 

“The Sketchboard Pro could be the best thing to come out of CES.”

- Digital Arts
This iPad stand saves artists from the aches of drawing

 

"Best iPad accessory for artists."

- Business Insider
15 best tech accessories of CES 2020

 

"[Sketchboard Pro] has the potential to enhance [your art] quality through fuller use of your arm while drawing."

- Creative Bloq
10 game-changing tech innovations for 2020

 

“A comfier digital drawing surface.”

- Fast Company
The best stuff at CES got me optimistic about technology again

 

"The iPad Pro can be superb for artists, but the tablet’s weight combined with poor ergonomics over the long term can lead to pain and discomfort.... [Sketchboard Pro] draws inspiration from classic artboards, ‘sinking’ your iPad into its surface. Drawing then becomes more like working with a sheet of paper."

- Stuff Magazine
Sketchboard Pro is an iPad Pro stand for artists that lets you draw in comfort

 

"The best part is that you can mount the Sketchboard Pro with an iPad Pro on an easel and paint digitally!"

- iPhone Hacks
Meet Sketchboard Pro, a Magnetic iPad Stand for Artists

 

"In many regards, Sketchboard Pro could be the ideal iPad drawing board...magnetic plates to help lock the iPad Pro in place... a genius feature missing on other solutions we’ve tested so far."

- Digital Epigraphy

Sketchboard Pro could be the ideal iPad drawing board for digital epigraphy

 

Just Like Drawing on Paper

With the Sketchboard Pro, your iPad is nestled into a form-fitted cradle that creates a smooth surface for your hand to glide across. For the first time, this enables you to utilize the complete canvas when drawing on your iPad, rather than resting your hand on areas of the screen where you could be drawing.

 

Bring Your Drawings to Life!

Combine what you love about drawing on iPad with the traditional physical experience of making art. You are able to use your full arm while drawing to achieve a more elegant, flowing look to your lines and bring your drawings to life.

 

Sketchboard Pro offers wonderful support for arms so you can rest 'em when you need to and store that energy for when you need crazy arm motion in your lines.

 

We have found that many artists who draw on their iPads for extended periods of time hold a lot of tension in their bodies from the positions they have to maintain while drawing. Thanks to the Sketchboard Pro, your whole body can relax and that positive feeling translates to your art. 

 

It's Got a Magnetic Personality

 

Magnetic plates embedded in the Sketchboard Pro help to lock your iPad Pro in place to prevent it from accidentally falling out when you need to move from one spot to the next.

 

Charge While You Draw

 

 

Although our earlier prototypes do not show it, our final Sketchboard Pro has a port for your charging cable so you can keep your iPad happy and powerful during long drawing sessions!

 

Stand in Landscape or Portrait Orientation

Additional fold-out legs enable Sketchboard Pro to stand in portrait or landscape orientation with flat resting surfaces for righties and lefties!

 

Available for Most Apple Pencil Supported iPads!

 

Sketchboard Pro models are available for all iPads with Apple Pencil support except for the iPad Mini. Supported models:

  • iPad Pro 12.9-inch 2020
  • iPad Pro 12.9-inch 2018 
  • iPad Pro 12.9-inch 2015-2017 
  • iPad Pro 11-inch 2020
  • iPad Pro 11-inch 2018  
  • iPad Pro 10.5-inch 2017 
  • iPad Pro 9.7-inch 2016
  • iPad 2018 (6th Gen) 
  • iPad 2019 (7th Gen)
  • iPad Air 2019 (3rd Gen)

 

 

Easily Upgradeable for When You Get a New iPad!

 

 

The center case (or cradle as we call it) is designed for specific iPad sizes and it's totally swappable! Whenever you get a new iPad of a different size you don't have to replace the entire Sketchboard Pro. Just buy a new cradle for the iPad and swapping it out is as easy as removing a few screws!  

 

Reviews from Our Test Artists

 

We felt it was important to invite professional artists who use their iPads as a cornerstone of their process to test out the Sketchboard Pro and help us refine its features. These artists are drawing on their iPads with the Apple Pencil for several hours a day. We gave each of them a prototype to test drive for several weeks and were so happy to learn that they now can't live without Sketchboard Pro. Incidentally, we're now missing a couple of prototypes. 

 

 

 

Why Sketchboard Pro?

 

The iPad is a wonderful device and apps like Procreate offer a great creative canvas. The problem with drawing consistent professional work on the iPad is that it can be stressful on your body. Holding the iPad in your hands for hours while you draw can cause numbness in your hands and arms, discomfort on your shoulders from having to float your arm so much while drawing and pain in your neck from having to look down so much. Don't even get us started on back problems.

We wanted to draw professionally from anywhere--a desk, couch, the floor--and feel comfortable doing it.

Bill Galvan, a member of Braintreehouse and professional comic book artist tells the origin story of the Sketchboard Pro and how it helped him eliminate shoulder pain caused by drawing on his iPad...

 

An Art Tool with a True Comic Book Origin Story

 

How can you help?

 

We figured if we were having these kinds of physical challenges drawing on the iPad, then other artists out there are probably experiencing them, too.

That’s why we feel ready to share the Sketchboard Pro with you and hopefully, you can help us to make it a reality, so that everybody who loves drawing on their iPad, can do so with great comfort and spend more energy on creativity and less on physical stress.

We're so excited to be able to share this with artists who recognize its benefits.

 

Notes on Budget

We’ve invested all of our own savings on engineering and prototyping the Sketchboard Pro to get us this far, but we need your help to be able to manufacture the final product.

Most of the funds we're raising will pay for making the molds for the Sketchboard Pro and our final engineering costs. A couple of the molds are considered oversized for injection molding and are considerably expensive. We could save some money by redesigning these large pieces to be pieced together by smaller connecting parts, but this would potentially compromise the strength of the overall piece and add more opportunity for defect in the manufacturing process. The lion's share of the rest goes toward final engineering and fulfillment.

 

Rewards!

 

*Model numbers are printed on the back of your iPad in tiny print.

 

 

The must-have accessory for artists on the go! The Travel Bag is tailor-made for your Sketchboard Pro, complete with interior pockets for your devices, cables, and art supplies. It's the perfect way to tote and protect your Sketchboard Pro.  Highly recommended for students and con-going artists.

 

A Word on Shipping Costs

 

Our friends in Canada, Mexico, and other parts of the world interested in backing may have noticed that shipping seems high at $45+ compared with the US and Europe where shipping is $13 -$15. The reason US and EU shipping costs less is that we have made partnerships with fulfillment companies in those countries making it more affordable. So Sketchboard Pros ordered within Europe ship from our partner in Europe.  

We are seeking the same kind of relationships with fulfillment partners in other countries and if we can do anything to reduce the cost of shipping for you we will. The shipping costs you are seeing there now are the best rates we could find for a box with the dimensions for the Sketchboard Pro to your country. 

We will continue to develop our fulfillment relationships and if we are able to get a better rate at the time of shipment, we will refund you the difference. 

 

Production Update!

 

May 2020 Our large moulds are finally finished tooling and delivered to the factory. Production samples are being produced!

 

June 2020 Untextured production samples received!

 

 

July 2020 Final production models received and products are being prepared for shipment to the states!

 

ABOUT US

 

 

Braintreehouse is an art studio where we make art and games. We successfully Kickstarted a card game last year that is now being published by Chronicle for worldwide distribution and we’re hard at work on our first video game. We developed the Sketchboard Pro by necessity while making art for our games.

 

Our engineering partner is Rocketship. They are a team of excellent industrial designers who have developed products in dozens of industries. Their clients include Blendtec, Pelican, Philips, Nalgene, and Easton. Rocketship has guided us throughout our design and prototyping phases and will continue to help us through our DFM and manufacturing phases. 

 

*All royalty-free music in our videos provided by Bensound*

story:
Productivity is not about managing your time as much as it is about managing your mind. Often we intend to work on a task, but distractions and interruptions scatter our focus. hellomindful.me app offers a solution.

The solution? To bring mindfulness to the workplace.

How? With a mindfulness at work method.

hellomindful.me sharpens your focus on the present. The application puts into practice a method of mindfulness at work which involves setting intentions, knowing what you are doing at all times, and focusing on one task for sustainable increments of time.

This method of mindfulness at work has been in design for more than several years by Pierre Khawand, productivity and leadership thought leader and founder of People-OnTheGo. Khawand trains and coaches working professionals on how to navigate today’s fast-paced workplace and how to manage the constant interruptions and information overload that leaves professionals scattered and stressed. He draws from 15 years of experience and research in workplace productivity in creating this method.

Just last year Khawand released the journal and pen “analog” version of the method, published as The Perfect 15-Minute Day Method (PDM). It received great reviews. Users asked for a mobile version, so Khawand began developing what is now the prototype of the hellomindful.me web app.

Funding for this campaign will go towards building out both the mobile and web applications of hellomindful.me in order for both apps to have more comprehensive features.

The App: Mindfulness at Work

So, how will the hellomindful.me app bring mindfulness to your workday? The app will help you to do the following:

1. Focus on the NOW  

NOW is where you and the app live.

Make an intention for what you want to do during the next 15 minutes (or a time increment of your choice), and do it! This will help you work assertively rather than reactively for a concrete amount of time.

The NOW screen will remind you of your current task in case you get distracted or interrupted. A gentle sound will mark the end of your focus session and will provide you with a checkpoint and options to continue or switch your current task or take a mindful break.

2. Take Mindful Breaks

A Mindful Break is a moment to recharge your mind and body so you can stay engaged and avoid burning out at work. It is similar to the NOW page, but both the activity name and timer are optional as you may or may not want your break to be timed.

A goal for the new iteration of the hellomindful.me app is to remind the user to take a Mindful Break after a given number of focus sessions and suggest activities of your choice. For instance, if you’re at the desk for long hours, it could regularly prompt you to stand, stretch, or take a walk.

3. Reflect on Your Day 

hellomindful.me keeps a record of your activity so you can honestly evaluate and reflect on how you spend your time. You can see completed or incomplete tasks as well as how you approach your work. Do you tend to jump back and forth between tasks or do you work on a single task for hours and forget to take breaks? Maybe you spent longer than expected on certain tasks, or devoted too much time to less important tasks.

A stretch goal for the new iteration of the hellomindful.me app is to report insightful analytics that show larger user trends, such as how long certain repeated tasks take to complete, what time of day or day of the week you seem least or most focused, how long on average you work without breaks, etc.

4. Capture Stray Thoughts and Interruptions

Capture is a place to capture stray thoughts and ideas so that you can return to the task at hand, the NOW. Having an in-app place to take notes helps the user avoid risking further distraction from opening other apps. Plus, with the intention of minimizing distractions, Capture will always provide a blank space so that previous captures don’t distract you either.

Capture will be a new feature of the app that your contributions will help make real.

5. Set Goals for Each Day

hellomindful.me is all about taking on each day one day at a time, 15 minutes at a time. While we set intentions for each focus session, we also need to set goals for the day to remind us where to spend our focus and energy. The Today page allows you to list these goals. It’s not intended to be an exhaustive to-do list, but a small list of your top tasks to accomplish with room for the unexpected. Checking off these Today tasks will be specially noted in your activity log.

The Today feature will be also be a new feature of hellomindful.me thanks to your contribution.

6. Acknowledge Your Accomplishments and Rate Your Engagement

So often we accomplish one thing and immediately look towards the next task to do. To find satisfaction in our work it’s important to acknowledge our accomplishments, no matter how small. hellomindful.me app gives you a hoorah whenever you check off a task as completed.

A stretch goal for hellomindful.me is a feature that allows you to rate your engagement and energy level in tasks. Inspired by Bill Burnett and Dave Evan’s book Designing Your Life, keeping track of your engagement and energy level throughout your workday will reveal what you truly enjoy about your job and allow you to seek more of that in your daily work.

What Makes the hellomindful.me App Unique

Unlike many of the productivity apps available in stores that help you manage your time, hellomindful.me helps you manage your mind by allowing you to quickly capture your internal distractions (a.k.a. thoughts); by reminding you to acknowledge your accomplishments and take breaks to recharge; and by facilitating your practice of setting goals and intentions each day, throughout your day. This way you can be not only productive but also happy at work.

The hellomindful.me app stands on a tried and true mindfulness at work method. The app will facilitate the practice of the method, with the added advantage of being digital -- it can remind you to recharge and reflect, it can track your activities and inform you of your work habits, and it can follow you away from the desk.

Our Budget

Your contributions will go towards funding the first release of the hellomindful.me app for both web and mobile. With your help we will improve the current web-app prototype (seen in the above screenshots), as well as build out the cross-platform mobile version, Android and iOS.

Our goal for this first release of the hellomindful.me app is to have all the basic features, as described above, functioning smoothly. Our funding goal of $20,000 is our budget to accomplish this (front-end, back-end, database, UI/UX design, testing, etc.). There are, however, several features and functionalities we would love to include, and could, given extra funds. These are our stretch-goals.

Stretch Goals

If We Reach $25,000

We will add the Rate Your Engagement feature that allows you to rate your engagement and energy level in tasks to reveal what you truly enjoy about your work and encourage you to seek more of that in your daily work.

If We Reach $35,000

We will be able to sync the app and user data across devices.

If We Reach $45,000 

We will add more advanced analytics that informs the user of their work habits, such as how long certain repeated tasks take to complete, what time of day or day of the week you seem the least or most focused, how long on average you work without breaks, etc.

If We Reach $50,000+

We will integrate the app with other productivity apps such as e-mail and calendar apps.

Our Team 

Pierre Khawand leads the design and development of the hellomindful.me app and the vision for mindfulness at work. As a productivity and leadership thought leader, Pierre has helped thousands of working professionals in local and global organizations gain clarity and focus at work with effective methodologies and techniques. hellomindful.me app is the latest tool that Pierre hopes will help people find happiness and accomplishment at work.

Pierre's People-OnTheGo team assists in the research and teaching of mindfulness at work at corporate and academic campuses. The team's current efforts are directed towards the hellomindful.me app campaign. Also, over the past year of prototyping, Pierre has assembled a technical team of application software developers to make hellomindful.me a reality. 

Timeline: What We've Achieved and Aim to Achieve

January 2016: We asked multiple user groups to try Pierre's method for mindfulness at work and received positive feedback.      

June 2016: We published a book about Pierre's mindfulness at work and received rave reviews.

May 2017: We began early design of the hellomindful.me app and hosted a focus group for feedback.

July 2017: We started developing an early prototype of the mobile and web applications.

September 2017: We completed an early prototype of the mobile and web applications.

December 2017: We began a new iteration of the web application that is shown here as our current prototype.

February 2018: We launch our IndieGogo campaign at the Wisdom 2.0 Conference in San Francisco.  

May 2018: Our aim to release the Beta version of the complete hellomindful.me app functionality for user testing.

July 2018: Our aim to officially release  hellomindful.me to app stores.

Risks & Challenges

The risks associated with this project are minimal. The current prototype is a fully working prototype with all the design, technical, and user interface issues addressed, and the early beta of web app being in use internally at People-OnTheGo and a select group of users. Our management and senior technical team leaders have years of experience and successes in the industry. The only issue that may present a challenge -- a challenge we hope to have -- is the issue of scalability of the app to support heavy user demand. This we hope to mitigate through extensive beta testing assisted by our campaign contributors. (That means you! :)

hellomindful.me keeps a record of your activity so you can honestly evaluate and reflect on how you spend your time. You can see completed or incomplete tasks as well as how you approach your work. Do you tend to jump back and forth between tasks or do you work on a single task for hours and forget to take breaks? Maybe you spent longer than expected on certain tasks, or devoted too much time to less important tasks.
A stretch goal for the new iteration of the hellomindful.me app is to report insightful analytics that show larger user trends, such as how long certain repeated tasks take to complete, what time of day or day of the week you seem least or most focused, how long on average you work without breaks, etc.
4. Capture Stray Thoughts and Interruptions
Capture is a place to capture stray thoughts and ideas so that you can return to the task at hand, the NOW. Having an in-app place to take notes helps the user avoid risking further distraction from opening other apps. Plus, with the intention of minimizing distractions, Capture will always provide a blank space so that previous captures don’t distract you either.
Capture will be a new feature of the app that your contributions will help make real.
5. Set Goals for Each Day 
hellomindful.me is all about taking on each day one day at a time, 15 minutes at a time. While we set intentions for each focus session, we also need to set goals for the day to remind us where to spend our focus and energy. The Today page allows you to list these goals. It’s not intended to be an exhaustive to-do list, but a small list of your top tasks to accomplish with room for the unexpected. Checking off these Today tasks will be specially noted in your activity log.
The Today feature will be also be a new feature of hellomindful.me thanks to your contribution.
6. Acknowledge Your Accomplishments and Rate Your Engagement
So often we accomplish one thing and immediately look towards the next task to do. To find satisfaction in our work it’s important to acknowledge our accomplishments, no matter how small. hellomindful.me app gives you a hoorah whenever you check off a task as completed.
A stretch goal for hellomindful.me is a feature that allows you to rate your engagement and energy level in tasks. Inspired by Bill Burnett and Dave Evan’s book Designing Your Life, keeping track of your engagement and energy level throughout your workday will reveal what you truly enjoy about your job and allow you to seek more of that in your daily work.
What Makes the hellomindful.me App Unique
Unlike many of the productivity apps available in stores that help you manage your time, hellomindful.me helps you manage your mind by allowing you to quickly capture your internal distractions (a.k.a. thoughts); by reminding you to acknowledge your accomplishments and take breaks to recharge; and by facilitating your practice of setting goals and intentions each day, throughout your day. This way you can be not only productive but also happy at work.
The hellomindful.me app stands on a tried and true mindfulness at work method. The app will facilitate the practice of the method, with the added advantage of being digital -- it can remind you to recharge and reflect, it can track your activities and inform you of your work habits, and it can follow you away from the desk.

Our Budget
Your contributions will go towards funding the first release of the hellomindful.me app for both web and mobile. With your help we will improve the current web-app prototype (seen in the above screenshots), as well as build out the cross-platform mobile version, Android and iOS.
Our goal for this first release of the hellomindful.me app is to have all the basic features, as described above, functioning smoothly. Our funding goal of $20,000 is our budget to accomplish this (front-end, back-end, database, UI/UX design, testing, etc.). There are, however, several features and functionalities we would love to include, and could, given extra funds. These are our stretch-goals.
Stretch Goals
If We Reach $25,000
We will add the Rate Your Engagement feature that allows you to rate your engagement and energy level in tasks to reveal what you truly enjoy about your work and encourage you to seek more of that in your daily work.
If We Reach $35,000
We will be able to sync the app and user data across devices.
If We Reach $45,000 
We will add more advanced analytics that informs the user of their work habits, such as how long certain repeated tasks take to complete, what time of day or day of the week you seem the least or most focused, how long on average you work without breaks, etc.
If We Reach $50,000+
We will integrate the app with other productivity apps such as e-mail and calendar apps.

Our Team 
Pierre Khawand leads the design and development of the hellomindful.me app and the vision for mindfulness at work. As a productivity and leadership thought leader, Pierre has helped thousands of working professionals in local and global organizations gain clarity and focus at work with effective methodologies and techniques. hellomindful.me app is the latest tool that Pierre hopes will help people find happiness and accomplishment at work.
Pierre's People-OnTheGo team assists in the research and teaching of mindfulness at work at corporate and academic campuses. The team's current efforts are directed towards the hellomindful.me app campaign. Also, over the past year of prototyping, Pierre has assembled a technical team of application software developers to make hellomindful.me a reality. 
Timeline: What We've Achieved and Aim to AchieveJanuary 2016: We asked multiple user groups to try Pierre's method for mindfulness at work and received positive feedback.      June 2016: We published a book about Pierre's mindfulness at work and received rave reviews.May 2017: We began early design of the hellomindful.me app and hosted a focus group for feedback.July 2017: We started developing an early prototype of the mobile and web applications.September 2017: We completed an early prototype of the mobile and web applications.December 2017: We began a new iteration of the web application that is shown here as our current prototype.February 2018: We launch our IndieGogo campaign at the Wisdom 2.0 Conference in San Francisco.  May 2018: Our aim to release the Beta version of the complete hellomindful.me app functionality for user testing.July 2018: Our aim to officially release  hellomindful.me to app stores.Risks & ChallengesThe risks associated with this project are minimal. The current prototype is a fully working prototype with all the design, technical, and user interface issues addressed, and the early beta of web app being in use internally at People-OnTheGo and a select group of users. Our management and senior technical team leaders have years of experience and successes in the industry. The only issue that may present a challenge -- a challenge we hope to have -- is the issue of scalability of the app to support heavy user demand. This we hope to mitigate through extensive beta testing assisted by our campaign contributors. (That means you! :)

story:
Sounds cool, but what does it do exactly?

Okay, think about what goes wrong in your average brainstorm:

- People act politically correct, and don't say what comes to mind first.
- There's too little time
- Quiet people are afraid people are going to shoot off their ideas
- People seem to get stuck at the same ideas.
- The brainstorm becomes a drag, and you settle for an okayish idea in the end.

Our 100 Brain Fuel cards let you look at your problem from a totally different perspective. This makes brainstorming fun again, but most importantly: Brain Fuel will break through your standard thought patterns, so it will be easy to come up with unusual associations. You will gain access to a whole new range of solutions, and your okay ideas will turn into great ones!   

Tell me more about the cards!

Okay, you asked for it! Brain Fuel has 4 categories:

1. Animals, 2. Characters,  3. Objects,  4. Locations

Some categories work perfectly with one brainstorm technique, some categories work well with others. Maybe we will add even more categories in the future (at least we hope so: see our first stretchgoal).

Choose your brainstorming method

We added ten brainstorming-methods that ignite your imagination, so you can come up with new solutions for your problems. Some of the methods are golden oldies and others are brand new. We even developed some of them on our own (don't worry, we have a brainstorming expert in our team)! The methods differ in difficulty and the amount of creativity needed.

Because there are countless possibilities we want to add two new methods with each and every stretch goal!

Proof of concept

One simply doesn’t develop a tool out of thin air. Research, testing, more research, more tests, and so forth and so on! As of now, more than 1250 people have tested Brain Fuel. Most of them live in our homeland, the Netherlands, but we were also very honoured that people from all over the world helped to test our product. <3 They gave us new insights on the design, the card choice, techniques etc. We used their feedback to improve Brain Fuel to what is now in front of you!

 

 

Choose between an app or the cards (or use both)

We are there for lovers of technology and lovers of paper! The card game is tailormade for brainstorms with a group of people and with the app (iOS and Android) you'll always have Brain Fuel nearby for a quick and powerful brainstorm.

 

 

Help us help

When we came to the conclusion that we invented something that did not exist yet and in which we truly believe, we thought: why keep this to ourselves? Our industry? Of even our country? Why not share it with as many people as possible? And that is exactly what we are planning to do. 

Why do we need your money

We've already had a succesful Kickstarter campaign where we reached 140% of our goal. And that's fantastic! Because with that money we are able to print the first batch of cards and produce the packaging. (Those are being pressed right now). But for us it's not just about the cards, we're trying to build an entire Brain Fuel community. And that's why we came to Indiegogo. We need your help people!
 
With your money we will be able to:
+ Finish the apps we are building 
+ Get the webshop ready to sell Brain Fuel 
+ Make sure everything is ready to reach an international audience

Like we said: we already managed to raise more than 11K

After this, Brain Fuel will be ready for our webshop and we will do our best to get Brain Fuel available in stores. The estimated retailprice will be $32,- for one deck of Brain Fuel, the short cut instructions and 10 step-by-step worksheets. The app will be available for free with selected categories and a couple of methods. Extra categories and methods will be available through in-app purchases.

Rewards

Because we really want to do something extra for the people that give us something extra.. we decided to reward higher perks with some nifty gifts! So besides the app, the cards and our unconditional love you'll receive:
+ Idea Generator Poster. 
This poster is one of the extras you'll receive when you buy a perk of $42 or more. This awesome piece of paper helps you with brainstorming when you don't have the cards or the app nearby. Or just hang it in your office to show off.

+ Step-by-step Worksheets.
+ A (digital) Brain Fuel Masterclass. 
+ Your own personalized card in the Brain Fuel deck (not in the app). 
+ Together with us, you design a new card for Brain Fuel. We add this to the deck so every users can use your card!

We also offer three perks that are specifically compiled for facilitators/trainers, teachers, and business(wo)men. Do you want to know which rewards come with each perk? Check out the perks bar on the right!

What's next?

We’ve tested Brain Fuel with over 1250 people. And every time we get the feedback that we’ve got something truly great in our hands. The Kickstarter campaign helped us to make Brain Fuel a reality and now we have the oppurtunity make Brain Fuel into something larger than life. That means we’re going to put out Training sessions, E-courses, and workshops.  Everything that helps us change ideas for the better. 

But will it be a succes? You decide! :)

Risks and challenges

We like fun stuff but we take fun very seriously. It's part of our job! As of now, we do not foresee any major challenges. The design phase of the cards and the app are both done and we’ve already made the prototypes as you can see in the video and images. The only thing we can think of is that there could arrive problems with the people who print the cards and build the app. But we work with professionals, so hopefully everything will be a-ok!

Now we just need your support so we can afford to make Brain Fuel a reality! <3

story:
What? A challenge? 

A challenge is a competition where developers expresses their technical unconstrained vision, without specification, but only with their talent, their skills, their creativity. This challenge will be on the Qalingo ecommerce project which is opensource and builded with Java.

Challenge's website: http://challenge.qalingo.org

May the best win! At least 10000$ for the whole challenge!   

The challenge will have 3 categories, and a topic for each one.


What are the possible topics?
Topics 1 : build a prototype AngularJs marketplace, with product page, login, search, etc


 Topics 2 : Business rules engine like Drools, to manage promotion, gift


 Topics 3 : Workflow engine to understand how we can manage the marketplace's workflows


When does the challenge start? After this summer. Monday, Sep 1, 2014! Follow-us on Twitter @QalingoEco to receive more information in two months.

Before leaving this page, don't forget to donate, 5$ by paypal, this is just the price of a cold beer ;)


For each $ collected, we double the amount. So if the challenge collects 11,800$, we will give 23,600$ during the challenge on next September!



Why this $11,800? The amount of this step, will be used only for the awards, for the developers! The more we collect, the more we give back!

Ok, this is cool, but what is it Qalingo?
Qalingo is an French opensource eCommerce available on GitHub.

An online Demo is here. http://fo-mcommerce.demo.qalingo.com


Full technical page: http://demo.qalingo.com



The source code is here:

  http://github.com/qalingo

What we are building? A Java platform to build eCommerce & marketplaces with Java technologies.

Why an other platform? Too many Java platforms are under license and expensive. This one is free!



Why Java? Why not an other language? Ecommerce's websites and others can be built with many beautiful languages. Java still is a great one, with an awesome community and a language to build strong eCommerce platform!

Build an eCommerce with Java, is a good way to:
* to have a clean project organisation
* robust project which can support many new features during his life
* using many opensource projects from the community to add fonctionalities
* a good integration in a complex company's IS, and interact with ERP, CRM
* use cache libraries as Ehcache to increase the performance of your project
* to use frameworks, like Spring, to easily customize the project with your own needs
* use many tools like Jenkins to facilitate the job of your team and have a great industrialization


You can't donate even a symbolique dollar! We understand! Give us a "share", tweet this page! Share it on Facebook or what you want!

You don't have $ €, but you have Bitcoins! Ok we will deal with this!

http://demo.qalingo.com/donate.html


Sharing is caring!
Twitter: http://twitter.com/QalingoEco

story:
Short Summary

It's always been my dream to own the most successful crowdfunding platform. With your help, that's possible by way of this less successful crowdfunding platform. Thank you in advance for your help in this matter. 

What We Need & What You Get

I will need at least $2,000,000,000. 

You will receive the satisfaction of knowing you helped me achieve my dream of becoming outright owner of KickStarter.com. 

The Impact

Just imagine how much it would change my life to be a successful business owner. Maybe my father could look me in the eye again. 

Risks & Challenges

  • Raising $2,000,000,000
  • Obtaining the phone number of the current owners of Kickstarter. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Talk to the guys that currently own Kickstater and maybe get the price down a little bit. Seems like a waste to spend all that money on one purchase. 
  • That's pretty much it. It's a pretty straightfoward and simple goal.

story:
Who We Are

Torchlight Intelligence is an A.I. company with the goal of bringing the power of modern articifial intelligence to you. Our premiere service, Emberlight, is an A.I. that is designed to write your reports, papers, speeches, essays, and other creative works for you. Emberlight will be the cornerstone for our work, bringing modern A.I. to the home and workplace for everyday use — and we have made it simple enough that anyone regardless of age or technical skill can use it. Given 2 or 3 sentences of context, the A.I. is capable of understanding the intent of what you want to say and elaborates on it.

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

As it stands, Emberlight is too powerful to run on anything less than a supercomputer. We have built a service using supercomputer resources to serve Emberlight in the cloud. While these cloud resources are not prohibitively expensive, there is a significant cost associated with them that inevitably translates to a higher price in the final product. With your support, we can build our own machines and serve Emberlight ourselves for little more than the price of electricity. This would allow us to dramatically reduce the cost to our users.

The successful launch of Emberlight is our top priority. Once launch has been guaranteed, we seek to offer our service at the most affordable price possible. This means building infrastructure with our own hardware that performs well under high demand.

  • Goal: $12,000.00. This would allow us to build a minimally serviceable network capable of delivering a consistent stream rate of 7-20 words per second to our clients.
  • Stretch Goal: $80,000.00. This would provide the financial bedrock needed to perform independent research and development to expand beyond our base service. Furthermore, we would be able to construct a truly top-of-the-line network. With this kind of power, we could serve rapid-fire responses to large numbers of users simultaneously.
  • Monthly expenses: We will need to rent a secure space for our hardware, insure that hardware, pay for electricity, cloud-based processing (as needed), and maintain a high-bandwidth, symmetric internet connection.
  • If our goal is not reached, we still intend on attempting to bring the project forward, but on an extended release timeline and at a higher cost to users.

 

 

Your Contributions

Your support will make or break this project. Financial support enables us to build the hardware and infrastructure necessary for providing our service locally. With your help, we can release a stable experience - that does not depend on the resources of any tech giant - at an affordable price. Emberlight will redefine how our users write - from professional documents to client emails, academic (and scientific!) papers to fantasy novels, Emberlight is there to help. We look forward to your help on this project - and we can use your help in more ways than one! If you like our work, please like us on Facebook & Twitter, and also check out our website! Links are below.

 

Like us on Facebook, follow us on Twitter, and check out our website by clicking the links below!

story:
ANEW FOLIO

The Most Functional All-in-One Whiteboard Planner Book you'll ever need!

Whiteboard lets your ideas flow freely on the reusable erasable writing space. How about that you can bring this tool with you anywhere. An endless space for endless possibilities!

WHAT IS REUSABLE ERASABLE WHITEBOARD PLANNER BOOK?

It combines the best features of the infinitely erasable reusable whiteboard and the daily, weekly, monthly planner; lined, graph and blank layout pages into a compact, handy and portable book.

All pages are treated with a special dry-erasable, easy-to-wipe clean surface. Just like a whiteboard, you can EFFORTLESSLY Write…Erase… Redo… Undo… and START ANEW!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

ANEW FOLIO dimension: approx. 6.75"x9"   (high quality faux leather cover)

 

 

 

 
Thank you so much for your support!

Please feel free to contact us for any questions, ideas and suggestions!

helloanewnote@gmail.com

 

 

Music:bensound.com/royalty-free-music

    Risks & Challenges

     

    Bringing a new product to life is always challenging with unforeseen issues that arise along the way. Our biggest challenge is to get our products to our backer as soon as possible. As for the manufacturing part, we have great confidence because the manufacturers we use are big, reliable and we had worked with them before. However, our biggest concern is the delivery time. Since our production and shipping time will be around the holidays period, there may be unexpected setbacks and delay in time. We hope you understand and thanks in advanced for your patience. We are committed to bringing our products to you as soon as possible. 
    Thank you again for your support and understanding.
story_txt:
ANEW FOLIO
The Most Functional All-in-One Whiteboard Planner Book you'll ever need!
Whiteboard lets your ideas flow freely on the reusable erasable writing space. How about that you can bring this tool with you anywhere. An endless space for endless possibilities!

WHAT IS REUSABLE ERASABLE WHITEBOARD PLANNER BOOK?
It combines the best features of the infinitely erasable reusable whiteboard and the daily, weekly, monthly planner; lined, graph and blank layout pages into a compact, handy and portable book.
All pages are treated with a special dry-erasable, easy-to-wipe clean surface. Just like a whiteboard, you can EFFORTLESSLY Write…Erase… Redo… Undo… and START ANEW!
 
  

 
 
 
 

 

 


  ANEW FOLIO dimension: approx. 6.75"x9"   (high quality faux leather cover)

 

 

 

  Thank you so much for your support! Please feel free to contact us for any questions, ideas and suggestions!
helloanewnote@gmail.com
