story:
Combine utility & pleasure with technology to rev up your day!

Ladies, Miss On the GoTM tones your pelvic muscles while delivering a vibrant experience – all controlled by its mobile app :

My own pleasure

Strong is the new skinny

Let the game begin

Choose and enjoy!



Kegel exercices? What are those?

The best way to help tone pelvic muscles. Just contract and release!

  • Increase pleasure for both you and your partner during intercourse

  • Help the pelvic recovery process after pregnancy

  • Prevent incontinence

  • Benefit from enjoyable sensations!


Details

  • Presale sold during the time of this campaign will contribute in part to the financing attributed to the fabrication of the mold

  • Estimated shipping time : May 2015

  • You must be at least 21 years of age to use the mobile app

  • Miss On the GoTM is for vaginal use only

  • Retail price: 169$

  • 1 year manufacturing and 4 years guarantee for quality of product

  • What do you get with your Miss On the GoTM:

    • The product itself!

    • Packaging made out of recycled material

    • A USB charge

    • A nice silk pouch for keepsake

    • A booklet including instructions


Miss VV will be pleased to answer all of your questions. Don't be shy!


About Miss VV's Mystery

The concept behind Miss VV’s Mystery is simple: a healthy sex life to inspire self‑confidence.

How did this project come about?

Passionate about well-being, eroticism as well as aiming for high goals, Miss VV studied management at UQAM and McGill. She then decided to make her dream come true: own her own business in a fascinating market in which she could use her knowledge, creativity and personal touch to enhance women’s lives first and far most and also couples.

More than the mere creation and production of a simple sex toy, Miss VV’s Mystery is the sum of this entrepreneur’s achievements that have led to an idea designed to give women choices according to their needs.

Made for today’s women who want to make their desires a reality!

Confidence is sexy.

story:
• SuXess c’est quoi ?

Une application (web ou smartphone) pour booster votre potentiel et générer la réussite de vos projets

Dans cette application, vous confrontez votre réalité avec les comportements avérés des personnes qui ont réussi et ressortez avec une identification rapide de vos talents, de vos faiblesses et des recommandations concrètes d’amélioration.

Après un test préalable, l’application vous proposera sous un format simple et convivial des clés d’amélioration (liens, formations, lectures,…) et des programmes adaptés à votre situation particulière.

Avec le soutien et sous la supervision de l’Université de Liège, la conception de cette application se fonde sur des théories bien connues et éprouvées relatives au succès mais également sur un travail d’observations d’experts dans l’accompagnement de dirigeants.

 

  • 3 arguments qui rendent SuXess indispensables

 

  1. Sortir l’entrepreneur/manager de son isolement, l’amener à réfléchir autrement et à booster sa motivation.

En 2018, plus de 10.000 entreprises faisaient faillite en Belgique, des plus grosses aux plus petites. Si les circonstances économiques y sont pour beaucoup, l’absence de remise en question des dirigeants est également un facteur prédominant. Mais c’est difficile. Le manque de temps, l’habitude, les finances ... le doute font que recourir à un coach ne semble pas toujours une option. Il en résulte une perte d’énergie qui percole directement dans la société.

En proposant une application qui permet à chacun de s’auto-évaluer rapidement, en toute discrétion, vous allez enfin prendre votre destin en main. Avec l’appui de SuXess, vous disposerez très simplement d’un regard extérieur sur vos propres talents (à cultiver) et sur vos faiblesses (à travailler). 

  1. Faire prospérer nos entreprises en rendant accessible au plus grand nombre des connaissances éprouvées sur le dynamique du succès.

De tout temps, des entrepreneurs et managers de même qualité, de même formation, placés dans des circonstances similaires ont obtenu des résultats bien différents.

La réussite à long terme n’est pas le seul fruit du hasard. Il est démontré que celle-ci relève d’un processus, d’un état d’esprit et de comportements qui, s’ils sont appliqués de façon constante, alimentent le cercle vertueux de la réussite.

C’est cette connaissance que nous voulons partager au plus grand nombre par une application web simple, et conviviale qui vous permettra de savoir où vous en êtes.

  1. Apporter des solutions adaptées au vécu de chacun, à portée de main…

L’application va plus loin, non seulement elle vous donnera une idée claire de votre potentiel à générer la réussite mais elle vous donnera des clés d’amélioration précieuses grâce au travail réalisé par nos experts, coachs de dirigeants et coachs personnels. Vous disposerez de liens, de formations, de diverses suggestions pour booster votre potentiel là où c’est le plus nécessaire. Ne perdez plus de temps.

 

  • La campagne de Crowdfunding : une occasion unique de soutenir un projet positif et faire gagner nos entreprises

Notre ambition est de lever 50 000 € pour financer le développement de SuXess .

Dès 20 €, vous pouvez nous apporter un soutien. N’hésitez pas.  Ne dit-on pas : « les petits ruisseaux font les grandes rivières »…

Votre soutien n’est pas obligatoirement assorti d’avantages particuliers. Cependant, pour remercier ceux qui le souhaitent, nous avons élaboré un programme d’avantages attractif :

  1. 20 € = notre gratitude et un arbre planté en Belgique,
  2. 50 € = notre gratitude et un arbre planté en Belgique + une bougie de massage bio,
  3. 100 € = notre gratitude et un arbre planté en Belgique + une bougie de massage Bio + un webinaire sur la gestion du temps,
  4. 250 € = notre gratitude et un arbre planté en Belgique + une bougie de massage bio + un webinaire sur la gestion du temps + 4 conférences inspirantes,
  5. 700 € = notre gratitude et un arbre planté en Belgique + une bougie de massage bio + un webinaire sur la gestion du temps + 4 conférences inspirantes + un Audit flash à choisir parmi 9 thématiques,
  6. 1250 € = notre gratitude et un arbre planté en Belgique + une bougie de massage bio + un webinaire sur la gestion du temps  + 4 conférences inspirantes + un Audit flash à choisir parmi 7 thématiques + SuXess

Les descriptifs complets des contreparties sont ici.

Dans le choix de passer par un crowdfunding pour financer cet outil, il est évident que nous avons pris en considération d’autres objectifs:

  1. Mobiliser notre réseau dans un projet positif,
  2. Faire passer un message sur l’ADN d’XPrience : l’humain et le développement durable,
  3. Créer un lien avec des personnes qui nous veulent du bien au travers de rencontres à l’occasion par exemple de conférences inspirantes ou l’envoi de petits cadeaux de remerciement…

Etapes du développement - timing

Notre projet se décompose en plusieurs étapes et devrait être finalisé pour juin 2020.

Etape 1 : Conception de la méthode - Etape 2 : Minimum valuable product (MVP) -

Etape 3 :  Test de marché - Etape 4 : Développements - Etape 5 :

Commercialisation. 

Dans l’hypothèse où nous n’atteindrions pas 80% de l’objectif initial, nous développerons les étapes 1 à 3 et rechercherons les fonds complémentaires préalablement à la mise en exécution des étapes 4 et 5. Ceci pourrait avoir une incidence sur le timing de finalisation.

 

Qui sommes nous ?

Différent des autres acteurs, XPrience propose un accompagnement de terrain basé sur un modèle collaboratif, au plus près de la culture, des valeurs et des besoins des entreprises. Notre ADN ?  Le profit à long terme ne saurait se construire sans considération de l’humain et de la planète.  XPrience conçoit avec ses clients des solutions concrètes et accompagne la réalisation de leurs projets.

Nous offrons un réseau de plus de 80 experts : professionnels du management, des ressources humaines, des processus de production, de l’informatique, de l’organisation, de la gestion de projets, de la chaîne d’approvisionnement, de la RSE et Développement Durable, etc.

Nos réussites sur ce type de projets

Grâce à son modèle collaboratif XPrience bénéficie de la mise en commun de compétences multiples (coaching de dirigeants, outils de leadership, analyse de processus, data science, …).

Sélectionné pour leur expérience et leurs qualités humaines, nos talents ont du reste été sinon eux-mêmes entrepreneurs, aux côtés d’entrepreneurs. C’est ce qui fait notre force et notre originalité. Faire marcher notre intelligence collective nous a notamment déjà amenés à développer des outils d’alignement stratégique ou une méthode en acquisition de talents aussi originaux que pragmatiques.

Le recours à cette méthode devrait sans aucun doute faire émerger une qualité d’outil remarquable.

Risques et challenges

Il est un fait que développer ce type d’outil peut sembler audacieux, tant il existe de cas de figure qui ne peuvent être totalement modélisés. La nature humaine et l’environnement sont d’une complexité telle qu’essayer de les modéliser au travers d’algorithmes présentera toujours un côté « réducteur ».

Le challenge informatique est également présent dans la mesure où au-delà de l’analyse nous souhaitons offrir à l’utilisateur un outil simple, agréable et instantané.   

L’association de l’ULg dans l’élaboration de l’outil permet déjà de s’assurer qu’il repose sur des fondations solides et une méthodologie adéquate. Pour le reste, nous croyons fortement que l’aide de nos experts sera précieuse si des écueils techniques particuliers devaient être surmontés.

D'avance nous vous disons un GRAND MERCI , pour votre contribution et/ou pour partager cette campagne sur les réseaux sociaux et auprès de vos proches. Merci Merci...

story:
What is the CRev?

We all use smartphones, PC’s and tablets and we do like if the same documents and pictures are available from several sources – that’s why we use Cloud systems. However, because of certain security issues that came to light recently, we started thinking about what will happen to the contents uploaded by us. How can we prevent unauthorised persons to have access to our data and files? As we know, some employees of online storage providers do have the rights to look into the contents uploaded by us, and providers have a duty to submit all requested data and content to the authorities. A good example here is Facebook, who not only looks into and trades with our content, but we constantly face problems where we don’t know who has access to our photos, data, and it’s uncertain whether the data deleted by us has really been deleted or if it will only be inaccessible for us in the future.

The digital era always held opportunities for merging tried and tested technologies, to make them better. With ever increasing technological advances, the different file sharing, cloud and social media users have ever increasing expectations towards developers. These expectations are more and more difficult to meet, as merging of different technologies is not an easy task. I would like to stress the importance of security, which is in the online world is becoming somewhat “exotic”.

I would like to introduce a revolutionary new technology that merges the benefits of social networks and Cloud systems, and by excluding the disadvantages it could create a user surface that satisfied both our social media and file sharing needs, without having to worry about security and accessibility.

People rightly expect to have access to their data anywhere, and anytime. The Cloud system was developed to serve this purpose. With the help of this system we can easily synchronise our data and devices connected to the Cloud, and also share it with our friends.

I will briefly explain the current technology, very simplified.

When we upload a document, photo or any data into the cloud from our PC, our file gets transferred onto the chosen cloud provider’s server. As soon as it is there it will be visible on our other devices, and it can be downloaded manually or synchronised automatically. If we share a file with our friends, it will be visible and accessible from their device as well.

The problem with this system is that we are at the mercy of the provider. If we don’t encrypt our content, everyone who has access to the server will have access to it. The other problem is that providers can cooperate with various authorities, who can have access to our data anytime.

If authorities see it fit, they can confiscate the providers’ servers, as it happened in the case of Megaupload. Hundreds of users have lost their files and documents.

Our technology works on a completely different basis. Our idea is to encrypt and split the data into pieces on the user’s PC. Because of the splitted and encrypted file doesn’t get uploaded onto any user’s PC in full, only one piece. There is no central server, no central control, so the user’s details can’t be obtained by overtaking those. Bitcoin works on a similar basis. The user however can access his data with his password anytime, from anywhere.

How does it works?

The program encrypts and splitting the content to be uploaded, one by one. After the splitting process the system uploads the bits of the content onto PC’s in the cloud at random. The receiving PC’s forward the data, until each piece is saved in at least 3 locations in the cloud.

 

 

The pieces of the user’s content could be saved anywhere, scattered around the world. The client software can track each piece of the content with the user’s username and password, even when installed onto a new device.

When the user wants to access his data again, the software instantly collects the pieces from the storage PC’s and unites them, then using the decryptor it eliminates the encryption, thus making the file readable again.

 

Naturally we can share content with our friends as well, the only criterion is that they have to install the software and join the network. There will be an opportunity to make certain content completely public, so anyone can join the cloud, and they will be able to see and download the public content.

A huge advantage of this system is that we are not dependant on any providers. The system is secure as no authorities can track what content each user has uploaded, and what PC’s the pieces of the data are on. We don’t have to worry about our provider going out of business or hackers accessing our data. The only disadvantage of the system is that if the user forgets his password, there is no way of accessing his data in the future.

How can we ensure the encryption works?

We’ll use strong encryption that is widely used (AES see Wikipedia: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Advanced_Encryption_Standard) and proven. All code will be released as open source. Every programmer can see how it works and validate that the encryption is safe. We promise that the access to the applications will always be free.

How much does it cost?

Using the system is virtually free. We only pay for it with the storage space reserved for the community. The system needs a minimum of 5 GB storage space on the user’s PC. It will basically use twice the storage size of the uploaded data. So if we upload 5 GB data into the cloud, the system will use 10 GB of storage space, thus ensuring that the community’s storage space will grow dynamically. Of course there will be an opportunity to manually set the offered storage space, so we can give more to the community. The client software is free, however a donation can be offered.

Our goal is to create a giant global storage that is completely non-reliant on servers. As there won’t be a server in the system, there won’t be a central control either.

Who we are?

We are a team of two developers and a designer-PR expert. The developers are working in the IT sector more than 10 years. We even had several pretty interesting projects, such as security monitoring system, Visitor guidance system.

 

Why do we need money?

cRev is our side project on which we work after hours. We would like to focus on cRev and offer it for free. And we need hire more people to make a result within a certain time. Without your donations, this won’t be possible.

As soon as it is there it will be visible on our other devices, and it can be downloaded manually or synchronised automatically. If we share a file with our friends, it will be visible and accessible from their device as well.
The problem with this system is that we are at the mercy of the provider. If we don’t encrypt our content, everyone who has access to the server will have access to it. The other problem is that providers can cooperate with various authorities, who can have access to our data anytime.
If authorities see it fit, they can confiscate the providers’ servers, as it happened in the case of Megaupload. Hundreds of users have lost their files and documents.
Our technology works on a completely different basis. Our idea is to encrypt and split the data into pieces on the user’s PC. Because of the splitted and encrypted file doesn’t get uploaded onto any user’s PC in full, only one piece. There is no central server, no central control, so the user’s details can’t be obtained by overtaking those. Bitcoin works on a similar basis. The user however can access his data with his password anytime, from anywhere.
How does it works?
The program encrypts and splitting the content to be uploaded, one by one. After the splitting process the system uploads the bits of the content onto PC’s in the cloud at random. The receiving PC’s forward the data, until each piece is saved in at least 3 locations in the cloud.
 

 
The pieces of the user’s content could be saved anywhere, scattered around the world. The client software can track each piece of the content with the user’s username and password, even when installed onto a new device.
When the user wants to access his data again, the software instantly collects the pieces from the storage PC’s and unites them, then using the decryptor it eliminates the encryption, thus making the file readable again.

 
Naturally we can share content with our friends as well, the only criterion is that they have to install the software and join the network. There will be an opportunity to make certain content completely public, so anyone can join the cloud, and they will be able to see and download the public content.
A huge advantage of this system is that we are not dependant on any providers. The system is secure as no authorities can track what content each user has uploaded, and what PC’s the pieces of the data are on. We don’t have to worry about our provider going out of business or hackers accessing our data. The only disadvantage of the system is that if the user forgets his password, there is no way of accessing his data in the future.
How can we ensure the encryption works?
We’ll use strong encryption that is widely used (AES see Wikipedia: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Advanced_Encryption_Standard) and proven. All code will be released as open source. Every programmer can see how it works and validate that the encryption is safe. We promise that the access to the applications will always be free.
How much does it cost?
Using the system is virtually free. We only pay for it with the storage space reserved for the community. The system needs a minimum of 5 GB storage space on the user’s PC. It will basically use twice the storage size of the uploaded data. So if we upload 5 GB data into the cloud, the system will use 10 GB of storage space, thus ensuring that the community’s storage space will grow dynamically. Of course there will be an opportunity to manually set the offered storage space, so we can give more to the community. The client software is free, however a donation can be offered.
Our goal is to create a giant global storage that is completely non-reliant on servers. As there won’t be a server in the system, there won’t be a central control either.
Who we are?
We are a team of two developers and a designer-PR expert. The developers are working in the IT sector more than 10 years. We even had several pretty interesting projects, such as security monitoring system, Visitor guidance system.
 
Why do we need money?
cRev is our side project on which we work after hours. We would like to focus on cRev and offer it for free. And we need hire more people to make a result within a certain time. Without your donations, this won’t be possible.

story:
Who are we?

We're !

Qrezy is small company out of Northern Virginia that bridges the gap between the digital and personal world. Qrezy was formed in 2011 with the goal of enhancing the aesthetics of QR codes. Over the years we have pivoted and re-focused on creating interactive experiences and storytelling tools. We’ve spent a year and half developing our first product and we’re proud to present, Qrezy Cards. 




What is a Qrezy Card?

Qrezy Cards are interactive cards that can connect people to digital content and receive updates at anytime.

Each card is a tool that will enhance the way you interact with people. They are ideal if you’re looking to share a new app, a song, presentation, a new product, documents, your portfolio, and so much more.

Qrezy Cards unitizes Near Field Communication (NFC) and Quick Response (QR) Codes.

- NFC or near field communication is a low power, short range communication between two devices. Smartphones with nfc, can simply interact with other nfc enabled devices to share data or information. 

- QR codes are 2d dimensional bar codes that can hold data and can be scanned from practically any smartphone with a camera to connect to that data.

NFC Example:

With NFC, no need to scan, simply tap the card and it will send people immediately to your digital content. 


QR Code Example:

By adding the code, anyone with at least a camera phone is capable of scanning the code to access the digital content.

Compatible Devices:

Apple’s new iPhone 6 has NFC, but unfortunately Apple has locked it from developers for the time being to focus on Apple Pay. Once they unlock the NFC capabilities the cards should be able to easily interact with the phones, but we will make an announcement and release a video once we can confirm.


Card Design:

We offer two design options, our designed presets or a custom design that you can submit!

Qrezy Card Design Presets:

  • 4 colors to choose from
  • Add your logo or name on the front
  • Information on the back
  • Badge: a small image that describes the digital content (Optional)
  • We'll add a QR code on the back to connect to your content. The code will be the same color as the card. 
  • Qrezy Code™ (Optional Upgrade*) - We can create a beautiful Qrezy Code in replace of the QR Code, to better reflect your brand.




Can't believe it? Try scanning them.


Custom Qrezy Card Design:
You can submit your own custom design by downloading and following our simple guidelines. At the end of the campaign you will send us the guideline with your design and we will begin production!

Download Custom Card Guideline


Qrezy Platform

Can I update my card?

Yes! You can update your cards with new digital content whenever you want. We have built a a very nice system that will allow you to easily update your card and even specify the device. 

What do you mean by specific device?

If you’d like to send people to different content based on their phone, that’s absolutely possible! Our system will allow you to direct any major device to a different location. 


For example, you can use one card to send iPhones to the App Store, Android phones to Google's Play Store, and Window phones to their app store. You have control of your cards!

You can control interactions with these devices: 
Android | Apple | Windows | Blackberry


Analytics as well!?
Absolutely! We have built an analytics system so you can see how often people are interacting with your cards, where they're being used, and which device are interacting with them.

Analytics free forever!?
We’re also offering lifetime access to analytics and future system updates for everyone that supports our campaign and purchases Qrezy Cards. This also applies to people who purchase more or different cards in the future. As long as you use your same account, you will have access to analytics and future updates free, forever! Following the campaign there will be a subscription fee for analytics and updates. 


Qrezy Card Benefits: 


Why are we fundraising?

I have already invested the time into integrating the technology, creating the design, choosing the right manufacture and creating a simple platform. Now I need your help to start production and find out if you're ready to be Qrezy!?

Perks:


When will I get the cards?

Following the end of the campaign, you will be able setup an account and send us your card details (Color, your logo, etc). After you approve the proof, then the timeline to get you your cards will begin. If you signup and send us the information in December 2014 we will have your cards to you by February 2015 or sooner. 

We will email you when your cards are on the way, with a tracking number. 


Risks & Challenges

There are two unlikely, but possible risks. 

1. If you’re unable to provide us with the details we need to create your card within a decent time frame, we may not be able to ship your cards to you within the February 2015 timeline. We want to get the cards to you as fast as possible, so please promptly send us the details we need following the campaign.

2. Our platform is hosted on secure cloud servers with a 99% uptime, but there is always that 1% risk of server outages, maintenance, updates or various complications. We will immediately contact all of our supporters if there is any significant server interference or modifications. 


Frequently Asked Questions

How do I get started?
Once you purchase Qrezy Cards, we need the following to begin creating your card:

  • Setup an Account to control your cards
  • Pick a color (4 Option)
  • Send us the information you want on the card (Logo, Name, badge, email, etc.)

If you’re purchasing a Custom Qrezy Cards, we need the following to begin creating your card:

  • Send us your custom design (Using our Guideline template)
  • Setup an Account to control your cards

Why only 4 colors?
We’re starting off with a few colors as we introduce our product. We will add more colors in the future.

Can I preview the card before it’s made?
Absolutely! We will send you a proof for confirmation before we make the cards.

When can I setup my card?
Following the campaign we will send invites to our platform where you can setup your card and send us the details we need to get started.

How do I control the card?
When you setup your card you will also be creating an account, which will give you the ability to update your card and access the analytics.

When will I get the cards?
Once you complete the card setup process, we will send you a confirmation of the card design. Once you confirm the design, we will then being the process of creating your card.

What is a device specific interaction?
A device specific interaction means that you can control how different devices interact with your cards. For example you can direct a Windows phone somewhere differ from an android phone, all while using the same card. Please take a look at our supported devices.

What are the card dimensions?
The dimensions are - 85.5 x 54mm. The card thickness is thickness is .84 mm.

Will the cards work on the new iPhone 6?
Yes and No. The iPhone 6 has a NFC chip inside the phone, but apple has locked it from being used for any other purpose other than Apple Pay, for the time being.

story:
UPDATES!!

First, second, and third stretch goals have already been met! Scholars will receive an upgraded metal-accented pen. The first 45 orders are receiving one of the original plastic pens and everyone will get a UDIC pinback button and anodized aluminum keychain. Two free items with every order!

Keychain can even be engraved with your Dragon name!
 

Why Spinners?

They're more fun than they may appear! Whether you need a focus aid or not, you can't resist the appeal of a fidget spinner. It may help concentration and the balancing action simply feels good in your hand. Adults, kids and even pets will enjoy playing with this hot new toy!

Why UDIC?

UDIC stands for Ultima Dragons - Internet Chapter. Ultima is a series of computer games from the 1980s and 90s created by Richard Garriott, better known as Lord British. The Ultima Dragons are traditionally the games' biggest fans. You can still register for membership today at udic.org.

The UDIC's new logo debuted during the buildup to the Ultima Dragons 25th Anniversary Bash, and this spinner toy uses a bright gold version on a red background. The pigments used for printing are resilient and long-lasting. A great gift for the Ultima fan or Dragon in your life! 

 

What is the funding for?

The funds are to produce and ship at least the minimum required number of spinners. If the demand exceeds this minimum, we will produce as many as necessary!

In addition to a spinner, you can nab some of the highly-sought-after loot items from the 25th Anniversary Bash. Some of the rarest Ultima Dragons collectibles were created exclusively for the Bash, and if you missed out on the metal collector coin or art print by famed Ultima artist Denis Loubet, here's your second chance!

 

What will I receive?

Everyone who pledges at Spinster level and above will receive at least one spinner. Several levels are available if you would like more spinners or more loot!

Spinners-only levels:

  • Spinster: 1 UDIC Spinner.
  • Spinmonger: 5 UDIC Spinners. Save 10%!
  • Spinmaster: 10 UDIC Spinners. Save 15%!
  • Spinlord: 25 UDIC Spinners. Save 20%!

Spinners+Loot!

  • Scholar Pack: 2 UDIC Spinners, Journal & Pen.
  • Art Enthusiast Pack: 2 UDIC Spinners + 16x24" Poster of Loubet art.
  • Cartographer Pack: Cloth map of Disneyland + 2 Spinners at 50% off!
  • Numismatist Pack: Limited Edition 25th Anniversary Silver Coin + 1 FREE SPINNER!
  • Art Connoisseur Pack: 12x18" Limited Edition Signed Loubet Print + 2 FREE SPINNERS!

What if I want more than one loot item?

Contact us to buy loot items separately! We can combine shipping for you too.

Aren't there more Ultima Dragons items available?

There are! We'll have a handful of additional prints and coins plus t-shirts, pins, keychains, and more. All items will be offered on the UDIC Stuff Store after initial orders are fulfilled. (Or write in for the list if you can't wait!) Some are few in quantity or were produced in limited-edition 25th Anniversary colors, so this is a chance to acquire some of these rare collectible items!

What if I miss the fundraiser?

We'll produce a few extra spinners, so if the campaign is over, you'll still be able to buy one. They'll run for $6 for a single spinner either way. The discounts and bundles offered here are exclusive, however!

 

What are the Risks?

The only real risk is not raising enough funds to have the initial order made. Beyond that, there is a chance the amount produced won't be enough to cover future demand, so pledge now to ensure you will get yours!

 

What if a spinner isn't for me? Can I still help?

From what we've seen, nearly everyone who picks up a spinner becomes a convert - the steady whir and gyroscopic feel are addicting! Even if you decide it's not your bag, share this campaign on your personal Facebook, Twitter, Reddit or other social medium of your choice - anywhere there may be Dragons lurking who might enjoy this nifty gadget.

 

Thanks for supporting this effort to bring joy to the UDIC!

Gallara Dragon
-==(UDIC)==-

 

The Loot!

Thanks for supporting this effort to bring joy to the UDIC!
Gallara Dragon-==(UDIC)==-
 
The Loot!

story:
Despite today’s technical advances a large number of active VTubers continue using mobile phone applications as mocap equipment for their performances. The main reason for that is the complexity of professional software and the high price tag for mocap hardware, putting upgrades out of many users’ financial reach. 


Morecap® and Kapture® are about to enter and revolutionize the market of VTubing devices and applications by addressing these limitations. The ZukunftWorks team’s goal is to eliminate complications with the use of mocap devices, offer the most user friendly software in the market, and make affordable VTubing devices easy to carry around for quick VTubing anytime.

 

This is what Kapture® was developed for.


Kapture® is the most user-friendly mocap hardware available in the industry today. Simply strap on the lightweight devices and start performing perfect motion capturing.


Every sensor of Kapture® comes with a built-in gyroscope while sensors are an amazing 50% smaller than conventional motion sensors boxes. Despite that, it comes at a very competitive price.

 

Kapture® is the world's first bluetooth motion capture system for live VTuber  performance. Traditional inertial motion capture systems in the market depend on  often unreliable 2.4G wifi to operate. 

 

By simply strapping the sensors on different parts of the body, Kapture®  is able to capture human body movements.

 

Kapture® hardware is designed to work with our top VTuber performance software -  Morecap® -  currently under intense development by the creators of Kapture® .

 

Morecap® is a software using capabilities of game engines, and come with an extremely intuitive user interface. No need to learn any code or memorize complex commands,  Simply install the software, choose your preferred mocap hardware and you are ready to go!! Just focus on your own performance of your virtual character. 

 

 

Our team’s goal is to integrate bluetooth technology and live performing arts creating the most user friendly hardware combined with the most intuitive software by adopting the advantages of BLE. 

 

 

  • Kapture® - Fully portable and instant setup motion capturing hardware using bluetooth for lower power needs and less radio interference than wifi.
     
  • Morecap® - Scalable in terms of integrating complex characters, props, scenes and virtual cameras for an extremely intuitive and workable solution.

 

Zukunft - our startup company -  is resolving these two bottlenecks once and for all. Morecap® and Kapture® integrate with a totally revamped design and an all-new user-friendly interface.

 

Morecap® and Kapture® 
the tools to let anyone become a successful VTuber - anytime, anywhere !! 
 


Morecap includes a Playable preset characters · Meibo. A anime sheep character supports all features in Morecap.
Creators can easily exchange or import their own Vroid characters.

《 モーションキャプチャー スターターセット 》 株式会社Too 好評発売中 ►

MORECAP®
SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS：
OS: Windows 7 SP+ 64 bits or later
Processor: Intel Core i5 third generation or later
Memory: 4 GB RAM
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 and up
DirectX: Version 11
Storage: 5 GB available space
 

COMPATIBLE MOTION CAPTURE DEVICE：
Kapture®
iPhone X and above (Face Cap required)
*Leap Motion Controller (WIP) 
 

The hardware development of Kapture is almost complete, and the product samples are very close to our ideals. Our outsourced production partners have a wealth of relevant experience and can definitely deliver the goods to us as fast as possible.

The current main framework of the software part has also been completed. In order to pursue a better user experience, we've been constantly updating the design details, hoping to bring you a more refined product. We are highly confident that we can produce ideal results in time.

Due to the great impact of the COVID-19 pandemic, depending on your location, the time of delivery and arrival of goods may be different. We are very aware of this situation and will do everything we can to let you receive the goods as soon as possible, no matter where you are.

We thank you for your continued support and hope to Kapture more fun with you soon!

No need to learn any code or memorize complex commands,  Simply install the software, choose your preferred mocap hardware and you are ready to go!! Just focus on your own performance of your virtual character.   Our team’s goal is to integrate bluetooth technology and live performing arts creating the most user friendly hardware combined with the most intuitive software by adopting the advantages of BLE.   
Kapture® - Fully portable and instant setup motion capturing hardware using bluetooth for lower power needs and less radio interference than wifi. 
Morecap® - Scalable in terms of integrating complex characters, props, scenes and virtual cameras for an extremely intuitive and workable solution.
 Zukunft - our startup company -  is resolving these two bottlenecks once and for all. Morecap® and Kapture® integrate with a totally revamped design and an all-new user-friendly interface. Morecap® and Kapture® the tools to let anyone become a successful VTuber - anytime, anywhere !!  Morecap includes a Playable preset characters · Meibo. A anime sheep character supports all features in Morecap.Creators can easily exchange or import their own Vroid characters.《 モーションキャプチャー スターターセット 》 株式会社Too 好評発売中 ► MORECAP®SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS：OS: Windows 7 SP+ 64 bits or laterProcessor: Intel Core i5 third generation or laterMemory: 4 GB RAMGraphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 and upDirectX: Version 11Storage: 5 GB available space COMPATIBLE MOTION CAPTURE DEVICE：Kapture®iPhone X and above (Face Cap required)*Leap Motion Controller (WIP)  The hardware development of Kapture is almost complete, and the product samples are very close to our ideals. Our outsourced production partners have a wealth of relevant experience and can definitely deliver the goods to us as fast as possible.The current main framework of the software part has also been completed. In order to pursue a better user experience, we've been constantly updating the design details, hoping to bring you a more refined product. We are highly confident that we can produce ideal results in time.Due to the great impact of the COVID-19 pandemic, depending on your location, the time of delivery and arrival of goods may be different. We are very aware of this situation and will do everything we can to let you receive the goods as soon as possible, no matter where you are.We thank you for your continued support and hope to Kapture more fun with you soon!

story:
Meet the Periodic Calendar...

 

 

Modeled on the Periodic Table of Elements, the Periodic Calendar uses a previously ignored dimension within our conception of time to reveal the full landscape of possible days and become a fully functional perpetual calendar capable of exploring the past, present and future!

While the best way to get to know the Periodic Calendar is to have a 16"x38" print of it right in front of you, there are a number of ways for you to acquaint yourself with it now, including below with A Taste of the Periodic Calendar.

Meanwhile, over at www.PeriodicCalendar.com you will always find the latest news and research into this new calendar system, including a copy you can zoom into for a closer look and the first episode of our Quick Start Series: Will the Real Fourth of July Please Stand Up?  Finally, on a daily basis we will be covering each element as they appear on the P-Cal Blog, along with discussions on how holidays and other observances should be handled in the Periodic Age. 

The Periodic Calendar is new to us all and I hope you join in as we explore this new way to look at time...

 

• • • • •

 

The "Who?", "What?" and "Why?"

My name is Joey Sellers and I'm a writer and conceptual artist originally from Memphis, TN, who currently lives in San Francisco by way of Brooklyn.

Ape Con Myth is a conceptual art think tank I started in 2007.  It's far more difficult to explain than the calendar, but if you are interested, www.ApeConMyth.com is always waiting for you with new wonders. 

Suffice to say, one tradition that has developed over the years is the Ape Con Myth calendar.  Usually a less than functional variation on the traditional wall calendar, this year's offering blows all of its predecessors off the wall.

Why should you contribute to the first major calendar debut of the 21st century?  
  • Whether you use it or not, it will look great on your wall 365 days a year.  Sometimes even 366.
  • When was the last time someone offered to unlock a new dimension of time for you?
  • As a perpetual calendar, it pays for itself in one year, yet can be passed on for generations to come. 

This is the last calendar anyone needs until we leave Earth and start orbiting other suns! 

 

• • • • •

 

The "How Much Do I Need?" and "What's In It For You?"

The basic goal of this campaign is to raise $1,000 to cover some of the printing costs of the first edition.  It's not the full amount, it's just how much I'm short, so your contribution will go directly to paying the printer and keeping Ape Con Myth and myself out of debt.

In return, there are some great perks available:

  • Top among them are prints of the calendar itself.  Don't miss the early bird special!
  • With the Personal Party Pack, you get a calendar, a commemorative magnet for your fridge, a button AND magnet featuring your very own Birth Element, plus a personal Thank You for your generous support!
  • Only three sets are available, but if you hurry, you could get "The Archive", which features all 5 Ape Con Myth calendars ever produced, covering 2008, 2009, 2011, 2012 and now with the Periodic Calendar, forever! 

 

• • • • •

 

The "Please Spread the Word" and "Stay Tuned"

After three long months of development, including two or three weeks now (I can’t remember) of working 10-14 hour days to get the Periodic Calendar’s 13,008 individual little pieces just so, making sure all the numbers check out and getting it ready for press, I’m sliding/collapsing into day one of this campaign with a video, a one page website and a hope that YOU will help me get the ball rolling these first few days by spreading the word!   
 
There are sharing buttons in every direction, so please, take a moment and locate the closest exit your favorite social network.

Meanwhile, stay tuned because there will be steady updates here and over at www.PeriodicCalendar.com throughout this campaign.  

Your support is greatly appreciated!!!

Thank you for your time and consideration!

Sincerely,
Joey Sellers
Chief Architect
Ape Con Myth
 

• • • • •

 

A Taste of the Periodic Calendar

 With the Periodic Calendar, you can explore the past...

 
 
... jet into the future...
 
 
...or dig right into the present.
 
 
Below you can see that 2013 is orange...
 
 
...which matches right up with the color-code you’ll find at every level of the Periodic Calendar...
 
 
...and tells us that 2013 is a Tuesday Year. That is, 2013 begins on a Tuesday, which brings us to the idea at the heart of this calendar. 
 
Years can begin on any of the seven days of the week, which is why your birthday falls on different day of the week from year to year.  Whatever day the year begins on creates a distinct layout of days, weeks and months that the Periodic Calendar refers to as the seven Year Types. 
 
Here’s our Tuesday Year, with active elements in color and inactive ones in gray...
 
 
... and now to bring it all together!
 

Don't worry if it all doesn't make sense the first time.  It might take a few years or even decades to get the hang of The Periodic Calendar, (I mean, it's going to take seven years to get through all the Year Types once) but that's just one of the reasons that this is the last calendar you will ever need!

For now, if you want to fall down the rabbit hole a little further, head over to www.PeriodicCalendar.com and use the above instructions to find your Birth Element.  If you need some assistance, tweet your birthday to @PeriodicCal and I'll help you find it!

story:
Short Summary

An idea to revolutionize how people visit archaeological sites

I'm Maya Exploration Center’s Director, Archaeologist Dr. Ed Barnhart, and I plan to develop a new series of apps for mobile devices that will allow tourists to hold a world class tour guide right in the palm of their hand.

These site specific travel apps will use the GPS capability of all mobile devices to guide their users around the ruins in a fun and interactive way.  Users will be able to ask, “where am I?”, or “bring me to this temple”, or “where should I go from here?”.  The app will have a whole host of information about each building or feature of the site available as text or audio files narrated by my voice.  Is a temple roped off and access restricted?  This app will have photos of what’s inside!  Interactive features such as incorporating a user’s own photos and videos will make the app a valuable scrapbook long after the visit and social media sharing features will let users share their experience in real time.

The first of these apps to be developed will be called TULUM and it will focus on the Maya Riviera ruins of the same name.  Advertised with a billboard in front of the ruins and brochures in Maya Riviera resorts and hotels, TULUM will be downloaded and used by a significant percentage of the over one million people who visit the site annually.  Distributed through Apple’s ubiquitous iTunes online Store, access will be easy and available from virtually anywhere on the planet.  Tulum’s 4G cellular data coverage and free wifi at the visitor center will make downloading the app a snap.

And by the way, you don't need to visit Tulum to enjoy this app.  It will be so full of information that it will be a like a whole e-book about Tulum in your pocket.

If you would like to see the full business plan, just email me at edbarnhart@mayaexploration.org

What We Need & What You Get

I've already contributed two months of research and $1000 to get the app developers I hired started. The development schedule is a short 9 weeks, so TULUM should be ready to launch by April.

The start up costs I need total $15,200.  That includes $9,000 for the app developers I've hired to build the app, $500 to buy the rights to specific photos and drawings, $2400 for three logistics trips to Tulum (scouting, mid-beta test, and final launch test), and $3300 for the first two months of advertising through brochures, tourist magazines and a rented billboard.  After the first two months of sales, the app will be able to pay the advertising costs on its own.


If we over shoot the funding goal, I will use it to increase the advertising scope with another billboard and more ads in tourism info magazines.  Anything left from the campaign after that will be donated to Maya Exploration Center. 

If we under shoot the funding goal, I'll take what we've been able to raise and find another way to fund the rest.  Anyone who knows me knows that I will find a way to make this app a reality.

The start-up costs for developing TULUM are modest, the upkeep of the product is minimal and the distribution is virtually free.  Once launched, proceeds from app sales will go to developing more site specific apps and Maya Exploration Center, a non-profit research and education institution that’s been teaching the general public about the ancient Maya and supporting the modern Maya communities for a decade.  When you contribute to the development of the TULUM app, you’re contributing to the appreciation of Maya civilization - past, present and future.

You can contribute as little as $1 and help get the buzz going, but the more you contribute the more you get.  I've made the contribution levels all important Maya numbers just for fun.  If you wonder why that number is important, contribute it and ask me to explain! 

I'm offering my 2013 Mayan Calendar wall calendar, MEC t-shirts, Maya astronomy books, and MEC annual memberships as some of the perks, but the largest contributor category will recieve an expenses paid adventure to Tulum to help me test the app live for the first time!  Their feedback will go into the final version and they will be named in the app as its patrons.

The Impact

The average tourist who visits Tulum with a desire to learn about its temples and history currently has two options.  They could walk around by themselves or hire a guide.  If they walk around by themselves, they can read the few weather-worn plaques in front of the major structures but they end up leaving with the impression that Tulum is an interesting pile of rocks.  They could hire a guide, but that will cost them $70 for two hours and they’ll hear mostly stories and myths about the site.  The TULUM app will be a third alternative, one that costs only 99¢ and provides them with more information than they could find anywhere else.

The TULUM app will also serve as a pilot program, to find out what works and what its users would like to see more or less of.  The next site specific apps will incorporate those suggestions to make an even better product.  Ultimately, the goal is to make an entire series of apps, letting people be their own guide in a multitude of archaeological sites!

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, you can be a huge help by spreading the word.  Just by sharing it on your Facebook page, clicking "like", or even telling your mailman about it. Word of mouth makes great things happen these days.
 
Indiegogo is already set up with tons of easy ways to share through social media that you can use.  The have something called the "gogo factor" that's an algorithim charting every time a campaign is looked at.  The more views a campaign gets the more prominently Indiegogo displays it on their website.  That means just by viewing and sharing you are helping me to find contributions.
 
Please help me make this first app!  Just this one app will fund the rest and completely change the way people visit archaeological sites.

story:
Build your empire with Theme K2. The next innovation in website building is finally here and we'd love your support to help bring it to life. K2 is designed by passionate marketers that eat, sleep and breathe everything digital. If you're looking to affordably grow or enhance your online business in 2019 then discover THEME K2.


What is Theme K2?

Theme K2 is a new and powerful, marketing-powered website builder - simplified for both, beginners and advanced users to build high-performing websites - fast.
 

Why is Marketing Important?

Every business or freelancer should be familiar with marketing - but often aren't, (it's a complicated subject), without it however, no business can thrive.

It's our mission to help the modern business or individual grasp digital marketing quickly and successfully. 

 

 


 

 



 

 

I first started designing websites 18 years ago -- and set up my own design company at the age of 16. After designing hundreds of websites and winning blue chip clients including Mercedes-Benz and Chrysler. I discovered a common problem in the industry which still stands true today..
 



"All our small-business clients would struggle to understand the concept of marketing to grow their business."



 

Most believed as soon as they had a website built, they would be instantly flooded with streams of customers, but unfortunately, this rarely happens.

So 2 years ago the idea of Theme K2 was born. We've spent days and nights working tirelessly around the clock to build a unique and powerful product to help you hit your online business goals without spending thousands of dollars with a design or marketing firm.


 


 


 


Theme K2 makes it so simple for non-technical users to quickly install, select and edit. It saves you SO MUCH time, you can also create your own design from scratch from a blank canvas too!

 


 

  • Over 20 1-click install headers (inspired by Award Winning Designs).
  • Choose from Top, Sidebar/Off-Canvas or Shopping Header layouts.
  • Choose Light or Dark colours or create your own. 
  • Set Transparency to show your hero image (see above example). 
  • Sticky, Shrink or fixed Header styles.
  • Add Taglines, Offers AND even Custom HTML is supported!

And Much more.....
​

 

 

We've included a whole host of simplified marketing tools all boxed in one convenient package
 

  • Best-practice guides every step of your build  
  • [K2R] Keyword To Replace, dynamically changes content on your website to match a users search from Google! Giving you hyper-relevant pages!
  • Built in SEO Title & Meta Tags, no need to install additional plugins or third party softwares. 
  • Schema Markup Language, built to help small, local businesses get more local business.
  • AMP - Accelerated Mobile Pages, get higher in search engine results, your pages load instantly! Google loves this. 
  • Conversion-focussed demos are tailored to help turn visitors into paying customers.
     


K2's Non-Exhaustive Feature List: 
 

  • 1 CLICK EASY INSTALLS
  • CREATE INDIEGOGO / KICKSTARTER PRE-LAUNCH PAGES
  • UNRIVALLED UK SUPPORT
  • RESPONSIVE, LOOKS GREAT ON MOBILE
  • CHOOSE FROM 20 BEAUTIFUL HEADERS
  • STUNNING, MOUTH-WATERING DESIGNS INCLUDED
  • EASY, SIMPLE & FUN!
  • SAVE TIME
  • INSTAGRAM AUTO SYNC
  • USER GUIDE NOT REQUIRED
  • REAL TIME MARKETING TIPS & TUTORIALS
  • BUILT-IN BEST PRACTICE GUIDES
  • 1 CLICK COLOR STYLING
  • ACCESS TO OVER 1 MILLION PROFESSIONAL IMAGES!
  • NO LOREM IPSUM
  • V.I.P SUPPORT AVAILABLE
  • SHOP FEATURES, SELL ONLINE
  • BEAUTIFUL BLOG LAYOUTS
  • PACKAGED FRONT-END DRAG & DROP PAGE BUILDER
  • WEBSITE DESIGN MADE FUN & AFFORDABLE
  • MAINTENANCE MODE
  • COMING SOON PAGES
  • BUILT IN POWERFUL MARKETING TUTORIALS
  • AMP - ACCELERATED MOBILE PAGES
  • SCHEMA - GET LOCAL BUSINESS VIA GOOGLE
  • LIGHTNING SPEED LOADING & SUPER LIGHT WEIGHT
  • [K2R] IT WILL BLOW YOU AWAY!

 

 

 

 
 
 
 
 

 

 




 

 

 

So Why Indiegogo? 

We want you to get your hands on Theme K2 as soon as possible. This is why we have been working day and night ahead of our launch on Indiegogo. 

Our product is not complete yet. With your support, we want to bring it to life and start working towards the next step in our journey together. 

The funds we raise from Indiegogo will be used to bring in additional developer support to help move our product to final release in a timely manner. 

Indiegogo funds will be used to invest into further development time for the following areas: 

 

1- Web Hosting Configuration: Setup server configuration for 1 click install and automation.

2- Core Development: Finalise the code, iron out any issues and quality test for 100% stability.

3- Support Channels: Create forums and support systems for our users to easily communicate.

4- Knowledge Base: Create and implement Marketing tips, tutorials and videos to help our users utilise the full potential of their website.

5- Extra Bonus Features: We’ll have some amazing features in our final release you’ll love to see. 


We’re excited and we hope you are too. Join us and take the first step towards building your amazing website. 

 


Risks and challenges

SPEED: As we attain and continue to grow a high number of users, naturally this will add more load to the servers.

SOLUTION: To tackle this we will invest in the most cutting-edge technology using pure SSD upgradeable servers with NGINX load balancing to offer unparalleled speed.

SUPPORT: As we continue to grow, so will the demand for support from our users.

SOLUTION: In addition to our standard first class support, we will invest into more technical support staff to cover more work load.
