Whatsmore, you can sign papers, prepare for presentations, edit emails, industrial drawing, share market exchanging, etc anytime and anywhere, With Minibook, you can break the limits of productivity : that is what we aim for, and we think you’ll agree, we’ve achieved it too!Share the MiniBook campaign with your friends and family to participate in our Referral Contest. Once they back the campaign directly using your referral link, both of you will get a EVA Bag  for FREE.Here are more instructions about how to participate in this referral contest:1. Log into your Indiegogo account. Then, click the ‘Link’ icon at the top of the campaign page .2. You will see a popup with your unique link. Copy your unique URL (shown below) and share it to your social media or email your friends, etc.Notes:1. Anyone who has backed CHUWI MiniBook campaign can participate in this referral contest.2. If the backer cancels their order or requests a refund before delivery, it will be regarded as an invalid order.3. Don't leave your unique URL in the comments on this campaign, it will be regarded as an invalid order.4. Don't forget to share after logging in the Indiegogo account, otherwise it will be regarded as invalid order.More detail ,please click:https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/203660683-How-to-Participate-in-a-Referral-ContestAt CHUWI, innovation is at the heart of our company. Earlier this year, we successfully delivered our AeroBook and UBook  product to more than 1500 backers who supported our mission to kick start a new laptop revolution. During this period, we had a batch of feedback from our supportive backers, with many requesting a powerful CPU but  a more portable size for next product. Our R&D team set to work considering “What if we lessen the device size while upgrade the performance, perhaps we could build something that’s ultra-compact but still energy efficient?”.  We never forgot, and it made us determined to make it to reality.MiniBook is an ultra-mobile Personal Computer，(UMPC). UMPC’s have been considered “dream chasing” for a long time, because getting the right balance of size and power is tricky, especially for devices running Windows.Where others have failed, undoubtedly because of limits of their hardware. inspiration would carry us, CHUWI goes beyond, to create a new generation device UMPC——MiniBook - after resolving the weaknesses of previous UMPC in performance, thermal taking, battery life and typing experience. At CHUWI, we want to bring the glory back to PC industry, to conquer every problem our predecessors struggled with. As early backers, we are keen to reward you with some unique perks. All MiniBook units claimed as perks will have at least 25% off the planned retail price. Plus, Indiegogo backers will be the first to receive their products.But more than that -  we would love you to join us on our journey to bring the product to life. Funds raised will go directly to funding the final design phases and manufacturing of the units ordered through the crowdfund. Oh - and if you like CHUWI MiniBook, please spread the word on social media or telling colleagues or friends about our campaign!1. We aim to provide rewards as scheduled, however, please understand that delays may occur due to supply chain or quality control issues. Including:▲Certification delays▲Production delays▲Supply Chain/Mass ProductionWe’ve done our best to forecast demand and we’ve learned a lot from past projects.  However,sometimes forecasts don’t always hit the mark.If this happens, we’ll be sure to keep you informed and work to quickly solve the problem to ensure you are with us every step of the way. We know that some crowdfunders have ended badly in the past - but never from CHUWI - we’ll always keep in touch with you, and welcome messages from you too!Please, do not hesitate to contact us at crowdfunding@chuwi.com . We are looking forward to answer any of your questions.2. Product specifications may change to ensure that the product is made as best as possible. If any changes occur, we will notify users in the “UPDATES” area of the crowdfunding page.

story:
Two crowdfunding campaigns helped us make Migo. As experienced developers of professional 3D printers, we want to redefine personal 3D printing with Migo.

We thought about 3D printers on the market and asked: How can 3D printers make life simpler and easier? What if they were portable to use when maintaining simplicity, and yet still have a good deal of versatility and connectivity? They could bring your creations to life!

Introducing Migo, the ideal printer!

Migo is the smallest portable 3d printer. Migo is internet-enabled, offering you a complete range of professional features. 

MIGO has an aluminum shell and components. Its minimalist design is a compact 155x195x270 mm. We meticulously designed every part to industrial standards.

Even printers with a larger build area cannot match Migo’s efficient volume to size ratio. The printing platform is 100x120x100 mm, a full 28% of the printer’s total area. Migo L, just 185x235x325 mm, features a build area of 150x150x150 mm. That’s 40% of Migo L’s total size!

Migo is equipped with TYPE-C, normally only used in high precision desktop 3D printers. We consolidated the extruder head’s power cord, signal cable, and other components into a single TYPE-C. This lets you plug-in and instantly print. 

Migo is equipped with high quality linear guidance. The printing head’s patented location system ensures stability and efficiency. The auto-leveling function detects and corrects leveling deviations, freeing your printing process unwanted external influences.   

Migo’s remarkable stability lets it print from 100 mm/s to a maximum 200 mm/s without sacrificing smoothness. A nozzle diameter of 0.4 mm, and a layer resolution of 0.05 mm with industrial lead screw, ensure consistently high precision, smooth surfaces.

Migo is more than a 3D printer. Replace the print head with our 1000 mw laser head and watch the magic! It can engrave soft surfaces — wood, leather, plastic, food and more. 

We’ve added a range of vibrant, professional-grade colors that appeal to children and families.

 

Migo Xmaker software is user friendly, letting you create and manage your own files. (STL/SLC/OBJ supported)

 

Pre-processed files allow you to check and adjust printing parameters and control, for 1 to 50 units simultaneously, letting you print different models at the same time. Build your own Migo printing factory!

We’ve added a teaching mode for the classroom. Anyone can use it if they have wifi or simply scan Migo’s QR code. Operate Migo even away from home to share its remarkable features with your family, friends and coworkers!

 

Every Migo is equipped with Ethernet, WiFi, and PC board based on ARM. So all the information can be uploaded to the processor. Wherever there is internet, Migo can: 1) Print uploaded files, 2) Check printing progress, 3) Start/ pause/continue/cancel printing, 4) Monitor image printing (except the basic version).

 

For the 3D printer novices, the biggest challenge is model design. With Migo, you don’t need to be a modeler. No matter your age or profession, you will find designs in the Migo Generative Design app. Choose your model, then print directly or modify it for your life. Except for models of daily items, Migo Generative Design has a powerful design function. Simply click and drag to make your own fantastic designs. 

Xmaker Apps 

We’re working to promote a community of Migo users. In addition to downloading designs, you can submit your own work. If we’re successful on Indiegogo, we will begin to add more designs to the community platform.

MakeX Company has 4 years experience in the field of 3D technology. We strive to provide professional 3D printers at affordable prices, so every creative person can make their dreams come true.   From the first generation of open source products M-ONE, M-Jewelry, to the third generation of targeted professional printers, M-Jewelry, each generation of our products have enjoyed great success and added to the wealth of our experience. With two years research, development and testing, and a consistent design philosophy, we are bringing Migo to you. At the same time, we're working with professional 3D printing manufacturers on hardware production and assembly.

Getting funded on Indiegogo means being able to maintain excellent printing quality while adding more functions in the near future, including dual printing heads, touch screens, CNC heads and more. So back us and, with your help, we’ll bring this marvelous machine, Migo, to you. Makex will never let you down! 

Risks and challenges

We are monitoring each step in Migo’s building process. We’ve built great relationships with our suppliers. We will only release a printer that meets the highest standards, and each printer will be strictly calibrated before leaving the warehouse. We are confident of our timeline and won’t make you wait a day longer than necessary.

story:
Overview...

Our goal is to create the best social/business/productivity tool available on all platforms; to integrate all data from your accounts and make it much more useful and easier to consume, search and relate.


The problem!

Nowadays we -the internet generations- are heavily dependent on online communities, platforms and tools. There are hundreds and thousands of networks and platforms available and the average user has 6-10 accounts and others may have 50+ accounts. We think this is really annoying for many reasons including -but not limited- to the following list ..
  • Too many networks means too many credentials to track and update all the time.
  • Too many networks means too many updates, context switch and apps/tools to keep track of what happens.
  • Almost each platform acts as an isolated island, the information is redundant, inconsistent and hard to track and relate.
  • Having many friends with different tastes and preferences would force you to create more and more accounts to stay on touch with all of them.

Project Overview...

We aim to build a cross-platform application on top of existing social networks and platforms. To provide one flexible interface that combines all their individual strengths, discover new and innovative ways to enrich this experience for individuals and businesses.



Just imagine what you can do by connecting all the social power of Facebook, Twitter, Sina Weibo and VK with the business power of LinkedIn, Xing and Yammer; added to the productivity of Pocket, Reddit, Stumble, and Pinterest; mixed with the advantages of Viber, Foursquare, Tumblr and Pinterest; combining all the space available on your PC, Phone, Tablet, One Drive and Box. Imagine all of this work as one platform, managed from one interface, communicating and feeding information to one another at real time.

The initial features and services we have in mind are listed below

  • Unified Social Feeds: a single interface for all social accounts with unique, customizable views across all devices.
  • Multi Sharing: sharing updates, photos, videos, location info or anything else to all you accounts, pages, groups at once.
  • Unified Messaging: a new secure messaging service for private communication,
  • Social Add-ins: a set of new features that can enhance the overall user experience for the existing social networks and platform (adding Dislike to Facebook for example).
  • Universal Search: visual search using all information available in all your social accounts and devices with info-graphics, statistics and data visualization.
  • Talent Management: an innovative service to cover the recruitment process from applying and screening to training and performance appraisals.
and this is just the beginning and we continue to add more and more in the future. We are open for any suggestions.


    Planned Platform Support!

    The initial goal is to release a native application for each of the following platforms at the first 6-9 months.

    • Android
    • iPad
    • iPhone
    • Web Application
    • Windows 8
    • Windows Phone 8

    In the future, we may consider other platforms like Mac, Chrome OS and other devices like XBox, Play Station and Smart TVs.


    The First Steps!

    It's a long road ahead but we already took our first step by launching Sharit for Windows Phone to enable multi-sharing across multiple social accounts and networks. We started last month with Facebook, LinkedIn and Twitter with only English UI; but it's almost updated every 1-2 weeks with more networks and languages. The current version supports sharing to multiple accounts on Facebook, LinkedIn, Tumblr, Twitter, VKontakte, Xing and Yammer with support for 10 UI languages (Arabic, English, Finnish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish and Hindi); and this is just a start. Additionally we are working to make it available to almost everyone as soon as possible through the web version.


    screenshots from sharit 1.4 for WP8


      What is Next...

      The final goal is very wide and to achieve it in the specified time, we would need much more resources and team members than we have now. We need to expand the team to include more developers, designers, testers and others to accelerate our progress even more.

      Meanwhile we can breakdown our plan for the first 6-9 months to the following items

      • Enhance the Windows Phone app.
      • Launch the Web version with mobile version optimized for iOS and Android.
      • Launch the Windows app.
      • Launch the native iPhone/iPad app.
      • Launch the native Android app.
      The order above is based on the current state and availability and it might change with new members being added to the team to speed up various platforms.


        Risks & Challenges!

        There are a number of important point that might impact the progress or achievement of our goals.

        • The team size and experience : this is by far the utmost challenge but with your support we could add the best members to the team. We already have an initial list but only waiting for the proper fund.
        • The networks to integrate: some networks are a must-have like Facebook and Twitter but there is a huge number of could-have and nice-to-have options that you would again play an important role in defining these priorities.
        • The features to add: there is no limit to what you can do by mixing all this social power together and Although we have many features in mind, we would always be open to new ideas and suggestions that would enrich your experience in every way possible.
        • APIs limits: There is a vast number of networks, each with their own APIs and most of APIs have limits in features or usage rates. This might affect our initial plans but with your increased support, we would be able to arrange future deals and provide the best possible experience.


        What if the goal is not met!..

        It's an important question indeed; so let me explain it a little bit.

        I should make it clear that Sharit is already under development and it would continue even if the goal is not met but -of course- in a slower pace. The 250K is estimated to accomplish the whole project vision with all features for all platforms and devices in a maximum of 10-12 months.

        If the goal is not met, we would continue the development in the same order mentioned in the "What is Next" section above and in the worst case, the app will be available as a Web Application and in Windows 8 during the next 3 months. The perks will be granted as coupons that you can redeem anytime when Sharit is available in your platform and you are ready to start the premium membership.


        Ways You Can Help...

        Being here reading these words means alot to us and your contributions would be highly appreciated, we added some Perks for your convenience; each with different options including free premium membership, discounts on future purchases and badges for your accounts to show our appreciation.


        We understand that some may not be able to provide a contribution right now, but that doesn't mean you can't help us by spreading the word about this project using any of the various Indiegogo sharing tools! And for your convenience, all referrers will be rewarded with the perk equivalent to the sum of their referrals  contributions + their own contributions if any (if your referrals contributed 75$ and you didn't contribute, you will get the 50$ perk but if you contributed 25$, you will get the 100$ perk and so on).


        Thanks.

story:
Brief summary

  • Who are we ?

​At OutNest, we come from different backgrounds, but we all have one big common trait: we are all students or former ones! From HEC Lausanne to CREA Genève, going through EPFL. Our team is composed of different profiles, with various competencies and experiences that complete each other. 

  • What is OutNest and how did we get the idea ?

ON is a mobile app based on two main aspects (information / social) and four sections (academic information + practical information / meetings + recommandations). We designed each section to respond to existing student needs.  We observed most of these needs thanks to a survey sent to hundreds of students on different campuses in the Lausanne area. 

Formerly designed to help travelers inspire each others, our concept changed course during the UNIL-HEC Accelerator in 2016. This program, created by the Fondation HEC and supported by the Université de Lausanne, allowed us to see that we needed to change our former idea if we wanted to create something sustainable. It helped us to move on then and focus on a target not too far from travelers: international/exchange students! Driven by their will to study abroad, to discover other cultures and to meet other people, they are travelers too. Besides, we knew a lot of students who left their hometown to explore the world through their studies, and some of us did the same.  Now that we identified the different issues, and after having observed student needs, we decided to find a way to enhance their overall experience abroad. 

  • In what way is OutNest bringing something new into the student life ? 

Our observations allowed us to see what were the major issues for students away from home. It appeared that they often feel lost, or taking way too much time to find the information that they need. Between the tedious administratives procedures, the beginning of the courses, the time to adapt to a brand new surrounding, and so on... Students have a lot to think about. Thus, the best way to help them is to centralize this information, in order to settle quickly and to enjoy their new home as soon as they possibly can! 

To do so, OutNest proposes a mobile app, free and intuitive, that is structured this way: 

  • Information part :  
    • About the University : in this section, the university/school is able to communicate directly to its students through many options (push notifications, news wall, interactive maps, instead of never-checked emails or huge websites...), for the payment of a yearly license. The university can see what kind of information or subsections to be posted. It can be flexible. OutNest will also provide it with monthly stats reports on students' behavior and needs on the app, in order to improve its services. 

 

​

 

  • Practical information : that concerns help in the search for housing, transports, administrative procedures, general costs, mobile plans, bank account, insurances. OutNest does not host every information on its platform, but it leads the student directly to the right place to find it. 

 

  • Social part : 
    • ​Meetings with other students from their campus or all across the country: this section allows students to meet others at their university or in other cities/area of Switzerland. They can also propose activities here and share them with people of their faculty, with the same interest, etc... One of the key features of this section is a meeting tool (working with filters) that can help you meet up with other students instantly, if you have nothing to do on lazy afternoon for example... 

 

 

  • Recommandations for places/activities from students for students : We all used apps that help us navigate and find the good spots, but let's not lie to ourselves, we've all been already disappointed by these tools. Especially when this "Five-stars" bar has been rated mostly by people who do not necessarily have the same interests or taste as you do. OutNest wants students to receive only recommandations from other fellow students! In addition to that, the users are also able to add filters in order to refine their search (by interest, budget, etc...). 

 

 

 Why we need your support... 

In order to develop our concept and to finalize the first prototype of our app that we are currently developing with the Junior Entreprise EPFL, we need your generous support! ;) Our objective is to reach 5'000.- EUR. This prototype, which will contain all the main features above, will help us to find major investors and to raise more significant funds. This step is the cornerstone of our project! Once we will have found investors, we will be able to go on with our first launchable version, that we hope to be ready for September 2018, for the start of the academic year.  

As our main concept is  not about selling t-shirts or saving pandas, it is hard to give you some cool rewards... However, let's show you how you concretely help us: 

  • Bachelor: 10 EUR. A month of web hosting,
  • Masters: 20 EUR. The price for a visit card set,
  • PHD: 50 EUR. One hour of development,
  • Professor: 100 EUR. 10 seconds of promotional video,
  • Dean: 500 EUR. Price of a social media campaign,
  • Rector: 1000 EUR. Price of the branding.
  •  If we do not reach our goal with this campaign, we will continue to move on with the help you will have already given us until then. Every penny counts, and it will help us all the same. 

 

How OutNest is bringing something new...

  • OutNest is a brand new concept that tackle students' current major issues, a mobile platform that offers all they need in the same place, and will allow schools and universities to better communicate with them.
  • We want to improve tomorrow's student life, be a part of it!  

 

What challenges are expecting us ? 

As the project is growing, challenges are bigger too. After this campaign, our next goal is to achieve a fundraising with the help of major investors. In order to reach these people, we need some credibility first. That is what we are looking for here. 

  •  Challenges are meant to be overcome. A lot of work has been done since the beginning of this project, and we are on the right track. The interest and the support from universities and student associations across Switzerland for us so far is a huge step forward. 
  •  In order to achieve our goals, we are constantly working on improving our skills and complete our team. Since the beginning of the summer, we can count on a new brand manager and a new developer. Reassessment and humility are part of our main leitmotivs. We are still learning, but we are improving too! 

 

There are other ways to show your support...

You want to help but don't have the means for it? Don't worry, there are always other ways to help take OutNest to the next level! :) 

  •  Do not hesitate to share this page with your friends and network.
  •  Spread the news about OutNest! 

On behalf of our team we thank you for your precious help! 

The OutNest Team
story_txt:
Brief summary
Who are we ? 
​At OutNest, we come from different backgrounds, but we all have one big common trait: we are all students or former ones! From HEC Lausanne to CREA Genève, going through EPFL. Our team is composed of different profiles, with various competencies and experiences that complete each other. 
What is OutNest and how did we get the idea ?
ON is a mobile app based on two main aspects (information / social) and four sections (academic information + practical information / meetings + recommandations). We designed each section to respond to existing student needs.  We observed most of these needs thanks to a survey sent to hundreds of students on different campuses in the Lausanne area. 
Formerly designed to help travelers inspire each others, our concept changed course during the UNIL-HEC Accelerator in 2016. This program, created by the Fondation HEC and supported by the Université de Lausanne, allowed us to see that we needed to change our former idea if we wanted to create something sustainable. It helped us to move on then and focus on a target not too far from travelers: international/exchange students! Driven by their will to study abroad, to discover other cultures and to meet other people, they are travelers too. Besides, we knew a lot of students who left their hometown to explore the world through their studies, and some of us did the same.  Now that we identified the different issues, and after having observed student needs, we decided to find a way to enhance their overall experience abroad. 
In what way is OutNest bringing something new into the student life ? 
Our observations allowed us to see what were the major issues for students away from home. It appeared that they often feel lost, or taking way too much time to find the information that they need. Between the tedious administratives procedures, the beginning of the courses, the time to adapt to a brand new surrounding, and so on... Students have a lot to think about. Thus, the best way to help them is to centralize this information, in order to settle quickly and to enjoy their new home as soon as they possibly can! 
To do so, OutNest proposes a mobile app, free and intuitive, that is structured this way: 
Information part :  
About the University : in this section, the university/school is able to communicate directly to its students through many options (push notifications, news wall, interactive maps, instead of never-checked emails or huge websites...), for the payment of a yearly license. The university can see what kind of information or subsections to be posted. It can be flexible. OutNest will also provide it with monthly stats reports on students' behavior and needs on the app, in order to improve its services. 

 
​
 

Practical information : that concerns help in the search for housing, transports, administrative procedures, general costs, mobile plans, bank account, insurances. OutNest does not host every information on its platform, but it leads the student directly to the right place to find it. 
 
Social part : 
​Meetings with other students from their campus or all across the country: this section allows students to meet others at their university or in other cities/area of Switzerland. They can also propose activities here and share them with people of their faculty, with the same interest, etc... One of the key features of this section is a meeting tool (working with filters) that can help you meet up with other students instantly, if you have nothing to do on lazy afternoon for example... 

 

 

Recommandations for places/activities from students for students : We all used apps that help us navigate and find the good spots, but let's not lie to ourselves, we've all been already disappointed by these tools. Especially when this "Five-stars" bar has been rated mostly by people who do not necessarily have the same interests or taste as you do. OutNest wants students to receive only recommandations from other fellow students! In addition to that, the users are also able to add filters in order to refine their search (by interest, budget, etc...). 
 


 
 Why we need your support... 
In order to develop our concept and to finalize the first prototype of our app that we are currently developing with the Junior Entreprise EPFL, we need your generous support! ;) Our objective is to reach 5'000.- EUR. This prototype, which will contain all the main features above, will help us to find major investors and to raise more significant funds. This step is the cornerstone of our project! Once we will have found investors, we will be able to go on with our first launchable version, that we hope to be ready for September 2018, for the start of the academic year.  
As our main concept is  not about selling t-shirts or saving pandas, it is hard to give you some cool rewards... However, let's show you how you concretely help us: 

Bachelor: 10 EUR. A month of web hosting,
Masters: 20 EUR. The price for a visit card set,
PHD: 50 EUR. One hour of development,
Professor: 100 EUR. 10 seconds of promotional video,
Dean: 500 EUR. Price of a social media campaign,
Rector: 1000 EUR. Price of the branding.
 If we do not reach our goal with this campaign, we will continue to move on with the help you will have already given us until then. Every penny counts, and it will help us all the same. 

 

How OutNest is bringing something new...

OutNest is a brand new concept that tackle students' current major issues, a mobile platform that offers all they need in the same place, and will allow schools and universities to better communicate with them.
We want to improve tomorrow's student life, be a part of it!  


 
What challenges are expecting us ? 
As the project is growing, challenges are bigger too. After this campaign, our next goal is to achieve a fundraising with the help of major investors. In order to reach these people, we need some credibility first. That is what we are looking for here. 

 Challenges are meant to be overcome. A lot of work has been done since the beginning of this project, and we are on the right track. The interest and the support from universities and student associations across Switzerland for us so far is a huge step forward. 
 In order to achieve our goals, we are constantly working on improving our skills and complete our team. Since the beginning of the summer, we can count on a new brand manager and a new developer. Reassessment and humility are part of our main leitmotivs. We are still learning, but we are improving too! 

 

There are other ways to show your support...
You want to help but don't have the means for it? Don't worry, there are always other ways to help take OutNest to the next level! :) 

 Do not hesitate to share this page with your friends and network.
 Spread the news about OutNest! 

On behalf of our team we thank you for your precious help! The OutNest Team

story:
The 30° Ruler is BACK !

After a successful The 30° Ruler 1.0 campaign, $62,160 funded with 2,360 backers and delivered 7000+ rulers, we wanted to visualized things through new size [20cm], new feature [start at zero] and more...  

 

Life is best when simple things work...

When we create our designs we use a number of tools and it was while we were designing some of the others that we thought it was about time we looked at one of those tools in a new light.

The Ruler is a classic example of a design that's remained unchanged for generations. Aside from evolving from wood to metal and then to plastic, the core design is the same as it was when our grandparents went to school.

Well, not any more... Allow us to present the 30° Ruler 2.0

 

What makes 30° ruler different?

The key change we've added is a 30° slope on the ruler's face. It's a simple, yet incredibly effective, update and it makes the 30° Ruler soooo much easier to use. 

 

Easy Reading

The 30° Ruler does away with teeny measurements, instead opting for large fonts and clear indications. This means you can read the measurements at a distance and you'll always be sure to make your mark.

Places its measurements at a comfortable 30° degree angle. This simple improvement means you no longer have to lean over to use the device, thus improving your posture and at the same time making your life easier.

 

Start at Zero

Unique zero starts design makes it possible to measure directly with high accuracy – Start from the edge of the ruler up to an item you are measuring and get an accurate reading quickly and easily.

measure freely

 

Easy to Grab

Easier to pick up from any surface than a traditional ruler. 

 

Non-Slip

3D construction inherently non-slip and will keep its place perfectly every time. 

 

Safe for Cutting

 

Two in One

Simple, yet effective design we have created a ruler that incorporates two different measurements on both sides.

 

Laser Targeted & Durable 

Perfect combination of Aerospace grade aluminum and superb engineering resulting in the right balance of great looks, strength, precision and lightweight portability.

A deep everlasting finish is not the way traditional rulers are made. Laser-engraving is complex, time consuming and comes at a price... but then the 30° Ruler is not just any ruler.  

 

Your Choice of Measurements and Sizes

Our lovely backers will have the options of 3 different measurements and 3 lengths of S/M/L.

story:
Hello, we are The Antlers.

You may know us from Mike Alden's now famous, "Top 10 reasons I quit Mizzou."

Anyway, we made this campaign at first to buy the ZouBus, which we found for sale when one of our new guys was browsing casual encounters on craigslist. However, it has apparently already been sold, so we decided "Fuck it, we'll make our own bus, with blackjack and hookers." (Blackjack and hookers to be added on as stretch goals).

You may be asking yourself, "But why don't you just buy your own bus instead of making us pay for it?" Well, the truth is we're poor dumb alcoholics college kids who spend all our money on Keystone, so we don't have money for a bus. We're asking for you to buy us one, because that's how the internet works these days.

What would we do with a bus?
I don't know, drink in it? What else would you do in a bus made for tailgating? Maybe we'll use to to go to away games and harass the other team cheer on the Tigers. Listen, we haven't really thought this through. We just saw a bus and thought, "Yeah, let's get a bus"

Why should we buy you a bus?
Have you ever looked at the Antlers and thought, "Man, those guys belong on the short bus,"? Well, now's your chance to get us our very own bus.

We Antlers want you all to know that we have a passion for buses fueled by countless hours spent watching online documentaries set in the back of buses, and we want to assure you this bus will be used to the fullest of it's potential. 
Still not convinced? Then check out our fabulous perks!

story:
DeskSpace Solar Mood Lamp - Bring The Power of the Sun Into Your Home

The sun is the most beautiful and powerful force in our solar system. It represents life and brings joy into our day. We have recreated this life force with our Sun Mood Lamp. Created using Golden Calcite - prized for its mesmerising texture and clarity - to allow the light to spread within the sphere and to radiate into the room. We create each piece individually, ensuring yours is as unique as you are. We handcraft each set and polish it to perfection. Bring the sun into your home and capture a small part of that power.

 

 

A perfect gift for a friend or loved one

The DeskSpace Sun Mood Lamp is both beautiful and stylish and makes the most wonderful timeless gift that can last a lifetime. The soft glow is ideal for bedrooms, to create an ambient environment in a lounge or a perfect desktop accompaniment to enhance any workspace. Most of us have looked to the sky and marvelled at the natural force that brings us warmth and light - imagine having that offered as a gift?

 

Stylish and sophisticated accessory for the home and office

The soft and warm light that emanates from our Solar Mood Lamp is ideal for any room or workspace. Without overpowering the senses, this light is visually striking and will create a gentle glow in any room. Perfect as a subtle night light for the bedside table or to capture the beauty of your desk accessories or a row of books on your shelf. It is more than just light - this is a room-enhancing glow that gives a sense of relaxation and peace.

 

 

 

Beautiful and Touchably Smooth - A Long Journey to the Right Material

How to capture the beauty and brightness of the Sun? We worked tirelessly to source the exact material that would showcase the unique way that the sun emits light. The material needed to be able to both encase the light and emit it gently and evenly. Our worldwide search resulted in Golden Calcite - a unique crystalline structure with a translucent appearance that has a softness and warmth that we could not find in any other material. When the light is not turned on, this globe is a stunning accessory for your room. However, switch on the light and the gemstone comes to life creating a focal point that will draw the eye and relax the soul. With a smooth surface that simply calls out to be touched, this is a creative gift that will win the hearts of all.

 

DeskSpace: Contemporary - Modern Style for the Modern Home

The Solar Lamp is the first product in our new contemporary range creating a more modern feel using metal instead of hardwood. The new contemporary range combined with our classic range means DeskSpace can fit perfectly into any style of home or working environment. We started to make this distinction with the base, which uses aerospace grade aluminium that has been anodised to a Deep Space Grey. The highly mirrored finish of the logo perfectly sets the tone for this piece and the added technology of a bespoke magnetic charging cable (also anodised to match the base) gives you the discretion you need. We never want to detract from the gemstone and therefore discrete technology that is as beautiful and minimalist as the piece itself is important to us. We know it is important to you, as well.

 

A DeskSpace Mood Lamp to Meet All Your Needs

We believe that our products should fit with your lifestyle and be individualised to your requirements. We offer the Solar Mood Lamp in three different sizes to suit any space and each can have the LED lighting adjusted to fit your mood. The illumination can range from a soft mood light to a brighter focal point - but always the Golden Calcite ensures the light is diffused and softened.

Large 8cm +/- 0.5cm | Medium 6cm +/- 0.5cm | Small 4cm +/- 0.5cm
 

 

Size Comparison between Solar Sun Mood Lamp (S) and Planetary System

Size Comparison between Solar Sun Mood Lamp (M) and Planetary System

Size Comparison between Solar Sun Mood Lamp (L) and Planetary System 

 

              

Build Your Knowledge of the Universe

Here at DeskSpace, we love to offer a little extra. When you buy your Solar Mood Lamp, we also give you a high quality, heavyweight booklet full of interesting and sometimes, intriguing facts about the Sun. Filled with detailed images, this book is the perfect addition to the light. Our base design allows for the book to nestle inside, so you always know where to find it. If you have someone in your life who loves space, this is the perfect combination gift.

 

From Our Minds and Into Your Home

The Sun was not created overnight and neither is our DesSpace Solar Mood Lamp - in fact we spend a very long time perfecting the shape and the glow so that you can delight in the quality. Our craftspeople hand shape every piece of gemstone into a perfect sphere before carefully polishing it to a glass-like shimmer. This takes time, but getting it right is not worth rushing.

 

  • We use Golden Calcite that is mined in Mexico. We choose only those mines that are sympathetic to the environment and where the material is in plentiful supply.
  • Each raw gemstone is then washed to prepare for the next stage of processing.
  • We use high quality diamond edge saws to cut each gemstone into smaller cubes according to the small, medium and large sizes that we offer.
  • Our craftsmen now shape each cube, by hand, into a sphere using a diamond grit grinding wheel. The shape is achieved by eye and takes the work of a true experienced and dedicated craftsman.
  • The spheres now go through our grading and measuring process and any that are not perfect are rejected.
  • A final grinding is used to achieve a final perfect shape, before each stone is polished on a buffing wheel. The individual shine and glow of each stone is now revealed.
  • We now prepare the bases using a Tungsten tipped cutting tool. We send these for anodising to achieve the Deep Space Grey colour.
  • Using a special process of polishing, masking and sandblasting we are able to achieve a highly mirrored DeskSpace logo against a modern matte grey finish.
     

A Gift That You’ll be Proud to Give 

We know that the unboxing of any gift is part of the experience and we have designed our presentation box with the unwrapping in mind. We use only the highest quality rigid gift box and we protect every element with layers of EVA foam. The bespoke magnetic cable, information booklet, cleaning cloth and letter of authenticity (including a unique serial number) set off the gift perfectly - allowing the receiver to uncover more and more layers of excitement as they delve deeper.

 

  • Handcrafted Golden Calcite Sphere
  • Custom made CNC metal base from Aerospace grade Aluminium
  • Magnetic USB charging cable
  • Information booklet about the Sun and our Solar System
  • Letter of Authenticity with unique serial number
  • DeskSpace branded felt polishing cloth
  • Separate inner boxes layer with EVA to protect the Gemstone and metal base 

 

Contemporary DeskSpace – Gemstone Solar System Set (Limited Edition Preview)

DeskSpace is a company that revels in all things “space”. Our Solar Mood Lamp is just one of our products - we also offer the stunning DeskSpace Solar System Set. This new set is a step forward from our original Solar System set as it features our bespoke anodised aluminium base and therefore works perfectly as a matching item with the Solar Mood Lamp. The Solar System Set is currently available in a limited run to be purchased alongside the large Solar Sun Mood Lamp - we suggest getting in early to get your hands on these first sets before they are fully released.

Solar Sun - Mood Lamp (L) 8cm



Planetary System Set - Aluminium Base* 
(limited run to be purchased alongside the Large Solar Sun)

 

Solar System Set - Aluminium Base
(Solar Sun Mood Lamp + Planetary System Set)

 

DeskSpace - Solar Sun Classic

Perfect for anyone who prefers a minimalist, artisanal approach. The Solar Sun Classic comes with a solid Walnut wooden base that matches perfectly with the original DeskSpace - Planetary System Set. Each gemstone is highlighted for its original beauty and will look stunning on the classically designed wooden stands provided. Championing the unique materials in a timeless design the Classic collection does with cables and electronics, therefore it has no light functionality.

Solar Sun - Classic (L) 8cm

 

Planetary System Set - Walnut Wood Base
(discount promotion alongside the Large Solar Sun Classic)

Solar System Set - Walnut Wood Base
(Solar Sun Classic + Planetary System Set)

 

Metal Base Upgrade for Existing Customers

We are also offering our original Kickstarter supporters the metal base from the upcoming Solar System Set for the discounted price of $29 if you wish to upgrade. This will be available to be purchased separately on our store after the campaign has finished.

 

Who's Talking About Us

 

 

The Rewards

 

The DeskSpace Community

 

Here's a small sample of the hundreds of positive comments left by some of our thousands of happy customers.

 

Thank You For Making DeskSpace a Reality

We would like to thank each and every one of you from the bottom of our hearts and we couldn't have made DeskSpace without your initial support. It's been an exciting and sometimes gruelling (assembling the first 1,500 units by hand) journey this past year, but all the time and effort has been worth it a thousand times over. It is still just the three of us working on this tirelessly and we want to make sure every product we release is the best possible product it can be. As we've grown as a company we've relied on the continued support of our craftspeople, manufacturing and distribution partners, and most importantly from each of our life partners. We try our absolute best to ensure everyone is 100% satisfied with their product and we will rectify any issue you have to make sure you get the perfect piece that will last you decades to come.

 

The DeskSpace 100% Satisfaction Guarantee

At DeskX we pride ourselves on quality and have hundreds of positive reviews piling up from the launch of our first product. We want to make sure you are 100% happy with your DeskSpace products. If you feel there are any issues with your product you can contact us directly at support@deskx.co and we will be there to help resolve any issues until you're completely satisfied. 

Please note however that our gemstones are products of the nature. Therefore variations in color, pattern, texture and veining from piece to piece are unavoidable. No two pieces will be exactly alike, this is what makes your DeskSpace completely unique. These differences and variations create the beauty of natural handcrafted gemstones. 

We try our absolute best to match each gemstone as closely as possible as the samples shown online, but these are put in place to give you a general idea about the appearance of each of the gemstones. Please note that changes in lighting may cause the products to look slightly different in real life than those shown in images online and that multiple orders of the same item might not be an exact match.

 

Risks and challenges

Since the successful launch of our first product, the DeskSpace Solar System set we've become an established company with reliable vendors and hundreds of positive reviews from happy customers so there isn't much of a risk in backing the Sun Mood Lamp. Our materials have already been sourced, and have people on the ground to oversee the pre-production runs to make sure everything goes smoothly.

The only remaining risk to backers is that of schedule. A range of issues can arise during the handcrafting of the gemstones as each is selected and shaped by hand. Only once a significant amount of time has been spent on shaping can our craftspeople tell if this gemstone meets our standards. Due to the natural nature of gemstones we can't predict with complete accuracy the time and scrappage rates. If something arises that will take time to fix or rework will opt to push the schedule back slightly to make sure it's done right over shipping a substandard product. We will be in constant communication with you throughout the production process and you will been informed early on if anything unforeseen arises that is going to cause slight delays.

Our craftsmen now shape each cube, by hand, into a sphere using a diamond grit grinding wheel. The shape is achieved by eye and takes the work of a true experienced and dedicated craftsman.
The spheres now go through our grading and measuring process and any that are not perfect are rejected.
A final grinding is used to achieve a final perfect shape, before each stone is polished on a buffing wheel. The individual shine and glow of each stone is now revealed.
We now prepare the bases using a Tungsten tipped cutting tool. We send these for anodising to achieve the Deep Space Grey colour.
Using a special process of polishing, masking and sandblasting we are able to achieve a highly mirrored DeskSpace logo against a modern matte grey finish. 
A Gift That You’ll be Proud to Give We know that the unboxing of any gift is part of the experience and we have designed our presentation box with the unwrapping in mind. We use only the highest quality rigid gift box and we protect every element with layers of EVA foam. The bespoke magnetic cable, information booklet, cleaning cloth and letter of authenticity (including a unique serial number) set off the gift perfectly - allowing the receiver to uncover more and more layers of excitement as they delve deeper. 
Handcrafted Golden Calcite Sphere
Custom made CNC metal base from Aerospace grade Aluminium
Magnetic USB charging cable
Information booklet about the Sun and our Solar System
Letter of Authenticity with unique serial number
DeskSpace branded felt polishing cloth
Separate inner boxes layer with EVA to protect the Gemstone and metal base 
 Contemporary DeskSpace – Gemstone Solar System Set (Limited Edition Preview)DeskSpace is a company that revels in all things “space”. Our Solar Mood Lamp is just one of our products - we also offer the stunning DeskSpace Solar System Set. This new set is a step forward from our original Solar System set as it features our bespoke anodised aluminium base and therefore works perfectly as a matching item with the Solar Mood Lamp. The Solar System Set is currently available in a limited run to be purchased alongside the large Solar Sun Mood Lamp - we suggest getting in early to get your hands on these first sets before they are fully released.Solar Sun - Mood Lamp (L) 8cm Planetary System Set - Aluminium Base* (limited run to be purchased alongside the Large Solar Sun) Solar System Set - Aluminium Base(Solar Sun Mood Lamp + Planetary System Set) DeskSpace - Solar Sun ClassicPerfect for anyone who prefers a minimalist, artisanal approach. The Solar Sun Classic comes with a solid Walnut wooden base that matches perfectly with the original DeskSpace - Planetary System Set. Each gemstone is highlighted for its original beauty and will look stunning on the classically designed wooden stands provided. Championing the unique materials in a timeless design the Classic collection does with cables and electronics, therefore it has no light functionality.Solar Sun - Classic (L) 8cm  Planetary System Set - Walnut Wood Base(discount promotion alongside the Large Solar Sun Classic)Solar System Set - Walnut Wood Base(Solar Sun Classic + Planetary System Set) Metal Base Upgrade for Existing CustomersWe are also offering our original Kickstarter supporters the metal base from the upcoming Solar System Set for the discounted price of $29 if you wish to upgrade. This will be available to be purchased separately on our store after the campaign has finished. Who's Talking About Us  The Rewards The DeskSpace Community Here's a small sample of the hundreds of positive comments left by some of our thousands of happy customers. Thank You For Making DeskSpace a RealityWe would like to thank each and every one of you from the bottom of our hearts and we couldn't have made DeskSpace without your initial support. It's been an exciting and sometimes gruelling (assembling the first 1,500 units by hand) journey this past year, but all the time and effort has been worth it a thousand times over. It is still just the three of us working on this tirelessly and we want to make sure every product we release is the best possible product it can be. As we've grown as a company we've relied on the continued support of our craftspeople, manufacturing and distribution partners, and most importantly from each of our life partners. We try our absolute best to ensure everyone is 100% satisfied with their product and we will rectify any issue you have to make sure you get the perfect piece that will last you decades to come. The DeskSpace 100% Satisfaction GuaranteeAt DeskX we pride ourselves on quality and have hundreds of positive reviews piling up from the launch of our first product. We want to make sure you are 100% happy with your DeskSpace products. If you feel there are any issues with your product you can contact us directly at support@deskx.co and we will be there to help resolve any issues until you're completely satisfied. Please note however that our gemstones are products of the nature. Therefore variations in color, pattern, texture and veining from piece to piece are unavoidable. No two pieces will be exactly alike, this is what makes your DeskSpace completely unique. These differences and variations create the beauty of natural handcrafted gemstones. We try our absolute best to match each gemstone as closely as possible as the samples shown online, but these are put in place to give you a general idea about the appearance of each of the gemstones. Please note that changes in lighting may cause the products to look slightly different in real life than those shown in images online and that multiple orders of the same item might not be an exact match. Risks and challengesSince the successful launch of our first product, the DeskSpace Solar System set we've become an established company with reliable vendors and hundreds of positive reviews from happy customers so there isn't much of a risk in backing the Sun Mood Lamp. Our materials have already been sourced, and have people on the ground to oversee the pre-production runs to make sure everything goes smoothly.The only remaining risk to backers is that of schedule. A range of issues can arise during the handcrafting of the gemstones as each is selected and shaped by hand. Only once a significant amount of time has been spent on shaping can our craftspeople tell if this gemstone meets our standards. Due to the natural nature of gemstones we can't predict with complete accuracy the time and scrappage rates. If something arises that will take time to fix or rework will opt to push the schedule back slightly to make sure it's done right over shipping a substandard product. We will be in constant communication with you throughout the production process and you will been informed early on if anything unforeseen arises that is going to cause slight delays.

story:
Campaign ended

 

Every great story comes to end.
story_txt: Campaign ended Every great story comes to end.

story:
What is Austin Lloyd™?

Austin Lloyd™ is a subscription service of premium educational toys for infants and toddlers that provides developmentally appropriate toys and books for each child. 

We also offer a donation program so you can easily donate your used toys to those less fortunate.

                     

Our Mission: Delivering Engaging Surprises For Young Minds

We deliver boxes of high-end educational toys specially tailored for children under the age of three. Every month that you subscribe, you receive 3-5 toys and at least one book with a focus on helping develop your child’s fine motor, social and cognitive skills.

We want to make sure others are benefitting as well and that is why we set-up our donation program. Inside every box, there are instructions on how you can send your toys back to us, free of charge. You can certainly keep your toys forever, but if you want to donate them, we will give the used toys to our partner charities. You can free your home of clutter while giving the gift of learning to those less fortunate. 

Why Are Our Boxes So Special?

Play with physical toys is critical to early motor and cognitive development. The American Academy of Pediatrics agrees – they believe that children under two should spend less time on screens and more time playing. It’s also one of the primary ways that parents bond with their tots. 

But not any old toy will do.

We have dedicated a year of research to identifying distinct physical and cognitive development levels and milestones for infants and toddlers. This research enabled us to categorize our boxes to ensure that each child receives toys appropriate for his/her stage of development.

A few more facts about our beautiful boxes:

  • You can decide if you want your boxes delivered every month or every other month.
  • The boxes are themed and are different every month. For example, Rhythm and Sounds, themes related to holidays, etc.
  • We do our best to select unique, premium toys that are not typically found at the large retail chains.
  • All of our toys are BPA and phthalate free. We do our best to minimize the amount of plastic in the toys we send and prefer the durability of wooden toys.
  • We provide explanatory cards about every toy in the box and how each contributes to your child’s development 

       

Our Story

My name is Lindsay and I want to help busy parents develop their children into lifelong learners, while also giving back to those less fortunate.

I have three young nephews and every time I buy them a gift, I want it to have some sort of educational component.I never really thought about it being a part of my job, it was just the kind of aunt, and eventually parent, that I wanted to be.

Fast forward a few years. I was interning for a tech company and partnered with toy companies to develop a new children’s product. It was such a rewarding experience and I realized that working in the children’s industry was my calling.  Then, when I looked around, I witnessed stressed friends and relatives struggling to juggle work, life, plus a newborn and trying to learn everything about raising a child. Often it was just easier for them to grab any toy off a shelf than to think about what was developmentally best for their child – it was totally overwhelming. I wanted to help ease the burden on new parents and facilitate hassle-free learning for their kids. And so the idea for Austin Lloyd™ was born.

I’ve also always been raised to know that there were people in this world less fortunate than me. So, I wanted to provide customers with an opportunity to donate toys to help those who need it.

I found a way to bring all of this passion together: to help busy parents select toys that develop their child's fine motor and cognitive skills, deliver those toys right to their door every month, and give back to others!                 

                                  

Why I Need Funding

Austin Lloyd™ is still a newborn. I’ve spent my life savings to get the website up and running, place my first few orders of toys and deliver boxes to a few customers. But I need your help. Many of the high-end toy companies have minimum orders up to $3000 and that is just for one toy order! To keep having variety in the boxes, I need your help. These toys could develop the skills of your daughter, your son, your niece, your grandson. Help me deliver engaging surprises to the young minds in your life and to those who can't afford toys for their own children.

Our Perks

Donate $25 and receive one of our limited edition magnets to display your little one's masterpieces.

                                                         

Donate $50 and get a pair of these adorable britches from our partner, Cutey Booty!

                               .

                                                       

Donate $100 and get a free 1-month subscription to Austin Lloyd, plus we will donate a toy to our partner charity, Room to Grow!  

                              

Donate $250 and get a free 1-month subscription to Austin Lloyd, plus a cute pair of britches from our partner, Cutey Booty, AND we will donate 2 toys to our partner charity, Room to Grow!

                        

If you are feeling really generous, donate $1000 and get a free 3-month subscription to Austin Lloyd, 2 cute pairs of britches from Cutey Booty AND we will donate 3 toys to our partner charity, Room to Grow!

Spread The Word!

Even if you don't want to contribute to this campaign with money, you can help by sharing this with your friends, family, or anyone else who might love an Austin Lloyd™ subscription. The shortcut to this campaign is:

igg.me/at/AustinLloyd

Thanks for checking out Austin Lloyd™. With your help, we'll deliver engaging surprises to young minds all around the country!

story:
WHY?

Great presentations can make great things happen! 
Unfortunately, the vast majority of presentations is not great, but deadly boring.

Creating a stunning presentation is not easy! It takes a lot of time, creativity and effort if done by yourself or a lot of money if done by an agency.

That's why we wanna give EVERYBODY the chance to CREATE STUNNING PRESENTATIONS IN MINUTES!

Because great ideas deserve great presentations so that they can change the world for good!

 

HOW?

presenter.world provides you with a whole world of presentation templates, visuals and tips, to help you create stunning presentations in minutes. Just enter your content into our ready-to-use templates and that’s it, you’re done!

presenter.world is membership based, meaning for just a few bucks you can download, try, combine, and use ALL templates and visuals, until you have enough to WOW your audience!

It's like an all-you-can-eat-buffet for presentations! And the best thing, the buffet will grow every month, as new templates, visuals,  tutorials and tips & tricks are added regularly.

 

WHO AM I?

Hi, my name is Michael (Sinnhuber) and I am the founder of presenter.world. Together with a small international team I am currently building the presenter.world. You can find more about me on my Linkedin or XING profile.

 

HOW DID I GET HERE?

I have been interested in presentations since I was in school (which is a pretty long time ago).
I always hated it, when i had to listen to boring presentations that seemed to never end. And I can tell you, I have seen an endless number of them, as I was working for a large US-based IT company most of my career.

4 years ago I decided to pick up the fight against all those boring presentations and make this world a better place - one presentation at a time.

So I founded a presentation design & training agency called mcprezi (http://mcprezi.com) and became one of only around 40 "Prezi Independent Experts" worldwide.

In my daily business I help clients like Henkel, Porsche, Red Cross, Berner, Daikin... in bringing their message across perfectly.

 

I WANT TO HELP YOU!

As much I love to work with those big companies, I never wanted great presentations to be an exclusive product for "the big guys".

All the great ideas, that are out there in the world, deserve to be presented perfectly, so that they can move people to take action. And together we can make this world a better place!

That's why I came up with the idea of creating templates, visuals and presentation tips, making it easy and affordable for everybody to create stunning presentations in minutes. If you want to try it, you can get your first template for FREE by joining our waiting list on https://presenter.world.

Using our ready-to-fill templates is the easiest way to create a stunning presentation in minutes. And if you still need help, we're are there to help you out with some nice and affordable add-on services.

So to sum it up, presenter.world is completely built to help you shine on stage - while saving you time and money!

 

BUT BEFORE THAT, WE NEED YOUR HELP!

By now, we've created 100+ Prezi templates, that are just waiting to be used by you!

But, to make the organisation, search and delivery of the templates, visuals and tips as easy as possible, we need to set up a rock solid system. Our major goal is to save you time over the whole process, so using our platform must be fast and easy.

To build this for you, we are working together with a bunch of professional web developers, but unfortunately they are not working for free and our financial resources are limited.

 

WHY ARE WE CROWDFUNDING PRESENTER.WORLD?

We chose INDIEGOGO crowd funding because we wanted to share this project with people who really value and appreciate great ideas & innovation.

The fact that you are on INDIEGOGO shows, that you are open-minded and willing to contribute to great ideas that can change the world. And on the way from a great idea to a big success, a convincing presentation is a key factor!

 

HOW DO WE SPEND THE MONEY?

All the money that you are investing in our project will go directly into the development of the system. To more help we get, the faster (and more sophisticated) we can build the system and the sooner we will be able to provide you with all the templates, visuals and tips!

To name just a few, your investment will go into

  • Web development (functionality)
  • Web design and usability
  • Creation of even more templates
  • Professional creation on presentation tutorials
  • Creation of presentation tips & tricks (via blog post, ebooks and videos)
  • Online Marketing

 

WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU?

As we want to help everybody out there, we have perks for every budget.

Starting with a single template (€ 5)  and a package of 5 templates (€ 10), helping us NOW is your chance to get a MONTHLY or YEARLY membership for the LOWEST PRICE EVER (32 % OFF). The best thing, you can keep this low price level FOREVER, if you decide to renew your membership!

And, besides the financial part, YOU will change the world for good by supporting us. You are part of a movement fighting against boredom in presentations worldwide, while giving the biggest ideas the chance to be spread all over the world to make change happen in every part of our society!

So, don't miss this once in lifetime chance!

 

TIMELINE?

If we reach our target, we will be able to start on April 1st, 2017 (at the latest).

If not, I will take a lot longer, maybe until the end of 2017 to bring this project to life. But missing the target is not option for us!

 

PLEASE BACK OUR PROJECT & SPREAD THE MESSAGE

We are sure, YOU - as part of the amazing community here on INDIEGOGO - will help to bring our project to life, so that we can help Millions of people, that are in need of great presentations.

And even if you aren't able to give a penny, you can help by following us on

facebook, twitter, instagram & YouTube

and spreading the word about the presenter.world as much as possible!

Web design and usability
Creation of even more templates
Professional creation on presentation tutorials
Creation of presentation tips & tricks (via blog post, ebooks and videos)
Online Marketing
